Seja o alvo maligno ou não, o Golpe aplica todos os efeitos que normalmente aplicaria em um Golpe Retributivo (como punição divina) e você pode converter todo o dano físico do ataque em dano bondoso.
Blade of Justice.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Blade of Justice.name: Lâmina da Justiça

Blade of Law.description:
Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Cavaleiro Infernal

Você invoca o poder da lei e faz uma arma ou Golpe desarmado contra um inimigo que você testemunhou violando ou desrespeitando a lei ou agindo desordenadamente. O Golpe causa dois dados extras de dano de arma se o alvo do seu Golpe for caótico. Seja ou não o alvo caótico, você pode converter o dano físico do ataque em dano leal.

(Tradução não oficial - Lost Omens: Character Guide)
Blade of Law.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Blade of Law.name: Lâmina da Ordem

Blade of the Crimson Oath.description:
Pré-requisitos Dedicação do Cavaleiro Recuperador

Você invoca o Juramento Carmesim para ferir mortos-vivos e depois faz Golpe com arma ou Golpe desarmado contra um inimigo morto-vivo. O Golpe causa dois dados extras de dano de arma e você pode converter todo o dano físico do ataque em dano positivo.

(Tradução não oficial - Lost Omens: Character Guide)
Blade of the Crimson Oath.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Blade of the Crimson Oath.name: Lâmina do Juramento Carmesim

Blank Slate.description:
Pré-Requisitos Lendário em Dissimulação

Suas dissimulações confundem até as mais poderosas adivinhações mortais. Efeitos de detecção, revelação e vidência passam despercebidos através de você, suas possessões e suas auras, sem detectar nada a menos que o efeito de detecção tenha um nível de neutralização 20 ou superior. Por exemplo, detectar magia ainda detectaria outras magias na área, mas nada mágico em você; visão verdadeira não o revelaria; localizar ou vidência não o encontrariam e assim por diante
Blank Slate.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Blank Slate.name: Quadro em Branco

Blast Lock.description:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm.

Sometimes taking the shortest distance between two points involves removing an obstacle or two. You shoot your firearm at a lock within 10 feet. Make an attack roll against the DC required to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2EE4aF4SZpYf0R6H]{Pick the Lock}

Critical Success You open the lock, or you achieve two successes toward opening a complex lock.

Success You open the lock, or you achieve one success toward opening a complex lock.

Failure You fail to open the lock, and your shot makes it harder to open. Future attempts to Pick the Lock or Blast the Lock take a -2 circumstance penalty.

Critical Failure You fail to open the lock, and your shot makes it much harder to open. Future attempts to Pick the Lock or Blast the Lock take a -4 circumstance penalty.

Blast Resistance.description:
Access You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

You're used to the clamor of steel, the crack of a firearm, and the thunderous blast of explosions. You gain resistance 3 to sonic. If you roll a success on a saving throw against an auditory effect that causes the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} condition, you get a critical success instead.

Blast Tackle.description:
Requirements You're wielding a two-handed crossbow or a firearm that has the kickback or scatter trait.

You throw yourself at an enemy, bracing your weapon against it and pulling it close before releasing a destructive shot. Attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}; if you're wielding your weapon in both hands, you Release one hand to do so. If your Grapple succeeds, you can immediately Strike the target of the Grapple with the required weapon, even if it's a two-handed weapon you're holding in one hand. This Strike deals an additional 3d6 precision damage. As long the creature remains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}, you can use just one hand to reload the weapon and Strike that creature with it.

Blasting Beams.description:
Requirements You have a free hand.

A directed beam of heat or an arc of lightning is one of the simplest ways to project energy. You fire a blast or beam from one hand. Make an attack roll against a creature within 30 feet. If you succeed, the beam deals [[/r (floor(@actor.level/2)d6)]]{1d6 damage for every 2 levels} you have to the target, or double damage on a critical success.

Awakening Your beams blast through targets. Instead of making an attack roll to damage a single creature within 30 feet, you can use Blasting Beams as a 2-action activity to damage all creatures in a @Template[type:line|distance:60], with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save.

Awakening You can choose to launch smaller, quicker beams from your eyes instead. These deal [[/r (floor(@actor.level/2)d4)]]{d4s} instead of d6s, but the attack has the agile trait, and you don't need a hand free to make it, though your eyes must be uncovered.

Blaze Of Revelation.description:
Your mind and body can, for a short time, withstand the devastation of overdrawing your curse.

When you would become overwhelmed by your curse, you can forestall the effects for up to 1 minute. On each of your turns during that time, you can cast one revelation spell granted by your mystery (but not domain spells, spells from Diverse Mystery, or other revelation spells you gained from other abilities) without spending Focus Points or taking any further negative effects.

At the end of the minute, the durations of any revelation spells you cast during that time end, you take the normal effects from being overwhelmed by your curse, and you must attempt a DC 40 Fortitude save.

Critical Success You aren’t otherwise affected.

Success You are Drained 2 and can’t reduce or remove this condition until your next preparations.

Failure You are drained 4 and can’t reduce or remove this condition until your next preparations.

Critical Failure You die.

Blazing Aura.description:
Frequency once per day.

Trigger Your turn begins.

You explode in flame. Enemies in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] take [[/r 7d6[fire]]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher). Allies in the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 round and can use the additional action to Strike or Stride.

Blazing Talon Surge.description:
Requirements You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.rbiMK71SvGZGRLJ1]{Rain of Embers Stance}.

You rush forward and latch onto your enemy with talons of hungering fire.

Stride once. If you end your movement within reach of at least one enemy, you can make a fire talon Strike against that enemy that deals an additional [[/r 1d4[persistent,fire]]] damage. If it hits and deals damage, you can attempt an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} the creature you hit.
Blazing Talon Surge.source: Presságios Perdidos - Guia da Sociedade Pathfinder

Bleeding Finisher.description: Your blow inflicts profuse bleeding. Make a slashing or piercing @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} with a weapon or unarmed attack that allows you to add your precise strike damage. If you hit, the target also takes persistent bleed damage equal to your precise strike finisher damage.

Bless Shield.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Bless Tonic.description:
Pré-requisitos mestre em Manufatura, divindade que concede curar fonte divina

Você canaliza energia positiva em restaurações que protegem contra danos. Quando você @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Manufatura} um item alquímico que restaura Pontos de Vida (em vez de criá-lo com alquimia avançada, Alquimia Rápida ou outro meio), ele se torna um item alquímico abençoado e ganha o traço positivo. Por exemplo, um @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hDLbR56Id2OtU318]{Elixir da Vida} se tornaria um elixir abençoado da vida. Quando uma criatura recupera Pontos de Vida usando um item alquímico abençoado, a energia excedente concede resistência negativa 5 por 1 rodada ou resistência negativa 10 se você for lendário em Manufatura.

(Tradução não oficial - Gods and Magic)
Bless Tonic.name: Tônico Abençoado

Bless Toxin.description:
Pré-requisitos mestre em Artesanato, divindade que concede fonte divina ferir

Você despeja energia negativa em toxinas que cria para debilitar ainda mais seus alvos. Quando você @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Manufatura} veneno alquímico (em vez de criá-lo com alquimia avançada, alquimia rápida ou outro meio), ele se torna um veneno alquímico abençoado e ganha o traço negativo. Quando uma criatura é atingida por um veneno alquímico abençoado, por 1 rodada, todos os Pontos de Vida que ela recuperaria de um efeito positivo são reduzidos em 5 ou 10 se você é lendário. Manufatura.

(Tradução não oficial - Gods and Magic)
Bless Toxin.name: Toxina Abençoada

Blessed Blood (Aasimar).description:
Your freshly spilled blood is sanctified, and ingesting it causes effects similar to those of @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.efFe4EK7ThUrH446]{Holy Water}.

Whenever a fiend, undead, or creature with a weakness to good damage drinks your blood or deals piercing or slashing damage to you with jaws, fangs, or a similar attack, that creature takes [[/r 1d6 #good]] good damage.

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Crafting checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Craft} @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.efFe4EK7ThUrH446]{Holy Water} using your own blood as one of the ingredients.

Blessed Blood (Sorcerer).description:
Prerequisites bloodline that grants divine spells, you follow a deity

Your deity’s blessings manifest in your blood-borne power. Add up to three of your deity’s spells (spells your deity grants to clerics) to your spell list. They are not automatically added to your repertoire, but you can select them just as you would spells normally on the divine spell list.

Blessed Denial.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.eBdajOzs8kiJDic2]{Blessed One Dedication}

Trigger An ally within 30 feet would become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied}.

You exude peace and protection, lessening a harmful condition as it falls upon an ally. Reduce the value of the condition your ally would take by 1 (to a minimum of 0). If the ally takes more than one condition at the same time, choose one to reduce.

Blessed One Dedication.description:
You are touched by a deity and gifted with the ability to alleviate the suffering of others.

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} devotion spell. It costs 1 Focus Point to cast a focus spell. This feat grants a focus pool of 1 Focus Point that you can recover using the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus} activity.

You can Refocus by meditating, whether you reflect on the deity granting the blessing or not, allowing your blessing to refill your focus pool.

Your devotion spells from the blessed one archetype are divine spells.

Special You can’t select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the blessed one archetype.

Blessed Sacrifice.description:
Prerequisites Blessed One Dedication

You gain the Protector's Sacrifice domain spell as a devotion spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Blessed Spell.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.eBdajOzs8kiJDic2]{Blessed One Dedication}, ability to cast spells from spell slots, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zilwynzk8lIujgZo]{Mercy}

Frequency once per 10 minutes

When you focus your magic on an ally, you can remove harmful conditions.

If your next action is to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} from a spell slot, and that spell targets only a single ally, you can also attempt to remove a harmful condition from that ally. The condition must be one that could be removed by your Mercy feat, including those granted by later feats such as @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.kZdcoaTD849QalR9]{Greater Mercy}.

Attempt a counteract check based on the spell’s DC and level. This effect is in addition to the normal effects of your spell.

Blessings of the Five.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens

Blind-Fight.description:
Pré-Requisitos mestre em Percepção

Seus instintos de batalha lhe tornam ainda mais alerta a oponentes ocultados e invisíveis. Você não precisa obter sucesso em um teste simples para mirar criaturas @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Ocultadas}. Você não fica @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} contra criaturas que estejam @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Escondidas} de você (a menos que esteja desprevenido contra elas por outras razões além da condição escondido). Além disso, você precisa obter sucesso somente em um teste simples CD 5 para mirar uma criatura escondida. Enquanto estiver adjacente a uma criatura @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Indetectada} de seu nível ou inferior, você a considera somente escondida
Blind-Fight.name: Lutar às Cegas

Blood Component Substitution.description:
You can bypass the need for incantations and gestures by drawing energy directly from your blood, causing you to visibly glow the color of your blood and crackle with magical energy. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell}, you can replace all verbal, material, or somatic spellcasting components with a blood component.

To use a blood component, you lose Hit Points equal to twice the spell’s level as the energy in your blood is depleted, and you can’t decrease the Hit Points lost in any way.

As usual for altering components, this has no effect on the number of actions required to Cast the Spell, and your Cast a Spell activity gains the concentrate trait but not the manipulate trait. You can’t use blood components to replace any required part of a spell’s cost.

Blood Frenzy.description:
Requirements Your eidolon's last action dealt bleed damage to a living creature.

Your eidolon flies into a frenzy. It gains the benefits of boost eidolon and gains temporary HP equal to your level, but takes a -2 penalty to AC. It can't voluntarily end the frenzy or start another frenzy while in the frenzy.

The frenzy lasts for 1 minute, after which your eidolon is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} for 1 minute and can't start another frenzy for 1 minute.

Blood in the Air.description:
Requirements An enemy you've damaged with a ranged weapon during the last minute is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from you.

Once you've locked on to a target, little can obscure your aim. Make a ranged weapon Strike against the required target. This Strike ignores the target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition and reduces the flat check for the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} condition from 11 to 5.

Bloodletting Claws.description: Your eidolon inflicts bleeding wounds on a telling blow. If your eidolon critically hits with a melee unarmed Strike that deals slashing or piercing damage, its target takes [[/r 1d6[bleed]]]. Your eidolon gains an item bonus to this bleed damage equal to the unarmed attack's item bonus to attack rolls. This is a critical specialization effect.

Bloodletting Fangs.description:
Prerequisites fangs unarmed attack

You emulate your vampiric parent’s techniques for drawing blood from a victim. Your fangs Strikes deal an additional [[/r 1d4 #persistent bleed]] persistent bleed damage on a critical hit.

Bloodline Breadth.description:
Pré-Requisitos Conjuração Básica de Feiticeiro

Seu repertório é expandido, e você pode conjurar mais magias da tradição de sua linhagem a cada dia. Aumente a quantidade de magias em seu repertório e de espaços de magia que você recebe através de talentos de arquétipo de feiticeiro em 1 para cada nível de magia (exceto pelos seus dois níveis de magia mais altos).
Bloodline Breadth.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Bloodline Breadth.name: Amplitude de Linhagem

Bloodline Conduit.description:
Frequência uma vez por minuto

Sua natureza mágica inata lhe permite redirecionar energias ambientais para abastecer suas magias. Se a sua próxima ação for Conjurar uma Magia de 5º nível ou inferior que não tenha duração, você não gasta a magia preparada ao conjurá-la.
Bloodline Conduit.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Bloodline Conduit.name: Conduíte de Linhagem

Bloodline Focus.description:
Pré-Requisitosmagia de linhagem

Seu foco se recupera mais rápido. Se tiver gastado pelo menos 2 Pontos de Foco desde a última vez que Refocou, você recupera 2 Pontos de Foco ao Refocar (em vez de recuperar somente 1 ponto).
Bloodline Focus.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Bloodline Focus.name: Foco de Linhagem

Bloodline Metamorphosis.description: Você aprendeu a manipular o poder inato da sua linhagem e adaptá-lo às suas necessidades. Ao fazer suas preparações diárias, você pode mudar uma única magia de 9º nível ou inferior por uma do mesmo nível. Você não pode mudar magias que não sejam especificamente garantidas por sua linhagem.
Bloodline Metamorphosis.name: Metamorfose da Linhagem

Bloodline Mutation.description:
Prerequisites a bloodline based on a specific type of creature

You permanently mutate to become more like the creatures of your bloodline. You gain the appropriate trait or traits for those types of creatures (aberration for aberrant, angel and celestial for angelic, psychopomp and monitor for psychopomp, and so on).

You gain @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.DRtaqOHXTRtGRIUT]{Low-Light Vision} or @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision}, if one is appropriate for creatures with those traits. Choose one of the following.

  • If the creatures associated with your bloodline have the ability to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly}, you gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed.
  • If the creatures associated with your bloodline are aquatic or amphibious, you become amphibious, able to breathe water and air equally well, and you gain a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim} Speed equal to your Speed.
  • If creatures associated with your bloodline have a resistance or immunity to acid, cold, electricity, fire, negative, or sonic, choose an energy type your bloodline is immune or resistant to and gain resistance 20 against that energy type.

Bloodline Perfection.description:
Pré-Requisitos exemplar de linhagem

Você comanda os poderes definitivos de sua linhagem e tradição. Você recebe um espaço de magia adicional de 10º nível.
Bloodline Perfection.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Bloodline Perfection.name: Perfeição de Linhagem

Bloodline Resistance.description: Seu sangue mágico lhe torna mais resistente a magia. Você recebe +1 de bônus de estado em jogadas de salvamento contra magias e efeitos mágicos.
Bloodline Resistance.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Bloodline Resistance.name: Resistência de Linhagem

Bloodline Wellspring.description:
Pré-Requisitos Foco de Linhagem

O poder de seu sangue reabastece seu foco. Se tiver gastado pelo menos 3 Pontos de Foco desde a última vez que Refocou, você recupera 3 Pontos de Foco ao Refocar (em vez de recuperar somente 1 ponto).
Bloodline Wellspring.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Bloodline Wellspring.name: Manancial de Linhagem

Bloody Blows.description:
Your lethal unarmed attacks leave bloody gouges or cause severe internal bleeding. When you critically hit with a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} using an unarmed attack that isn’t nonlethal, the target takes [[/r 1d4 #persistent bleed]] persistent bleed damage.

This can be because you’re taking the penalty to use a fist for a lethal attack or because you have an unarmed attack without the nonlethal trait due to @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JP5pptkl1Fx1JK4m]{Iron Fists}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.M5195FvfCN3X7gi9]{Tusks}, or a similar ability.

Bloody Debilitation.description:
Prerequisites trained in Medicine, @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.9SruVg2lZpNaYLOB]{Debilitating Strikes}

Your attacks slice arteries and veins. Add the following debilitation to the list you can choose from when you use Debilitating Strike.

  • Debilitation The target takes [[/r 3d6 #persistent bleed]] persistent bleed damage.

Boaster's Challenge.description:
pré-requisitos especialista em Dissimulação, Diplomacia ou Intimidação; Dedicação de Atiçador Fanfarrão

Você chama um inimigo, fazendo com que ele fique confuso e mais fácil de derrotar. Selecione uma criatura que você pode ver e declare um desafio. Para o seu desafio, tente um teste de Dissimulação, Diplomacia ou Intimidação contra o CD de Vontade daquela criatura. Seu desafio deve incluir um componente linguístico, auditivo, ou visual e ganha a característica correspondente. Se você for bem-sucedido, você recebe +2 de bônus de status por danos nas jogadas com sua arma ou Golpes desarmados contra esse inimigo até o final do seu próximo turno; se você possui proficiência em mestre na habilidade que usou, ganha um bônus de status +4 e, se for lendário, ganha um bônus de status +6. Em um sucesso crítico, o bônus de status dura 3 rodadas. Se você é bem-sucedido ou falha, as criaturas que testemunharam seu desafio ganham +4 de bônus de circunstância nos CDs de Vontade contra suas tentativas de desafio por 1 minuto.

(Tradução não oficial - Lost Omens: Character Guide)
Boaster's Challenge.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Boaster's Challenge.name: Desafio do Fanfarrão

Bolera's Interrogation.description:
Prerequisite @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6b8DiNx4c1zPZ7RP]{Edgewatch Detective Dedication}

Frequency Three times per day

You focus your attention on a single creature within 30 feet. That creature must attempt a Will save against your Perception DC. On a failure, the creature finds itself unable to speak any deliberate and intentional lies and takes a –2 penalty to Deception checks. On a critical failure, the penalty to Deception checks is –4. This effect lasts for 10 minutes as long as you are within 30 feet of the target and the target is aware that you are using the ability against it. If you begin a new interrogation, this effect ends for any previous target. After your interrogation ends, the target is immune to this ability for 24 hours.
Bolera's Interrogation.source: Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace

Bon Mot.description:
Prerequisites trained in Diplomacy

You launch an insightful quip at a foe, distracting them. Choose a foe within 30 feet and roll a Diplomacy check against the target’s Will DC.

Critical Success The target is distracted and takes a –3 status penalty to Perception and Will saves for 1 minute.

The target can end the effect early with a retort to your Bon Mot. This can either be a single action that has the concentrate trait or an appropriate skill action to frame their retort. The GM determines which skill actions qualify, though they must take at least 1 action. Typically, the retort needs to use a linguistic Charisma-based skill action.

Success As critical success, but the penalty is –2.

Critical Failure Your quip is atrocious. You take the same penalty an enemy would take had you succeeded. This ends after 1 minute or if you issue another Bon Mot and succeed.
Bon Mot.name: Comentário Maldoso

Bond Conservation.description:
Pré-Requisitos elo arcano

Requerimento A última ação que você usou foi Drenar Item Ligado.

Manipulando cuidadosamente as energias arcanas armazenadas ao drenar seu item ligado, você conserva poder o suficiente para conjurar outra magia um pouco mais fraca. Se a sua próxima ação for Conjurar uma Magia usando a energia de Drenar Item Ligado, você ganha um uso extra de Drenar Item Ligado. Você deve usar este Drenar Item Ligado extra antes do final de seu próximo turno ou o perderá, e só pode usá-lo para conjurar uma magia pelo menos 2 níveis inferior à magia conjurada anteriormente com Drenar Item Ligado.
Bond Conservation.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Bond Conservation.name: Conservação de Elo

Bonded Animal.description:
Pré-Requisitos especialista em Natureza

Você forja fortes conexões com um animal. Você pode gastar 7 dias de recesso tentando ligar-se a um animal normal (não um companheiro ou outro animal especial). Após esta duração, faça um teste de Natureza CD 20. Se bem-sucedido, você cria um elo com o animal. O animal fica permanentemente prestativo para você, a menos que você faça algo notório para quebrar o elo. Um animal prestativo é mais fácil de direcionar, conforme descrito sob Comandar um Animal na página 250.

Criar um elo com um novo animal encerra qualquer elo prévio que você possuir. Você não pode ter um elo com animal e um companheiro animal (embora possa ter um elo com animal e um familiar).
Bonded Animal.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Bonded Animal.name: Elo com Animal

Bonded Focus.description:
Pré-requisitos elo arcano

A forte conexão com seu item ligado aumenta sua reserva de foco. Se tiver gastado pelo menos 2 Pontos de Foco desde a última vez que Refocou, você recupera 2 Pontos de Foco ao Refocar (em vez de recuperar somente 1 ponto).
Bonded Focus.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Bonded Focus.name: Foco de Elo

Bonds of Death.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements You have cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{Animate Dead} this turn.

You sway with the motions of your spells that animate the dead, channeling your power to sustain two at the same time. You Sustain your previous casting of animate dead, binding the necromantic energy of the two spells together with metaphysical twine. On subsequent rounds, you can Sustain both animate dead spells with a single action to Sustain the Spell. This benefit lasts until either of the spells ends.

Bone Caller.description: Using a mixture of dinosaur bones and the bones of your ancestors to focus your magic, you animate lizards and dinosaurs to carry messages or serve as mounts. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.yhz9fF69uwRhnHix]{Animal Messenger} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WPKJOhEihhcIm2uQ]{Phantom Steed} as primal innate spells once per day each. The animal messenger is always a Tiny dinosaur or lizard, and your innate spell transforms it from bones to flesh, even if there are no dinosaurs or lizards nearby. The phantom steed looks like a dinosaur rather than a horse but functions identically.

Bone Investiture.description: You encase yourself in spiritual dinosaur bones to become a Huge dinosaur. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.KhM8MhoUgoUjBMIz]{Dinosaur Form} on yourself as a 5th-level primal innate spell once per day.

Bone Rider.description: Using your ancestors' bones, you manifest their spirits around you in a fossilized form, terrifying your foes. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.O6VQC1Bs4aSYDa6R]{Mask of Terror} on yourself as a primal innate spell once per day. When you do, you appear as a skeletal lizardfolk ancestor, twisted in a way that inspires the deepest fears of those who observe you.
Bone Rider.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse

Bone Spikes.description:
Sharp shards of bone tear forth from your elbows, wrists, or other parts of your body. For 1 minute, you can make bone spike unarmed Strikes, which deal 1d6 piercing damage and have the versatile S and sweep traits. When you take the Bone Spikes action, you can choose one weapon on your person and duplicate its weapon runes onto your bone spikes (with the exception of any runes that couldn't apply to the bone spears).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.ZsO5juyylVoxUkXh]{Effect: Bone Spikes}

Awakening Your bones grow longer, lashing flexibly at range. While you have bone spikes, you can Interact to give your bone spikes reach 10 feet until the end of the current turn.

Awakening Grooves in your bone spikes form a channel for venom. Your bone spikes deal 1d4 persistent poison damage, which increases to 2d4 at 10th level and 3d4 at 18th level.

Bone Swarm.description:
Frequency once per day

You scatter your body and transform into a whirling storm of bones for up to 1 minute or until you spend a single action to return to your normal shape. You become Huge, gain the swarm trait, and gain a fly Speed of 40 feet. As a swarm, you have the following characteristics.

  • You are immune to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} conditions.
  • You have weakness 5 to area and splash damage.
  • You can occupy the same space as other creatures and must do so to use your damaging ability.
  • As a 2-action activity, you can deal [[/r 10d6[bludgeoning]]] damage to all creatures sharing your space (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save with a DC equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher).
  • You can't speak, Cast Spells, use manipulate actions requiring your hands, Activate magic items, or make any Strikes with your normal body.
  • You don't gain the swarm mind ability, so you are still affected normally by mental effects. You also retain the benefits of skeleton feats that don't require communication or the use of hands.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.r4kb2zDepFeczMsl]{Effect: Bone Swarm}

Boneyard's Call.description:
You have a powerful connection to the Boneyard and its courts, granting you the ability to travel to and from the Boneyard. You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Plane Shift} as a divine innate spell. You can cast it twice per week.

This can be used only to travel to the Boneyard or from the Boneyard to the Material Plane. Due to your unique connection to the Boneyard, your body serves as the focus, and you don't require a tuning fork.

Borrow Memories.description:
Knowing how someone thinks makes it much easier to know where they'll be, or even replace them altogether. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9BnhadUO8FMLmeZ3]{Mind Probe} as an innate occult spell once per day, using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

If you cast mind probe on a target you're studying for the purpose of Assuming their Role, and the target fails their save, you can delay the spell from coming into effect until you Assume their Role. When you use the spell this way, you can Sustain it up to 10 times during its duration, asking a question each time. The spell lasts until you ask all 10 questions or are no longer Assuming the Role, whichever comes first. You don't need to Sustain the Spell to extend its duration-only when asking a question-nor do you need to be in range or have line of effect to Sustain it.

Borrow Time.description:
Frequency once per minute

Trigger Your turn begins.

You reach ahead and make use of time that's yet to be. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} and can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike. You gain this extra action immediately and can use it this turn. At the end of your turn, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Atordoado 1}.

Boulder Roll.description:
Pré-Requisitos Correr nas Rochas

Sua estrutura enância permite que você empurre adversários da mesma forma que um grande pedregulho rola por uma caverna subterrânea. Dê um Passo para o quadrado de um adversário do seu tamanho ou inferior, e o adversário deve se mover para o espaço vazio diretamente atrás dele. O adversário deve se mover mesmo se isso colocá-lo em perigo. O adversário pode tentar uma jogada de salvamento de Fortitude contra sua CD de Atletismo para bloquear seu Passo. Se o adversário tentar esta jogada de salvamento, ele sofre dano contundente igual ao seu nível mais seu modificador de Força, exceto se ele obtiver um sucesso crítico.

Se o adversário não puder se mover para um espaço vazio (se estiver cercado por objetos sólidos ou outras criaturas, por exemplo), sua Rolagem de Pedregulho não surte efeito.
Boulder Roll.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Boulder Roll.name: Rolagem de Pedregulho

Bounce Back.description:
Frequency once per day Trigger You lose the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition.

You recover from near-death experiences with astounding resilience. Don’t increase the value of your @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} condition due to losing the dying condition.

Bouncy Goblin.description:
Pré-requisitos Herança de Goblin Inquebrável

Você possui uma elasticidade particular que facilita com que você se contorça e quique. Você se torna treinado em Acrobacia (ou outra perícia da sua escolha, se você já for treinado em Acrobacia). Você também ganha um bônus circunstancial de +2 ao tentar @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Atravessar Acrobaticamente} o espaço de um inimigo;
Bouncy Goblin.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Bouncy Goblin.name: Goblin Quicante

Bound in Ice.description:
You become a hybrid of your ancestry and a saumen kar. Your size increases to Large, and your reach becomes 10 feet. Your cold resistance increases to be equal to your level, and you gain fire resistance equal to half your level.

You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.a47Npi5XHXo47y49]{Blizzard Evasion} reaction.
Bound in Ice.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Monsters of Myth

Boundless Reprisals.description: Com um sexto sentido para o fluxo de combate, você reage rapidamente a qualquer situação. No começo do turno de cada inimigo, você recebe uma reação que pode ser usada somente durante esse turno.
Boundless Reprisals.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Boundless Reprisals.name: Represálias Ilimitadas

Bounty Hunter Dedication.description:
Prerequisites trained in Survival

When focused on finding your quarry, you’re relentless. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey} action. You can use Hunt Prey to designate only a creature that you’ve seen, heard about, or learned about through some other means, such as a bounty board or wanted poster. In addition to the other benefits of Hunt Prey, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{Gather Information} regarding your prey.

If you already have Hunt Prey, you become an expert in Survival and gain the circumstance bonus to Gather Information about your prey; you can still designate a creature you’re tracking during exploration, in addition to the conditions above.

Special You can’t select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the bounty hunter archetype.

Brain Drain.description:
With a wresting of will, you siphon off a creature's mental energy to replenish your own. One non-mindless creature within 30 feet must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.spellDC.value)] save against your spell DC.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 minute, and you regain 1 Focus Point, up to your normal maximum. You can't use Brain Drain again until after the next time you make your daily preparations.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}.
Brain Drain.name: Brain Drain

Bravo's Determination.description:
Pré-requisitos especialista em Dissimulação, Dedicação de Atiçador Fanfarrão Acionamento O ataque de um inimigo reduz você a 0 pontos de vida; você não estava com 1 ponto de vida e não seria morto.

Sua confiança beira a auto-ilusão, mas mantém você indo contra probabilidades esmagadoras. Tente um teste de Dissimulação contra o CD de ataque do Golpe que desencadeou. Você aplica uma penalidade nesse teste igual ao dobro do seu valor de Ferido, se houver. Se o ataque desencadeador foi um acerto crítico, use o resultado um grau de sucesso pior do que o que você rolou. Sucesso Crítico Você evita ser nocauteado e permanece com 1 ponto de vida. Sucesso Você evita ser nocauteado e permanece com 1 ponto de vida, mas aumenta seu valor de @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Ferido} por 1.

(Tradução não oficial - Lost Omens: Character Guide)
Bravo's Determination.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Bravo's Determination.name: Determinação de Bravo

Brawling Focus.description: Você sabe tirar o melhor de seus ataques quando luta frente a frente. Você obtém acesso aos efeitos de especialização de crítico de ataques desarmados e armas do grupo pugilato. Se possuir Arsenal Monástico, você também obtém acesso aos efeitos de especialização de crítico de todas as armas de monge nas quais seja treinado..
Brawling Focus.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Brawling Focus.name: Foco em Pugilato

Breath Control.description: Você possui um controle incrível sobre sua respiração, o que lhe concede vantagens onde o ar seja perigoso ou escasso. Você pode prender sua respiração por 25 vezes o tempo usual antes de sufocar. Você recebe +1 de bônus de circunstância em jogadas de salvamento contra ameaçadas inaladas (como venenos inalados) e, se rolar um sucesso numa jogada de salvamento dessas, trate o resultado como um sucesso crítico.
Breath Control.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Breath Control.name: Controlar a Respiração

Breath Like Honey.description: You smell of honey and savory things. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IihxWhRfpsBgQ5jS]{Enthrall} as a 3rd-level occult innate spell once per day, except the spell has a range of 30 feet and the inhaled trait instead of the auditory trait. Targets don't gain any circumstance bonus for disagreeing with you. Your circumstance bonus to checks to Make an Impression if the target can smell your breath increases to +2.
Breath Like Honey.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse

Breath Of The Dragon.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.oo34CloLefFRi72w]{Dragon Disciple Dedication}

You can use a powerful breath weapon, much like the dragon you emulate. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.JcobNl4iE9HmMYtE]{Dragon Breath} sorcerer bloodline spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. If you already have a focus pool, increase your number of Focus Points by 1.

Briar Battler.description: You've learned to use roots, crevices, uneven ground, and dense underbrush to your advantage. When you're in difficult terrain from an environmental feature, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover}, even if the feature wouldn't ordinarily be large enough for you to Take Cover.

Bright Lion Dedication.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.bDP7kO6bnQh6no0C]{Bright Lion}

Prerequisites member of the Bright Lions, not a worshipper of @Compendium[pf2e.deities.g1AVEGi8QibhS007]{Walkena}, trained in Stealth;

Access @Compendium[pf2e.backgrounds.skqghxn3svID1dyU]{Bright Lion} background

You become trained in your choice of Deception or Diplomacy and in Mzali Lore; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. You incorporate enough worship of Walkena in your daily life to avoid suspicion. You typically don’t need to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{Lie} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} to pass yourself off as a worshipper of Walkena. Against careful inspection, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Deception checks specifically to pass yourself off as a version of yourself faithful to Walkena.

Special You can’t select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Bright Lion archetype.

Brightness Seeker.description:
Uma vez por dia, você pode gastar 10 minutos estudando o ambiente em busca de presságios relacionados a um determinado curso de ação para conjurar augúrio como um magia divina inata. A menos que o resultado de augúrio foi "nada", você obtém a seguinte reação pelos próximos 30 minutos:

Invoque o brilho (concentração)

Acionamento Você tenta uma jogada de ataque, verificação de perícia ou teste de resistência ao executar o curso de ação de seu augúrio, mas você ainda não rolou

Você ganha um bônus de status +1 na verificação de acionamento ou um bônus de status +2 se o resultado do augúrio foi "Infortúnio" e você prosseguiu de qualquer maneira.

(Tradução não oficial - Lost Omens: Character Guide)
Brightness Seeker.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Brightness Seeker.name: Buscador do Brilho

Brightsoul.description: The fire inside you asserts itself as beaming, radiant light. Your body is naturally luminescent, glowing with the effects of a primal @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light} cantrip. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up. The light is involuntary and constant; if counteracted, it returns in [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. You suffer a -2 circumstance penalty on Stealth checks to Hide or Sneak and gain a +1 circumstance bonus on saves against light effects and effects that inflict the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} conditions.

Brine May.description:
Your mother was a sea hag, granting you one sea-green or blue eye. You find comfort both in the sea and on the shore.

Whenever you roll a success on an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim}, you get a critical success instead. If you end your turn in water without having succeeded at a Swim action that round, you don’t sink (but you might still be moved by the current).

Brinesoul.description: Your elemental ancestor's legacy asserts itself as brackish water, like the seawater of the ocean. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.b6CanpXyUKJgxEwq]{Salt Wound} reaction.

Bristle.description:
You curl into a posture that splays out your bone spines. You gain a +1 circumstance to AC until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.4Zj71naHbY6O9ggP]{Effect: Bristle}

Special If you have the Barbed Quills reaction or a quills unarmed attack, each gains a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls until the start of your next turn.

Note: +1 to Barbed Quills is not automated
Bristle.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse

Brutal Beating.description:
Pré-Requisitos esquema de rufião

A brutalidade de seus acertos críticos abala a confiança de seus adversários. Sempre que seu Golpe for um acerto crítico e causar dano, o alvo fica assustado 1.
Brutal Beating.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Brutal Beating.name: Surra Brutal

Brutal Bully.description:
Pré-requisitos especialista em Atletismo

Você empurra seus adversários deixando-os machucados. Enquanto estiver em fúria, quando obtiver sucesso em Agarrar, Derrubar, Desarmar ou Empurrar um adversário, você causa dano contundente igual ao seu modificador de Força a esse adversário; este dano é somado ao dano obtido por um sucesso crítico ao Derrubar.
Brutal Bully.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Brutal Bully.name: Opressão Brutal

Brutal Critical.description: Seus acertos críticos são particularmente devastadores. Em um acerto crítico com um Golpe corpo a corpo, acrescente um dado de dano extra. Este dado é adicionado a quaisquer dados extras recebidos por uma arma fatal ou mortal. O alvo também sofre dano persistente de sangramento igual a dois dados de dano.
Brutal Critical.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Brutal Critical.name: Crítico Brutal

Brutal Finish.description:
Requerimentos Você está empunhando uma arma corpo a corpo com duas mãos.

Seu golpe final pode causar um impacto mesmo se apenas resvalar nas defesas do adversário. Faça um Golpe com a arma requerida. Após o Golpe, seu turno se encerra. O Golpe causa um dado de dano extra da arma (ou dois dados de dano extras da arma se você for de 18º nível ou maior). Este Golpe possui o efeito de falha a seguir.

Falha Você causa dano igual a um dado de dano da arma requerida. Aumente este dano para dois dados se você for pelo menos de 18º nível.
Brutal Finish.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Brutal Finish.name: Finalização Brutal

Brutish Shove.description:
Requerimentos Você está empunhando uma arma corpo a corpo de duas mãos.

Colocando seu peso no ataque, você atinge seu oponente com força o suficiente para fazê-lo tropeçar para trás. Faça um Golpe com uma arma corpo a corpo de duas mãos. Se acertar um alvo que seja do seu tamanho ou menor, ele fica desprevenido até o final de seu turno atual e você pode Empurrá-lo automaticamente com os mesmos benefícios da ação Empurrar (incluindo o efeito de sucesso crítico, se seu Golpe for um acerto crítico). Se você se mover para seguir o alvo, seu movimento não aciona reações. Este Golpe possui o efeito de falha a seguir.

Falha O alvo fica desprevenido até o final de seu turno atual.
Brutish Shove.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Brutish Shove.name: Empurrão Brutal

Buckler Dance.description:
Requirements You are wielding a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.1k3AsSW7lpU0kEpY]{Buckler}.

You spin your buckler defensively toward every attack. While you are in this stance, you constantly have your buckler raised as if you’d used @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield}, as long as you meet that action’s requirements.

Buckler Expertise.description: You’ve learned a flexible way to position your buckler to provide more protection. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield} to gain a circumstance bonus to AC from a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.1k3AsSW7lpU0kEpY]{Buckler}, increase the bonus from +1 to +2.

Bullet Dancer Burn.description:
Requirements You're wielding a firearm with an attached bayonet or reinforced stock.

The fiery blaze of your weapons combined with your unorthodox technique leaves your opponents with little opportunity to capitalize on any gaps in your defenses, or properly defend themselves against your onslaught. While in Bullet Dancer Stance, when you successfully Strike an opponent with a bayonet or reinforced stock attached to your firearm, the next ranged Strike you make against that opponent doesn't trigger reactions that would trigger on a ranged attack, such as Attack of Opportunity. While in Bullet Dancer Stance, when you make a successful ranged Strike against an opponent within your melee reach using a firearm, the next reinforced stock or bayonet attack attached to that firearm deals an additional [[/r 1[fire]]] damage per weapon damage die. The benefit on your next Strike from either use of Bullet Dancer Burn is lost if not used by the end of your next turn.

Bullet Dancer Dedication.description:
You've learned how to synchronize traditional martial arts and guns. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SMF1hTWPHtmlS8Cd]{Bullet Dancer Stance} action. Whenever your proficiency in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you gain that new proficiency with bayonets, reinforced stocks, simple firearms and unarmed attacks.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.5nd8ON2kFGOsCdwQ]{Bullet Dancer} dedication archetype.

Bullseye.description:
You carefully take aim before making your attack in order to avoid your foe’s concealment and cover.

On your next Strike with a thrown weapon before the end of your turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll and ignore your target’s Concealed condition, as well as the target’s lesser cover or standard cover; if the target had greater cover, they instead have only standard cover against the Strike.

Bullying Staff.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.XZwGLLgC1sIKlR1c]{Acrobata de Cajado} Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Acrobata de Cajado Requirementos Você está empunhando seu cajado.

Você pode tentar @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Empurrar} ou @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Derrubar} criaturas até dois tamanhos maiores que você. Se você tiver proficiência mestre com seu cajado, pode tentar Empurrar ou Derrubar criaturas até três tamanhos maiores que você.

(Tradução não oficial - Extinction Curse)

Burn It!.description:
O fogo o fascina. Suas magias e itens alquímicos que causem dano de fogo recebem um bônus de estado no dano igual à metade do nível da magia ou um quarto do nível do item (mínimo 1).

Você também recebe +1 de bônus de estado em qualquer dano persistente de fogo que causar
Burn It!.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder

Burning Spell.description:
You enhance your spell with elemental fire, causing it to set the target on fire.

If the next action you use is to Cast a non-cantrip Spell that deals damage at a single target, the spell deals additional @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} equal to the spell level, in addition to its other effects. This has no effect if the spell already deals persistent fire damage.

The spell gains the fire trait.

Burrow Elocutionist.description: Você reconhece os sons de criaturas do solo como seu próprio idioma peculiar. Você pode fazer perguntas, receber respostas e usar a perícia Diplomacia com animais que tenham uma Velocidade de escavação, como cães-da-pradaria, esquilos-terrestre, texugos e toupeiras. O MJ determina quais animais são considerados escavadores para esta habilidade.
Burrow Elocutionist.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Burrow Elocutionist.name: Elocucionista de Escavadores

Butterfly Blade Dedication.description:
Access Defeat a member of the Butterfly Blades in a sanctioned bout.

You become trained in Deception and Stealth; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. Whenever your proficiency rank in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you also gain that new proficiency rank with butterfly swords. You gain access to butterfly swords.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.vKuJVojicBmNsL1C]{Butterfly Blade} archetype.

Butterfly's Sting.description: You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.j1JE61quDxdge4mg]{Sneak Attack} class feature. You don't increase the number of dice as you gain levels.

Cackle.description: You can extend one of your spells with a quick burst of laughter. You learn the Cackle hex. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
Cackle.name: Cackle

Cadence Call.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MYzRfNExDYp25rro]{Marshal Dedication}

Frequency once per minute

You call out a quick cadence, guiding your allies into a more efficient rhythm.

Each willing ally within your marshal’s aura is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} until the end of their next turn, and they can use the extra action only to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Stride}.

At the end of each ally’s turn, if they used the extra action, they then become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} 1 until the end of their following turn.

Calaca's Showstopper.description:
Frequency once per day

You've spent many an evening learning songs and tales featuring calacas, death's wandering minstrels. You dramatically unleash a stunning blast of sound by smashing an instrument you hold or belting out a discordant note. This has the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.BilnTGuXrof9Dt9D]{Synaptic Pulse}, but the effect is auditory rather than mental. The DC is either your @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)]{class or spell DC}, whichever is higher.

Calculated Splash.description: Você calcula todos os ângulos para maximizar o respingo de uma bomba. Quando arremessar uma bomba alquímica com o traço respingo, você pode alterar o dano de respingo causado para que seja igual ao seu modificador de Inteligência (mínimo 0) em vez da quantidade normal de dano de respingo.
Calculated Splash.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Calculated Splash.name: Respingo Calculado

Call And Response.description:
Your composition takes the form of a call-and-response chant, which lets your allies continue the effect without you.

If your next action is to cast a composition cantrip with a duration of 1 round, it becomes a call.

While the spell is active, one ally affected by the spell can respond to your call as a single action that has the auditory and concentrate traits to extend the spell’s duration by 1 round. Only one ally can respond to a given call, and responding to the ally’s response has no additional effect.

Call Bonded Item.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.au0lwQ1nAcNQwcGh]{Arcane Bond}

You’re mystically connected to your bonded item and can call it to your hand. If your bonded item is 1 Bulk or less, you teleport your bonded item into your hand from up to 1 mile away.

Call Gun.description: You build a powerful magical connection with a chosen gun or crossbow, gaining the ability to conjure it directly to your hand from any distant location. During your daily preparations, choose a single crossbow or firearm. Until your next daily preparations, you can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ESMIHOOahLQoqxW1]{Call Gun} action to call the gun to your hand.
Call Gun.name: Call Gun (Guns & Gears)

Call Implement.description:
Requirements You have a free hand.

You can tug on the bonds of ownership between yourself and your implement, causing it to find its way back to you. You look down and find that your implement has mysteriously appeared in your free hand, as long as the implement was within 1 mile and on the same plane of existence. If your implement is attended by another creature, that creature can prevent the implement from teleporting away if it succeeds at a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.thaumaturge.value)] save against your class DC. If the creature succeeds, you can't attempt to Call that Implement again; you must track the creature down to get the implement back.

Call Of The Green Man.description: You can call forth nearby nature spirits to augment your body. Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form} as a 5th-level primal innate spell. When you reach 17th level, this spell can be heightened to 6th level.

Call Your Shot.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KrYvJ5n06yHCipCZ]{Play To The Crowd}

When you successfully Play to the Crowd, add the following to the list of benefits you can choose from:

  • Choose a creature within 30 feet that can see you to become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 1. This effect has the emotion, fear, mental, and visual traits.

Call of Elysium.description:
The wild wonder of Elysium harmonizes within you, and in dire straits, you can share its benefits with your allies.

Your Speed increases by 5 feet; the Speed increase from this feat isn't cumulative with any Speed increase from your ancestry feats (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.kCO4r8NOm8E2T3eH]{Nimble Elf}).

Allies who begin their turn in combat adjacent to you gain a +5-foot status bonus to their Speed for the round.

Call of the Wild.description: Você chama as criaturas da natureza para lhe ajudar. Você pode gastar 10 minutos comungando com a natureza para substituir uma das magias que tenha preparada em um de seus espaços de magia de druida por uma magia convocar animal ou convocar plantas e fungos do mesmo nível.
Call of the Wild.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Call of the Wild.name: Chamado dos Ermos

Called.description:
You have heard the Call, and in constantly resisting that persistent demand, you’ve developed a mental bulwark against effects that would target your mind.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saving throws against mental effects. If you roll a success on your saving throw against a mental effect that would make you Controlled, you get a critical success instead.

Called Shot.description:
You target a specific area of your foe's anatomy to debilitating effect. Declare a part of your foe's anatomy to target and make a ranged weapon Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the target takes one of the following effects, based on the body part you targeted. The GM should use the stated effects as a guideline when attacking creatures with stranger anatomy-for instance, applying the “arms” effect to a creature's tentacles if those are what the creature uses to attack.

  • Arms The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} until the end of your next turn. On a critical hit, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute.
  • Head The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} until the end of your next turn. On a critical hit, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 minute.
  • Legs The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the end of your next turn. On a critical hit, it also takes a -5-foot penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute.
  • Wings If the target is flying using its wings, it immediately falls 20 feet, or 40 feet on a critical hit. The fall is gradual enough that if the target hits the ground, it takes no damage from the fall.

Callow May.description:
You are among the most common of changelings—those born to green hags—and a vibrant green eye signifies that parentage. Your mother’s manipulative nature and versatile voice gives you an edge when deceiving others.

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.B6HbYsLBWb1RR6Fx]{Charming Liar} skill feat. If you roll Deception for initiative, foes in that combat encounter that haven’t acted yet are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against you.

Camouflage.description:
Pré-Requisitos mestre em Furtividade

Você altera sua aparência para camuflar-se aos ermos. Em terreno natural, você pode se Esgueirar mesmo se estiver sendo observado.
Camouflage.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Camouflage.name: Camuflagem

Can't Fall Here.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger An adjacent and willing ally would be reduced to 0 HP but not killed.

You physically help an ally remain standing and encourage them to push through their pain against dire odds. Your ally doesn't fall unconscious and remains at 1 Hit Point. The ally also gains a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level that last for 1 minute. Fighting onward with such an injury isn't without consequence; your ally's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} condition increases by 1.

Can't You See?.description: The eye rebels, the mind recoils-no matter how much those who can see you try to explain what's there, their friends' gazes just skitter over you, like a bird afraid to land. A character who attempts to Point Out your location must attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:14]. If they fail, their allies misunderstand them and aren't sure where you are. On a critical failure, their allies think they pointed you out in a different location entirely, chosen by the GM. Similarly, when a creature critically fails to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} you while you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to or undetected by it, it thinks you're in a different location chosen by the GM. In either case, you appear to be hidden to a creature that thinks you're in a different location, though you're actually undetected by it for targeting and further uses of the Seek action.

Canny Acumen.description: Sua capacidade de evitar ou perceber ameaças está além do comum para a maioria das pessoas em sua profissão. Escolha entre Percepção ou um único tipo de salvamento (Fortitude, Reflexos ou Vontade). Você se torna especialista na característica escolhida. No 17º nível, você se torna mestre na característica escolhida.
Canny Acumen.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Canny Acumen.name: Perspicácia Astuta

Cantorian Rejuvenation.description:
Frequency once per day

The life-giving energy that flows in your blood revitalizes you. You recover [[/r 4d6[healing]]]{4d6 Hit Points} and gain 10 temporary Hit Points for 1 minute. When you reach 15th level, you instead recover [[/r 6d6[healing]]]{6d6 Hit Points} and gain 15 temporary HP.

Cantorian Restoration.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger A living creature within 60 feet would die.

The energy that flows in your blood can save a life in the direst of times. The triggering creature receives the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Hnc7eGi7vyZenAIm]{Breath of Life}, except they recover a number of Hit Points equal to [[/r (6d8+@actor.abilities.con.mod)[healing]]]{6d8 plus your Constitution modifier}.

Cantrip Expansion.description: O estudo aumenta sua gama de magias simples. Adicione dois truques mágicos de sua lista de magias ao seu repertório de magias.
Cantrip Expansion.name: Expansão de Truque Mágico

Cantrip Expansion (Prepared Caster).source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder

Cantrip Expansion (Spontaneous Caster).source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder

Captivating Curiosity.description: You can snare the attentions of onlookers with your unique appearance. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IihxWhRfpsBgQ5jS]{Enthrall} as a 3rd-level occult innate spell once per day.

Captivating Intensity.source: Pathfinder Profecias Perdidas: O Grande Bazar

Captivator Dedication.description:
Your ability to captivate others borders on the preternatural. You are seldom at a loss in social situations, and you can create minor enchantments or illusions. Choose Deception or Diplomacy. You become trained in that skill, or become an expert if you were already trained.

Choose two cantrips from the occult list; each cantrip must be from either the enchantment or illusion school. You gain access to the Cast a Spell activity and can cast these spells as occult innate spells. You're trained in occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs. If you have a hand free, you can usually replace material components with somatic components, so you don't need to use a spell component pouch. Your key spellcasting ability for these spells is Charisma.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.b7oePIMEMdFFS5TH]{Captivator} archetype.
Captivator Dedication.source: Pathfinder Profecias Perdidas: O Grande Bazar

Caravan Leader.description:
Prerequisites Constitution 18, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.38uOVS8fLZxraUrg]{Pick Up The Pace}

You know how to get the most effort out of your allies on the road.

When @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JuqmIAnkL9hVGai8]{Hustling} in a group during exploration mode, your group can Hustle for as long as the member who could Hustle longest on their own, plus an additional 20 minutes beyond that.

Careful Explorer.description:
Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Agente Pathfinder

Você explorou tumbas empoeiradas e cofres escondidos o suficiente para desenvolver um sexto sentido sobre armadilhas, e às vezes as nota mesmo se não estiver tentado fazê-lo. Mesmo se não estiver Procurando no modo de exploração, você pode realizar um teste para encontrar armadilhas que normalmente requerem que você as Procure. Você ainda precisa atender a quaisquer outros requerimentos para encontrar a armadilha.
Careful Explorer.name: Explorador Cauteloso

Cartwheel Dodge.description:
Requirements You aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Encumbered} or overburdened.

Trigger You succeed or critically succeed at a Reflex saving throw.

You Step up to 10 feet.

Cascade Bearer's Flexibility.description:
Frequência Uma vez por dia Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Assistente Magaambyano, Afiliação ao Portador de Cascata Requirementos Você ainda não agiu no seu turno.

Você solicita o treinamento do Portador de Cascata para ajudá-lo a ajustar um magia para a situação atual. Até o final do seu turno, você ganha um único talento metamagico da classe druida ou da classe mago que tem um requisito de nível de não mais que a metade do seu nível.

(Tradução não oficial - Lost Omens: Character Guide)
Cascade Bearer's Flexibility.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Cascade Bearer's Flexibility.name: Flexibilidade do Portador de Cascata

Cascade Bearer's Spellcasting.description:
Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Assistente Magaambyano, Afiliação ao Portador de Cascata

Seu treinamento de Portador de Cascata permite que você amplie os horizontes de suas magias de halcyon mais do que a maioria dos magaambianos, tecendo em magia espiritual. Você pode selecionar magias halcyon nas listas de magias divinas ou ocultistas, além das listas de magias arcanas ou primais, embora elas ainda sejam magias halcyon (então você escolhe quando conjura se são magias arcanas ou primais). Você ganha uma truque mágico halcyon e uma magia halcyon de 1º nível.

(Tradução não oficial - Lost Omens: Character Guide)
Cascade Bearer's Spellcasting.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Cascade Bearer's Spellcasting.name: Conjuração do Portador de Cascata

Cascade Countermeasure.description:
When in Arcane Cascade, you can make yourself resistant to magic. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rtisvvvhkpZPdgXc]{Cascade Countermeasure} conflux spell.

Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
Cascade Countermeasure.name: Cascade Countermeasure

Cast Down.description:
Pré-requisitos fonte de cura ou fonte de ferimento

A força pura de sua fé pode fazer um adversário desmoronar. Se a sua próxima ação for conjurar curar ou ferir para causar dano em uma criatura, o alvo fica prostrado se sofrer qualquer dano da magia. Se o alvo falhar criticamente em seu salvamento contra a magia, ele também sofre –3 metros de penalidade de estado em sua Velocidade por 1 minuto..
Cast Down.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Cast Down.name: Jogar ao Chão

Castigating Weapon.description:
Pré-RequisitosCastigo Sagrado

A força do castigo de sua divindade fortalece seu corpo para que você possa sobrepujar os perversos. Após causar dano a um ínfero usando a magia curar, seus Golpes com arma ou desarmados causam dano bondoso extra a ínferos igual à metade do nível da magia curar até o final de seu próximo turno. Isto é cumulativo com qualquer outro dano bondoso já causado pela arma (como de uma runa sagrada).
Castigating Weapon.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Castigating Weapon.name: Arma Castigante

Cat Fall.description:
Pré-requisitos treinado em Acrobatismo

Suas felinas acrobacias aéreas permitem que você amorteça suas quedas. Trate quedas como se fossem 3 metros mais curtas. Se for especialista em Acrobatismo, trate quedas como se fossem 7,5 metros mais curtas. Se for mestre em Acrobatismo, trate quedas como se fossem 15 metros mais curtas. Se for lendário em Acrobatismo, você sempre cai de pé e não sofre dano (independentemente da distância caída).
Cat Fall.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Cat Fall.name: Queda do Gato

Cat Nap.description:
You can briefly sleep to regain your energy quickly. Once per hour, by sleeping for 10 minutes, you can gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level that last for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.l3S9i2UWGhSO58YX]{Effect: Cat Nap}

Catch the Details.description:
You are quick at recognizing broad details about people and things around you. You are trained in Society and gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.0N8TtGSk5enoLBZ8]{Eye For Numbers} skill feat. If you would automatically become trained in Society (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

Note: If you are already trained in the skill provided by this feat, you need to manually select an alternative skill.
Catch the Details.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse

Catchy Tune.description:
You create a tune so catchy, your foes can't help but dance along. Attempt a @Check[type:performance] check against the Will DCs of all enemies in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30].

Critical Success The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speed and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}, both for 1 round.

Success The target takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speed for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target is temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Caterwaul.description:
Frequency once per day Trigger An ally within 30 feet would be reduced to 0 HP but not immediately killed.

You give a daring yowl in the face of adversity, calling your companion back from the brink of unconsciousness.

Your ally isn’t knocked out and remains at 1 Hit Point. Your ally’s @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} condition still increases by 1 as though they had been dying and recovered.

Catfolk Dance.description:
You have a habit of always being in the way when other creatures attempt to move. Attempt an Acrobatics check against an adjacent creature's Reflex DC.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.5bEnBqVOgdp4gROP]{Effect: Catfolk Dance}

Critical Success The target creature gains a -2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the start of your next turn.

Success The target creature gains a -2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves until the start of your next turn.

Catfolk Lore.description:
Growing up among catfolk has taught you the traditional values of freedom to travel, stewardship of the land, and quick reactions when your curiosity lands you in trouble.

You gain the trained proficiency rank in Acrobatics and Survival. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Catfolk Lore.

Catfolk Weapon Expertise.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bEh5qUgX5eFaQwzU]{Catfolk Weapon Familiarity}

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank in all weapons you are trained in from Catfolk Weapon Familiarity.

Catfolk Weapon Familiarity.description: You favor weapons that you can use with quick, darting slashes like a cat’s claws. You are trained with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LGgvev6AV0So8tP9]{Hatchet}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zSAoyzcf3nSeZCiF]{Kama}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.TDrO7Xdyn7juFy3c]{Kukri}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.grmaV4GdoGD7sKbn]{Scimitar}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ynnBwzkzsR6B73iO]{Sickle}. In addition, you gain access to kama, kukris, and all uncommon catfolk weapons. For you, martial catfolk weapons are simple weapons and advanced catfolk weapons are martial weapons.

Catfolk Weapon Rake.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bEh5qUgX5eFaQwzU]{Catfolk Weapon Familiarity}

You know how to efficiently use weapons that rake across your enemies. Whenever you critically hit using a catfolk weapon or one of the weapons listed in Catfolk Weapon Familiarity, you apply the weapon’s critical specialization effect.

Cathartic Focus Spell.description: You learn the focus spell listed under your emotion's entry. You can cast it only while in emotional fervor. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus while you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EhLvRWFKhZ3HtrZO]{Settle Emotions}.

Cathartic Mage Dedication.description:
You've learned to harness a particular emotion and mix it into your magic. Choose an emotion to be your catharsis emotion.

If you don't already cast spells from spell slots, you learn to cast spontaneous spells and gain the Cast a Spell activity. You gain a spell repertoire with one cantrip of your choice, from a spell list of your choice. You choose this cantrip from the common spells on your chosen spell list or from other spells to which you have access on that list. You're trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for that tradition. Your key spellcasting ability for these spells is Charisma.

If you can already cast spells from spell slots, you learn one additional cantrip from your spellcasting tradition. If you're a prepared caster, you can prepare this spell in addition to your usual cantrips per day; if you're a spontaneous caster, you add this cantrip to your spell repertoire.

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2424g94rpoiN1IPh]{Catharsis} reaction and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EhLvRWFKhZ3HtrZO]{Settle Emotions} activity.

Emotional States:

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.MizJPiKnopfpGmvw]{Catharsis Emotion (Anger)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.rgLaxC3I2L7HSPNn]{Catharsis Emotion (Awe)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.eNFYMQMS2BszErCX]{Catharsis Emotion (Dedication)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.7PutMrgKIaAeKBuU]{Catharsis Emotion (Fear)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.S4uY5ap2yhDRqhd0]{Catharsis Emotion (Hatred)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.zFY2PlJTObXpcQW4]{Catharsis Emotion (Joy)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.lDjKVZ48zbqQf3CU]{Catharsis Emotion (Love)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.jklanV9AbZDnZHaD]{Catharsis Emotion (Misery)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.ccrTv2j7eplr2JU8]{Catharsis Emotion (Pride)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.T9gUmwghw16itUAO]{Catharsis Emotion (Remorse)}

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.EWiUv3UiR3RHSGlA]{Cathartic Mage} archetype.

Catrina's Presence.description: You've adopted the calming presence of catrinas, the festive dead; you might have even danced with a catrina yourself! So long as you are visibly carrying fresh flowers or colorful ribbons somewhere on your person, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.b515AZlB0sridKSq]{Calm Emotions} twice per day as a 2nd-level divine innate spell.

Cauldron.description:
You can use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Craft} activity to create oils and potions.

You immediately gain the formulas for four common 1st-level oils or potions. At 4th level and every 2 levels beyond that, you gain the formula for a common oil or potion of that level or lower (a 4th-level potion if you’re 4th level, a 6th-level potion if you’re 6th level, and so on).

If you have a familiar, you can have your familiar learn these formulas rather than storing them in a formula book. Your familiar can learn new formulas in the same way it learns new spells, and these formulas are transferred from a slain familiar to a new familiar in the same way spells are.

You can brew a great deal of magic within your cauldron. When you Craft a batch of oils or potions, you can make up to six in a batch instead of the usual four per batch.

Cautious Curiosity.description:
Prerequisites at least one arcane or occult innate spell gained from a gnome heritage or gnome ancestry feat

You’ve learned a few magical techniques for getting yourself both into and out of trouble unnoticed. You gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.c2bTWBNO1BYX4Zfg]{Misdirection} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{Silence} as 2nd-level arcane or occult innate spells.

The tradition of these spells must match the tradition you use for your gnome ancestry options. You can cast each spell once per day and can target only yourself.

Cautious Delver.source: Presságios Perdidos - Guia da Sociedade Pathfinder

Cavalier Dedication.description:
Prerequisites trained in Nature or Society

You gain a young animal companion (Core Rulebook 214) that serves as your mount. You can choose from animal companions with the mount special ability, as well as any additional options from your pledge, as determined by your GM. You must choose an animal companion that’s at least one size larger than you, but if the animal usually starts as Small, you can begin with a Medium version of that animal (changing no statistics other than its size).

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the cavalier archetype. This restriction is waived if you have pledged to the organization associated with the other dedication feat. For example, if you are pledged to a Hellknight order, you could take Hellknight dedication feats without needing to gain other feats from the cavalier archetype first.

Cavalier's Banner.description:
Requirements You have pledged your service to a specific organization or ideal (see Cavalier Pledges, below).

You fly the banner of your pledge from your mount, raising your allies' spirits. You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves and DCs against fear effects. If your banner is destroyed or removed, allies within 30 feet become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.xDT10fUWp8UStSZR]{Effect: Cavalier's Banner}

CAVALIER PLEDGES

Many cavaliers pledge themselves in service to a specific organization or individual, such as a noble family or sovereign ruler, a knightly order or another organization, or a particular ideal. A cavalier pledged to an order or ideal must uphold its edicts and is beholden to any anathema it has; for example, a cavalier pledged to the druid's animal order would be tied to that anathema, while a cavalier pledged to the church of Abadar would be held to the same standards as a cleric of that god. If you pledge yourself to an entity or cause without a stated anathema, you should work with your GM to determine the edicts and anathema associated with your pledge.

Cavaliers who have pledged themselves can gain access to certain abilities related to that pledge, such as Cavalier's Banner. If you violate the anathema of your pledge, you lose access to those feats until you benefit from an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{Atone} ritual. Changing the subject of your pledge is equivalent to retraining a class feature.

Cavalier's Charge.description:
Requirements You are riding your mount.

You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal} to order your mount to Stride twice. At any point during this movement, you can Strike one enemy within reach or within the first range increment of a ranged weapon. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll.
