Whenever you Feint with a one-handed firearm, you can choose to attempt a Performance check instead of a Deception check.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained at least two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.wMUAm1PJ1HjJ8fFU]{Pistol Phenom} archetype.

Pistol Twirl.description:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded one-handed ranged weapon.

Your quick gestures and flair for performance distract your opponent, leaving it vulnerable to your follow-up attacks. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} against an opponent within the required weapon's first range increment, rather than an opponent within melee reach. If you succeed, the foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-footed} against your melee and ranged attacks, rather than only your melee attacks. On a critical failure, you're flat-footed against the target's melee and ranged attacks, rather than only its melee attacks.

Pistolero's Challenge.description:
With a stern call, carefully chosen barb, or some other challenging declaration, you demand your foe's attention in a duel. Choose an opponent within 30 feet who you can perceive and can hear you, and make your choice of a Deception or Intimidation check against the target's Will DC. No matter the result of the check, the foe is temporarily immune to your Pistolero's Challenge until noon the next day.

You can have only one challenge in effect at a time; challenging a new opponent ends this effect on any current target. Otherwise, the effect lasts until one of you is defeated, flees, or the encounter ends.

Success Both you and the opponent gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls with Strikes made against each other. If you're a master in the skill you used for the check, the status bonus to damage rolls increases to +3, and if you're legendary, it increases to +4.

Critical Failure You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} and can't use this ability again for 1 minute.

Pitborn.description:
Your blood bears the mark of a demon, a living embodiment of sin from the fetid depths of the Abyss. Demonic power pulses through your veins and manifests in a different way for each pitborn, whether you have webbed fingers and thrive in the water, large hands capable of wrestling larger foes, or some other manifestation.

You are trained in Athletics. If you were already trained in Athletics (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

You also gain any one common 1st-level skill feat with a prerequisite of trained in Athletics, as reflects the manifestation of your Abyssal blood.

Pivot Strike.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.XZwGLLgC1sIKlR1c]{Acrobata do Cajado} Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Acrobata do Cajado Requerimentos Você está empunhando seu cajado.

Você @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Salta} e então Golpea usando seu cajado. Você ganha um bônus de circunstância por dano pelo Golpe igual ao dobro do número de dados de dano de arma. Independentemente de seu Golpe atingir, você pode tentar @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Empurrar} ou @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Derrubar} o alvo.

(Tradução não oficial - Extinction Curse livro 1)
Pivot Strike.name: Golpe de Pivô

Planar Survival.description:
Pré-requisitos mestre em Sobrevivência

Você pode Subsistir utilizando Sobrevivência em planos diferentes, mesmo naqueles sem os recursos ou fenômenos naturais normalmente necessários. Por exemplo: você pode forragear por comida até mesmo em planos que não tenham.
Planar Survival.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Planar Survival.name: Sobrevivência Planar

Plant Evidence.description:
Prerequisites Pickpocket

You can put a single item you’re holding of light or negligible Bulk onto a person without them noticing by succeeding at a Thievery check against their Perception DC.

If you have the ruffian racket, you can do this as a free action when you successfully Shove a target.

Plant Shape.description:
Pré-requisitosordem da folha ou Aspecto Selvagem

Você assume a forma de uma criatura planta. Acrescente as formas de forma de planta à sua lista de aspecto selvagem; se não possuir aspecto selvagem, em vez disso você pode conjurar forma de planta uma vez por dia, elevada ao maior nível de magia que seja capaz de conjurar. Sempre que estiver polimorfado em outra forma usando aspecto selvagem, você adquire resistência 5 a veneno.
Plant Shape.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Plant Shape.name: Aspecto de Planta

Play Dead.description: You lie @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and pretend to be an ordinary skeleton. As long as you don't move or take any actions requiring anything other than your mind, you appear dead. To see through your ruse, another creature must succeed at a check against your Deception DC, either by Seeking or Recalling Knowledge (typically using Religion or an appropriate Lore skill). This ability doesn't work against creatures that already know you're an animate undead unless you have changed your appearance.

Play To The Crowd.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Dm0YMEvSY0qg0jA0]{Gladiator Dedication}

Trigger You reduce an enemy to 0 Hit Points during a non-trivial combat encounter with spectators.

You show off for the crowd. Attempt a Performance check; the DC is determined by the GM but is typically the standard DC for your level or the DC to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on the spectators, whichever is higher. On a success, choose one of the following benefits; on a critical success, choose two benefits:

  • A number of temporary Hit Points equal to your character level; these last for 1 minute.
  • A +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.
  • A +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll before the end of your next turn.

Plentiful Snares.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4MUbwilvb9dI0X59]{Snarecrafter Dedication}

You can prepare incredible numbers of snares each day out of simple ingredients. Double the number of prepared snares granted by Snarecrafter Dedication.

Plot The Future.description:
You spend 10 minutes in contemplation to uncannily predict how events will play out. Choose a particular goal or activity you plan to engage in within 1 week, or an event you expect might happen within 1 week. You analyze whether it’s likely to come to pass, learning whether it’s highly likely, somewhat likely, somewhat unlikely, or highly unlikely. You also gain a piece of advice suggesting a course of action you or your allies could take that might make the chosen event more or less likely, whichever you prefer.

The GM determines the likeliness of the event and the piece of advice you learn.

Point-Blank Shot.description:
Requisitos Você está empunhando uma arma à distância.

Você mira para acertar rapidamente os seus inimigos próximos. Quando usar uma arma à distância de saraivada enquanto estiver nesta postura, você não sofre a penalidade do traço saraivada em suas rolagens de ataque. Quando usar uma arma à distância que não possui o traço saraivada, você recebe +2 de bônus de circunstância nas rolagens de dano de ataques realizados contra alvos dentro do primeiro incremento de distância da arma.
Point-Blank Shot.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Point-Blank Shot.name: Tiro à Queima Roupa

Poison Coat.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.y7DDs03GtDnmhxFp]{Poisoner Dedication}

Trigger A creature adjacent to you hits you with a melee unarmed @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike}.

Requirements You have prepared your clothing to poison attackers (see below).

In nature, certain animals are covered in venomous spines, such that even touching them is deadly.

To use this reaction, you must have brushed poison onto your clothing or woven sharp poisoned needles into the garment’s fabric. This takes 10 minutes and uses one dose of contact or injury poison. You can have only one such poison suffused into your clothing at a time.

When you use this reaction, the triggering creature is exposed to the suffused poison.

Poison Resistance.description:
(Alquimista) A exposição constante a reagentes tóxicos fortificou seu corpo contra venenos de todos os tipos.

(Druida)Sua afinidade com o mundo natural lhe concede proteção contra alguns de seus perigos.

Você recebe resistência a veneno igual à metade de seu nível, e recebe +1 de bônus de estado em jogadas de salvamento contra venenos.
Poison Resistance.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Poison Resistance.name: Resistência a Veneno

Poison Weapon.description:
Requisitos Você está empunhando uma arma cortante ou perfurante.

Você aplica um veneno à arma requerida; se não estiver segurando um veneno mas tiver uma mão livre, você pode Interagir para pegar um veneno como parte desta ação. Se seu próximo ataque com essa arma antes de seu próximo turno acertar e causar dano, aplique os efeitos do veneno (desde que esse veneno possa ser transmitido por contato ou ferimento). Se você falhar criticamente na rolagem de ataque, o veneno é desperdiçado normalmente.

Especial: Durante suas preparações diárias, você pode preparar uma quantidade de venenos de ferimento simples igual ao seu nível de ladino. Estes venenos causam 1d4 de dano de veneno. Somente você pode aplicar estes venenos apropriadamente, e eles expiram na próxima vez que você fizer suas preparações.
Poison Weapon.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Poison Weapon.name: Envenenar Arma

Poisoner Dedication.description:
Prerequisites trained in Crafting

You make a point of always having a few toxins near at hand—you never know when some arsenic or the like might prove useful.

You gain the basic alchemy benefits (page 150), though they can be used only for alchemical poisons. You gain batches of infused reagents per day equal to your level. Your advanced alchemy level for creating these is 1 and doesn’t increase on its own.

Special You can’t select another dedication feat until you have gained at least two other feats from the poisoner archetype.

Poisoner's Twist.description:
Requirements Your last action was a successful melee Strike that dealt damage against a target that is afflicted by a poison, and you know which poison.

Poisons attack specific parts of the body-one venom might target the lungs, another the circulatory system, while another deteriorates the nerves. You know how to take advantage of such weaknesses.

You deal [[/r {1d6}]]{1d6 damage} damage of the required Strike's damage type and [[/r 1d6[poison]]] damage to the target. If you're at least 18th level, you deal [[/r 2d6]]{2d6 damage of each type}.

Portentous Spell.description:
Your spellcasting is rife with strange lights, esoteric gestures, and other captivating effects that befuddle your foes.

If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell, any creature that attempts to use a reaction triggered by your Cast a Spell activity takes a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and skill checks rolled as part of the reaction.

In addition, if the spell includes a spell attack roll or requires a saving throw, creatures you hit or that fail their saves are Fascinated with you until the start of your next turn.

Positioning Assault.description:
Requerimentos Você está empunhando uma arma corpo a corpo de duas mãos e seu alvo está em seu alcance.

Com golpes punitivos, você força seu oponente para uma posição. Faça um Golpe com a arma requerida. Se acertar, você move o alvo 1,5 metros para um espaço em seu alcance. Isto segue as regras de movimento forçado encontradas na página 475.
Positioning Assault.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Positioning Assault.name: Ataque de Posicionamento

Positive Luminance.description: You learn how to create a luminous reservoir of positive energy that you can use to punish undead who dare attack you. You gain the domain spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8XuNn0h0rHE24m3B]{Positive Luminance}. It costs 1 Focus Point to cast a focus spell. This feat grants a focus pool of 1 Focus Point that you can recover using the Refocus activity.
Positive Luminance.name: Luminância Positiva

Posse.description:
Requirements You have designated prey with @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey}.

By spending 1 minute giving guidance to help hunt down your prey, you instruct up to five willing creatures to assist you. They gain a +1 circumstance bonus to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} your prey, to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} your prey, and to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{Gather Information} about your prey. You and the creatures assisting you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls when entering combat with your prey.

This benefit lasts until you designate a new prey or your prey dies, whichever comes first. An individual creature assisting you loses this benefit if they’re out of your presence for too long to benefit from your instructions. This is usually 1 hour, but is determined by the GM.

Potent Poisoner.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7JK2a1D3VeWDcObo]{Powerful Alchemy}

By concentrating your poisons’ toxic components, you make them harder for victims to resist. When you craft an alchemical item with the poison trait by any means, the DC is increased by up to 4, to a maximum of your class DC.
Potent Poisoner.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder

Poultice Preparation.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5CRt5Dy9eLv5LpRF]{Herbalist Dedication}

When you create an herbal elixir, you can prepare it as a poultice instead. A poultice gains the oil trait (but remains alchemical, not magical) and loses the elixir and ingested traits. You can apply a poultice by @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interacting} with one hand.

When you apply a poultice, in addition to the item's normal effects, the recipient can attempt an immediate flat check to recover from a single source of persistent acid, bleed, or fire damage, with the DC reduction from appropriate assistance.

Powder Punch Stance.description:
Access You're from Alkenstar or the Mana Wastes.

You infuse your handwraps with black powder. On your first melee Strike each round with an unarmed attack, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.dgXjUcaoQDAY6ZpO]{Knuckle Duster}, or @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.8eGV6fXbmt2v74uB]{Black Powder Knuckle Dusters}, you deal an additional 1 fire Damage. If you critically succeed at an attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} while in this stance, the target is pushed back an additional 5 feet.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.kDTiRg9vVOYNnTyr]{Stance: Powder Punch Stance}

Power Attack.description: Você desfere um ataque particularmente poderoso que atinge seu adversário com uma enorme força mas lhe deixa um pouco instável. Faça um Golpe corpo a corpo. Um Ataque Poderoso conta como dois ataques para calcular sua penalidade por ataques múltiplos. Se este Golpe acertar, você causa um dado de dano extra da arma. Se você for pelo menos de 10º nível, aumente o dano extra para dois dados de dano da arma e, se for pelo menos de 18º nível, aumente o dano extra para três dados de dano da arma.
Power Attack.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder

Power Slide.description:
Requirements You are piloting a vehicle.

You throw the vehicle into a barely controlled skid, turning sharply to evade pursuit or bring your weapons to bear. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.uS3qDAgOkZ7b8ERL]{Drive} with a -2 penalty to your piloting check, gaining the effects of the Drive action for the same number of actions you spent to Power Slide. At the end of the movement, if you succeed, you can turn the vehicle up to 90 degrees. If you critically succeed at your piloting check, you can instead turn the vehicle up to 180 degrees.

Powerful Guts.description: Your stomach is particularly durable. When you succeed at a Fortitude save to reduce your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} value, you reduce it by 2 (or by 3 on a critical success).

Powerful Leap.description:
Pré-requisitos especialista em Atletismo

Quando Saltar, você pode saltar até 1,5 metros em um Salto vertical e também aumenta a distância que pode saltar horizontalmente em 1,5 metros.
Powerful Leap.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Powerful Leap.name: Salto Poderoso

Powerful Shove.description:
Pré-requisitos Bloqueio Agressivo ou Empurrão Brutal

Você pode empurrar adversários maiores com seu ataque. Você pode usar Bloqueio Agressivo ou Empurrão Brutal contra uma criatura até dois tamanhos maior que você.

Quando uma criatura que você Empurrar parar de se mover por ter atingido um objeto, ela sofre dano igual ao seu modificador de Força (mínimo 1). Isto acontece independentemente da maneira que você usou para Empurrar a criatura.
Powerful Shove.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Powerful Shove.name: Empurrão Poderoso

Powerful Snares.description:
Pré-requisitos mestre em Manufatura, Especialista em Arapuca

Suas arapucas são particularmente difíceis de evitar. Quando você armar uma arapuca, a CD da jogada de salvamento dela é igual.
Powerful Snares.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Powerful Snares.name: Arapucas Poderosas

Powerful Sneak.description: Você aprendeu a explorar as defesas baixas de seus inimigos. Quando obtiver sucesso ou um sucesso crítico em um Golpe usando seu modificador de Força na rolagem de ataque e for causar dano de ataque furtivo, você pode trocar o dano adicional do ataque furtivo para dano comum do mesmo tipo que seu Golpe, em vez de dano de precisão.
Powerful Sneak.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Powerful Sneak.name: Furtivo Poderoso

Practiced Defender.source: Presságios Perdidos - Guia da Sociedade Pathfinder

Practiced Guidance.description:
Arquétipo Lavrador da Campânula

Pré-requisitos Dedicação da Campânula

Levar outrem até a segurança pode ser assustador, mas você possui muita prática em ajudar os outros ao longo do caminho. Quando rolar um sucesso para Auxiliar um membro da sua colheita, trate o resultado como um sucesso crítico.
Practiced Guidance.name: Orientação Prática

Practiced Opposition.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Practiced Paddler.description:
Pré-requisitos remador shoony

Você é bem treinado em navegar por pântanos e brejos, mesmo para um remador shoony. Você ganha velocidade de nado de 4,5 metros.
Practiced Paddler.name: Remador Praticante

Prairie Rider.description: You grew up riding your clan’s shaggy ponies and riding dogs. You become trained in Nature. If you would automatically become trained in Nature (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also get a +1 circumstance bonus to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal} if the target is a traditional halfling mount, such as a pony or riding dog.

Prayer Attack.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UuPZ7drPBnSmI8Eo]{Red Mantis Assassin Dedication}

Requirements You are wielding a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.wkzxLpSe7LN6c5Ld]{Sawtooth Saber} in each hand.

You’ve mastered the signature assassination style of the Red Mantis. Attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} an enemy within 30 feet. If your Feint is successful, when you use Prayer Attack on subsequent turns you automatically make the target flat-footed against your melee attacks for that turn without rolling a check to Feint, so as long as you remain visible to the target and the target remains within 30 feet of you. If you use your Prayer Attack against a different target, you must attempt to Feint the target normally.

When you use Prayer Attack, your next successful Strike with a sawtooth saber that turn deals 2d6 persistent bleed damage to the target.

Prayer-Touched Weapon.description:
Frequency once per turn

Requirements Your most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip divine spell.

You coat a weapon you're wielding in prayers and the divine power given to you by your deity. Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an extra [[/r 1d6[positive]]] damage. As usual for positive damage, this damage harms only undead and creatures with negative healing.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.cA6ps8RKE0gysEWr]{Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon}
Prayer-Touched Weapon.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Precious Arrow.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.oyLkqhDGwGGj40ME]{Eldritch Archer Dedication}

You enchant a piece of ammunition with the magical essence of a precious material, allowing you to leverage certain creatures’ weaknesses.

Choose cold iron or silver; if you shoot the arrow before the end of your turn, it counts as that material. At 14th level, add adamantine to the list of materials you can choose from.

Precise Debilitations.description:
Pré-requisitos esquema de ladrão, Golpe Debilitante

Você mira cuidadosamente e desfere suas debilitações de forma graciosa. Adicione as debilitações a seguir à lista de opções disponíveis para sua escolha do Golpe Debilitante.

  • Debilitação: O alvo sofre 2d6 de dano de precisão adicional de seus ataques.
  • Debilitação: O alvo fica desprevenido.
Precise Debilitations.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Precise Debilitations.name: Debilitações Precisas

Precise Finisher.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.pyo0vmxUFIFX2GNl]{Confident Finisher}

Even when your foe avoids your Confident Finisher, you can still hit a vital spot. On a failure with Confident Finisher, you apply your full precise strike damage instead of half.

Predator's Growl.description:
Trigger You successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} a hidden or undetected creature.

You give a throaty growl to attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} a creature you just found. You don't take the -4 penalty for not sharing a language with the creature.

Predator's Pounce.description:
Pré-requisitos instinto animal

Requerimentos Você está sem armadura ou vestindo uma armadura leve.

Você encurta a distância para sua presa em um borrão de movimento, atacando a criatura antes dela perceber. Você Anda até sua Velocidade e desfere um Golpe ao final de seu movimento.
Predator's Pounce.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Predator's Pounce.name: Bote de Predador

Predatory Claws.description:
Your nails grow into sharp claws, perfect for seizing and tearing your prey. You gain a claw unarmed attack that deals 1d4 slashing damage. Your claws are in the brawling group and have the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits.

If you hit the same enemy with two consecutive claw Strikes in the same round, you can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} that same target as a free action, provided you take that action immediately after the second Strike.

Predictable!.description:
By observing an opponent, you can get a sense of their next move and prepare to counter or resist it. Choose one target and attempt a Perception check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive} against the foe’s Deception DC or a hard DC of the foe’s level, whichever is higher.

Critical Success You precisely discern the target’s strategy, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the creature until the start of your next turn and a +2 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against the creature before the start of your next turn.

Success You deduce the gist of the target’s strategy; as critical success, except the circumstance bonus is only +1.

Failure You fail to discern the target’s strategy and gain no benefit.

Critical Failure You misinterpret the target’s strategy and take a –1 circumstance penalty to AC against the creature until the start of your next turn, and a –1 circumstance penalty to your next saving throw against the creature before the start of your next turn.

Predictive Purchase (Investigator).description:
You have just the thing for the situation. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bh2jHyyYrkLMsIdX]{Prescient Planner} and @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lHFz4MmebvPqTb0A]{Prescient Consumable} feats.

When using Prescient Planner, you can pull out the item as a 2-action activity to remove your backpack (or a similar container) and draw the item, rather than taking 1 minute.

Predictive Purchase (Rogue).description:
You somehow manage to have just the thing for the situation. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bh2jHyyYrkLMsIdX]{Prescient Planner} and @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lHFz4MmebvPqTb0A]{Prescient Consumable} feats.

When using Prescient Planner, you can draw the item from your backpack (or a similar container) as a 2-action activity, instead of taking 1 minute to do so.

Preemptive Reconfiguration.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You would take bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage.

Your body anticipates the blow. The impact area briefly reorganizes into a strengthened tissue lattice that blunts the attack. You gain resistance equal to your level to the triggering damage type, which applies against the triggering damage.

If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Ewk7h9aQpKvy1RJo]{Crystalline Dust} feat, you can use Preemptive Reconfiguration without expending a usage of the reaction for the purpose of the feat's Frequency limit. Instead, the usage counts toward your number of Crystalline Dust uses per day, as if you had used that feat instead.

Premonition Of Avoidance.description:
Trigger You attempt a saving throw against a hazard, but you haven’t rolled yet.

Your deity grants you limited foresight, warning you of dangers an instant before they occur. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw.

Premonition Of Clarity.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You fail a saving throw against a mental effect.

Your deity sends you a vision of faith to steel you against mental attacks. Reroll the triggering saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus. You must use the second result, even if it’s worse.

Prepare Papers.description: You're practiced at creating forgeries that establish your outlaw credentials or augment your legal authority. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ftG89SjTSa9DYDOD]{Create Forgery} as an exploration activity. It takes you about 1 hour per page of the document that you're forging. This time is reduced to 10 minutes per page if you're legendary in Society.

Prescient Consumable.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bh2jHyyYrkLMsIdX]{Prescient Planner}

You can predict which consumables you might need in advance. When using Prescient Planner, you can procure a consumable item from your backpack, instead of a piece of adventuring gear. The consumable item must still be common with a level no higher than half your level, and its Bulk must be low enough that carrying it wouldn’t have made you encumbered.

Prescient Planner.description:
Cost the Price of the chosen item

Requirements You haven’t used this ability since the last time you were able to purchase goods.

You regularly create convoluted plans and contingencies, using your resources to enact them. You take 1 minute to remove your backpack, then carefully remove an item you hadn’t previously declared that you purchased—you intuited that you would come to need the item and purchased it at the latest opportunity.

The item must be a piece of adventuring gear (from the table on page 288 of the Core Rulebook or other sources of adventuring gear), and can’t be a weapon, armor, alchemical item, magic item, or other treasure.

It must be common with a level no higher than half your level, and its Bulk must be low enough that carrying it wouldn’t have made you encumbered.

Prevailing Position.description:
Prerequisites at least one stance feat

Trigger You are targeted by an attack or attempt a Reflex saving throw against a damaging effect, and you are in a stance.

Your willingness to flow from one stance to another lets you sacrifice their benefits to better protect yourself. You leave the stance you were in, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw or to your AC against the triggering attack.

Preventative Treatment.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Pride Hunter.description: You avoid the attention of creatures focused on your allies. You can use lesser cover from your allies to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}.

Pride in Arms.description:
Acionamento Um aliado em um raio de 9 metros leva um inimigo a 0 Pontos de Vida.

Com um grito de triunfo, você dá inspiração a uma luta de aliados. O aliado desencadeador ganha Pontos de Vida temporários iguais ao seu modificador de Constituição até o final do próximo turno.

(Tradução não oficial - Lost Omens: Character Guide)
Pride in Arms.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Pride in Arms.name: Orgulho em Armas

Primal Aegis.description: You surround yourself with a thick field of protective primal energy. You and allies within 30 feet of you gain resistance equal to your Wisdom modifier to acid, cold, electricity, fire, negative, and positive damage.

Primal Breadth.description:
Pré-requisitos Conjuração Básica de Druida

Você pode conjurar mais magias primais a cada dia. Aumente a quantidade de espaços de magia que você recebe através de talentos de arquétipo de druida em 1 para cada nível de magia (exceto pelos seus dois níveis de magia mais altos).
Primal Breadth.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Primal Breadth.name: Amplitude Primal

Primal Evolution.description:
Pré-requisitos linhagem que concede magias primais

Você pode recorrer à ajuda das criaturas dos ermos. Você recebe um espaço de magia de seu maior nível de magia, que pode usar somente para conjurar convocar animal ou convocar plantas e fungos (à sua escolha). Você pode conjurar qualquer uma destas magias usando esse espaço de magia, mesmo que ela não esteja em seu repertório de magia.
Primal Evolution.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Primal Evolution.name: Evolução Primal

Primal Focus.description: Sua conexão com a natureza é particularmente forte, e os espíritos da natureza se reúnem ao seu redor e o ajudam a recuperar seu foco. Se tiver gastado pelo menos 2 Pontos de Foco desde a última vez que Refocou, você recupera 2 Pontos de Foco ao Refocar (em vez de recuperar somente 1 ponto).
Primal Focus.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Primal Focus.name: Foco Primal

Primal Rampage.description: You tap into the unstoppable, primeval strength of your ancient kin. You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{Stoneskin} as 4th-level primal innate spells that you can cast once per day. As a 3-action activity, you can Cast a Spell twice to cast both of these innate spells, as long as they are both still available for the day.

Primal Summons.description:
Pré-requisitos Chamado dos Ermos

Sempre que convocar um aliado, você pode potencializá-lo com o poder elemental da água, ar, fogo ou terra. Você recebe a magia de ordem convocações primais.
Primal Summons.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Primal Summons.name: Convocações Primais

Primal Wellspring.description:
Pré-requisitosFoco Primal

eu reservatório de Pontos de Foco é um manancial profundo. Se tiver gastado pelo menos 3 Pontos de Foco desde a última vez que Refocou, você recupera 3 Pontos de Foco ao Refocar (em vez de recuperar somente 1 ponto).
Primal Wellspring.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Primal Wellspring.name: Manancial Primal

Pristine Weapon.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qPFWEyihvbWsCcUv]{Verdant Weapon}

Your verdant weapon can cut through the resistances of magical creatures. The weapon is treated as cold iron and silver. If you critically hit a creature that has a weakness to cold iron or silver, the target takes [[/r 1d6 #persistent bleed]] persistent bleed damage as the primal energies within your weapon slow its natural healing.

Project Persona.description:
Where others etch their armor to serve as a conduit for their imaginations, your vivid mind and bold personality allow you to project a more fitting persona over your lackluster armor.

You change the shape and appearance of your armor to appear as ordinary or fine clothes of your imagining. The armor’s statistics don’t change. This effect lasts as long as you remain conscious and are wearing the armor.

A creature can disbelieve the illusion by Seeking or touching your armor. The DC equals your Will DC.

Propulsive Leap.description:
By expelling flames from your feet or levitating through electrical repulsion, you propel yourself through the air. For 1 minute, you gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater. If you aren't on solid ground at the end of your turn, you must attempt another backlash check for your deviation, though you remain airborne even if you fail your check unless the damage from the check renders you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.RU6D7pNQSBt1zSuK]{Effect: Propulsive Leap}

Awakening You blast through the air at great speed, gaining a +15-foot status bonus to your Fly speed from Propulsive Leap.

Awakening You can use your propulsion as a makeshift weapon. The first time each round you Fly starting from the ground, all creatures adjacent to you take [[/r (floor(@actor.level/2)d4)]]{1d4 damage for every 2 levels} you have, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save.

Protect Ally.source: Presságios Perdidos - Guia da Sociedade Pathfinder

Protective Claws.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse

Protective Sheath.description:
Pré-requisitos Borda do Clan

Quando você ataca com a sua @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.kJJvKm80KwWXPukV]{adaga de clã}, você mantém a bainha à mão. Quando você usa a Borda do Clan, se a mão com a qual não está segurando a adaga estiver vazia, você pode usar a bainha da adaga do clã para bloquear ataques também. O bônus de circunstância do seu CA ao desviar aumenta para +2 contra qualquer alvo que você acertar com um Golpe neste turno.

(Tradução não oficial - Lost Omens: Character Guide)
Protective Sheath.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Protective Sheath.name: Bainha de Proteção

Protective Spirit Mask.description:
Your mask carries the protective instincts of White Bull, the Horn Forger, and no one will hurt your allies while you have anything to say about it. Immediately after you Cast a non-cantrip Spell that targets only one ally, you can choose to have the spell also give that creature a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.kzSjzK72CQ67wfBH]{Effect: Protective Spirit Mask}

You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.KIU5eDZP9VyQIfas]{Protector's Interdiction} reaction.

Protective Subroutine.description: Your nanites can augment your defenses. You can choose to activate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.JS24EjgLYcHB9E3T]{Nanite Surge} when you attempt a saving throw, instead of when you attempt a skill check. If you do, you gain a +2 status bonus to the triggering saving throw.

Provocator Dedication.description:
Access Successfully defeat the eberarks in the Irorium.

For you, fighting is as much about style as skill. You become trained in simple weapons, martial weapons, and one advanced weapon of your choice. When you critically succeed at an attack roll using your chosen advanced weapon, you also apply the critical specialization of that weapon. You become an expert in Performance and your choice of either Acrobatics or Athletics. If you were an expert in all three of these skills, you instead become an expert in a skill of your choice.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.XLug8rxIe1KPX6Nf]{Provocator} archetype.

Psi Burst.description:
Frequency once per round

With a passing thought, you direct violent psychic energies at a nearby creature. Target one creature within 30 feet. It takes [[/r 1d4[bludgeoning]]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)|basic:true]. At 3rd level and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d4.

[[/r (ceil(@actor.level/2)d4)[bludgeoning]]]{Leveled bludgeoning damage}

Psi Catastrophe.description: You stop holding your power back, unleashing it all in a catastrophic blast. All creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] take [[/r (@actor.level)d6[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 bludgeoning damage per level} with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.spellDC.value)|basic:true]. Your psyche subsides as your power is expended.

Psi Strikes.description:
Frequency once per turn

Requirements Your most recent action was to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} or to Unleash your Psyche.

You siphon residual psychic energies from your spell into one weapon you're wielding or one of your unarmed attacks and when you unleash your mind, the energies flare to match. The attack deals an extra [[/r 1d6[force]]] damage until the end of the current turn. If your Psyche is Unleashed, this benefit instead lasts until your psyche subsides.

Psychic Dedication.description:
You feel something awaken within your mind. You become trained in Occultism; if you were already trained in Occultism, you become trained in a skill of your choice. You cast spells like a psychic and gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} activity; as you don't have a subconscious mind, your thought components are simple intentions. Choose a conscious mind. You gain a spell repertoire with one standard psi cantrip of your choice from your conscious mind, which you cast as a psi cantrip. You gain the normal benefits and the amp for this psi cantrip, but not any other benefits from the conscious mind. If you don't have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can use to amp your psi cantrips, and you can Refocus by meditating on your new powers. If you already have a focus pool, increase the number of points in your pool by 1. You're trained in occult spell attack rolls and occult spell DCs. Your key spellcasting ability for psychic archetype spells is the ability you used to qualify for the archetype, and they are occult psychic spells.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.ygzv72IJNmjh0SPB]{Psychic} archetype.

Psychic Rapport.description:
Your telepathic sensitivity intensifies when you're affected by mental magic, making it easier for you to link to other creatures. After you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} with the mental trait, until the start of your next turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation checks, and to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Dbr5hInQXH904Ca7]{Effect: Psychic Rapport}

Psychopomp Familiar.description:
Your familiar becomes a masked psychopomp-an extraplanar guardian of the cycle of souls. This familiar continues to use all the same rules as other familiars, but one of its abilities must always be speech and it has the monitor and psychopomp traits. As normal when a familiar must always have a certain ability, the speech ability counts against your familiar's abilities each day.

You can select three familiar or master abilities each day, instead of two, but one must be one of the following psychopomp familiar abilities.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.o0fxDDUu2ZSWYDTr]{Soul Sight} Your familiar gains lifesense with a range of 30 feet.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.nrPl3Dz7fbnmas7T]{Spirit Touch} Your familiar can touch incorporeal creatures. If you have the spell delivery master ability from your familiar, any spell the familiar delivers with it gains the benefits of the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune.

Purifying Breeze.description:
Requirements Your most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip spell with the healing trait.

You transfer the divine essence of your magic to the air around you, cleansing it of toxins. Attempt a counteract check against each airborne disease or poison effect in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15]{15-foot radius} around you. Regardless of your success or failure, until the beginning of your next turn, all creatures in the purified area gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.7MQLLkQACZt8cspt]{Effect: Purifying Breeze}
Purifying Breeze.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Purifying Spell.description: You purify the water within a creature's body to cleanse them of illness. If the next action you use is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} targeting a single living creature, you can attempt to counteract a disease or poison affecting the target, in addition to the other benefits of heal. If you do, heal gains the water trait.

Push Back the Dead!.description:
You call to your ally and strengthen their resolve and abilities to defend against the horrific tricks undead bring to bear. The ally gains a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against effects originating from undead. It also gains resistance to damage from Strikes made by undead creatures equal to half your Charisma modifier.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.OeZ0E1oUKyGPxPy0]{Effect: Push Back the Dead!}
Push Back the Dead!.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Pushing Attack.description: Your eidolon has an attack that pushes away enemies. Choose one of the eidolon's unarmed attacks with the shove trait. It gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.t6cx9FOODmeZQNYl]{Push} action for that attack.

Qlippoth Magic.description: You've deeply studied the secrets of your blood and can force reality to act against its own wishes. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.3JG1t3T4mWn6vTke]{Blur} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{Silence} once per day each as 2nd-level divine innate spells.

Quadruped.source: Pathfinder Profecias Perdidas: O Grande Bazar

Quah Bond.description:
Acesso Etnia Shoanti

Você cresceu entre as tribos Shoanti, com os espíritos cuidando de você, e eles oferecem orientação. Você ganha a graduação de proficiência treinado na perícia listada para o seu quah (ou outra perícia de sua escolha, se você já foi treinado nessa perícia). Você ganha o talento de perícia @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{Certeza} nessa perícia, pois os espíritos ajudam a guiar suas ações.

  • Lyrune-Quah Religião
  • Shadde-Quah Atletismo
  • Shriikirri-Quah Natureza
  • Shundar-Quah Diplomacia
  • Sklar-Quah Intimidação
  • Skoan-Quah Medicina
  • Tamiir-Quah Acrobatismo
(Tradução não oficial - Lost Omens: Character Guide)
Quah Bond.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Quah Bond.name: Vinculo Quah

Quaking Stomp.description:
Frequência uma vez a cada 10 minutos

Você pisa no chão com tanta força que cria um pequeno terremoto (com os efeitos da magia terremoto).
Quaking Stomp.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Quaking Stomp.name: Pisão do Tremor

Quick Alchemy.description:
Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Alquimista

Você ganha a ação @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.NlEZ0piDxg9buXCL]{Alquimia Rápida}.
Quick Alchemy.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Quick Alchemy.name: Alquimia Rápida

Quick Bomber.description: Você guarda suas bombas em bolsos fáceis de alcançar de onde consegue pegá-las sem pensar. Você Interage para sacar uma bomba e Golpear com ela.
Quick Bomber.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Quick Bomber.name: Bombardeiro Rápido

Quick Change.description:
Prerequisites master in Deception, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uqIiSDbv80TbRwTQ]{Vigilante Dedication}

You can shift between your identities with ease. Instead of spending 1 minute to change your identity, you can now do so as a 3-action activity. If you are legendary in Deception, you can perform this change as a 1-action activity.

Quick Climb.description:
Pré-requisitos mestre em Atletismo

Quando Escalar, você se move 1,5 metros a mais em um sucesso e 3 metros a mais em um sucesso crítico (até o máximo de sua Velocidade).

Se for lendário em Atletismo, você recebe uma Velocidade de escalada igual à sua Velocidade.
Quick Climb.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Quick Climb.name: Escalada Rápida

Quick Coercion.description:
Pré-requisitos treinado em Intimidação

Você pode ameaçar os outros com a simples implicação de algumas escolhas. Você pode Coagir uma criatura após 1 rodada de conversa em vez de 1 minuto. Você ainda não pode Coagir uma criatura no meio do combate, ou sem engajar em uma conversa.
Quick Coercion.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Quick Coercion.name: Coerção Rápida

Quick Contacts.description:
Prerequisites expert in Society; @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iCv8KTZ5PcF4GqeV]{Connections} or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gydOsP9VsdRw3Wg1]{Underground Network}

You know where to go, who to talk to, and how to make new connections, fast. Upon entering a new settlement, spending 1 day of downtime allows you to build enough connections to make use of the Connections or Underworld Connections feats. If you’re legendary in Society, you can form the required connections within 1 hour of entering a new settlement.

Quick Disguise.description:
Pré-requisitos especialista em Dissimulação

Você pode montar um Disfarce na metade do tempo normal (geralmente 5 minutos). Se for mestre em Dissimulação, você leva um décimo do tempo normal (normalmente 1 minuto). Se for lendário, você pode criar um disfarce completo e Personificar como uma atividade de 3 ações.
Quick Disguise.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Quick Disguise.name: Disfarce Rápido

Quick Draw.description: Você saca sua arma e ataca com o mesmo movimento. Você interage para sacar uma arma, e então Golpear com essa arma.
Quick Draw.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Quick Draw.name: Saque Rápido

Quick Fix.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1t5479E6bdvFs4E7]{Talisman Dabbler Dedication}

You can attach a talisman using only a bit of glue and some string. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.x9xA8P2Vlz98He7C]{Rapid Affixture} skill feat, even if you don’t meet the prerequisites. When you use it, you can affix or remove up to four talismans in 1 minute instead of just one.

You gain the ability to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UAaQk93a30nx0nYY]{Affix a Talisman} as a 3-action activity from that feat at 12th level, regardless of your Crafting proficiency.

Quick Identification.description:
Pré-requisitos treinado em Arcanismo, Natureza, Ocultismo ou Religião

Você pode Identificar Magia rapidamente. Você leva somente 1 minuto em vez de 10 minutos quando usa Identificar Magia para determinar as propriedades de um efeito contínuo, item ou local. Se for mestre na perícia, você faz isso usando uma atividade de 3 ações e, se for lendário na perícia, usando somente 1 ação.
Quick Identification.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Quick Identification.name: Identificação Rápida

Quick Juggler.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.8vuL2hCPrcG2duLt]{Malabarista} Prerequisites especialista em Performance, Dedicação de Malabarista

Quando você começa a fazer malabares e adiciona outro item ao seu número, você adiciona dois itens ao invés de um, Aumente o número máximo de itens que você pode fazer malabares em um.

(Tradução Livre de AP 151: The Show Must Go On)
Quick Juggler.name: Malabarista Rápido

Quick Jump.description:
Pré-requisitostreinado em Atletismo

Você pode usar Salto em Altura ou Salto em Distância como uma ação única em vez de 2 ações. Se o fizer, você não realiza o Andar inicial (nem falha se não Andar 3 metros).
Quick Jump.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Quick Jump.name: Salto Rápido

Quick Mount.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5Q69PI8jdQVkb1ZT]{Cavalier Dedication}, expert in Nature

Requirements You are adjacent to a creature that is at least one size larger than you and is willing to be your mount.

You and your mount can spring into action at a moment’s notice. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PM5jvValFkbFH3TV]{Mount} the creature and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal} to issue it an order of your choice.

Quick Recognition.description:
Pré-requisitos mestre em Arcanismo, Natureza, Ocultismo ou Religião; Reconhecer Magia

Você Reconhece Magias rapidamente. Uma vez por rodada, você pode Reconhecer uma Magia utilizando uma perícia na qual você seja mestre como uma ação livre.
Quick Recognition.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Quick Recognition.name: Reconhecimento Rápido

Quick Repair.description:
Pré-requisitos treinado em Manufatura

Você leva 1 minuto para Reparar um item. Se você for mestre em Manufatura, isso leva 3 ações. Se for lendário em Manufatura, isso leva 1 ação.
Quick Repair.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Quick Repair.name: Reparo Rápido

Quick Reversal.description:
RequerimentosVocê está flanqueado por dois inimigos ou mais

Você vira o flanqueamento de seus adversários contra eles com uma reversão rápida. Faça um Golpe corpo a corpo contra um dos inimigos flanqueando e faça um segundo Golpe com a mesma arma ou ataque desarmado contra um inimigo diferente que esteja flanqueando-o. Este segundo Golpe sofre a mesma penalidade por ataques múltiplos do ataque inicial e não conta para sua penalidade por ataques múltiplos.
Quick Reversal.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Quick Reversal.name: Reversão Rápida

Quick Shape.description:
Trigger You roll initiative.

Your instincts kick in and you take on an aggressive stance. You use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.0b3TTeQGFOiy6ykz]{Change Shape} to enter your hybrid form or a new form granted by a beastkin feat.

Quick Shield Block (Champion).source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder

Quick Shield Block (Fighter).source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder

Quick Shot.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4QFElZoWjg1X0vsg]{Archer Dedication}

You draw your bow and attack with the same action. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to draw a weapon from the bow weapon group that is loaded or has reload 0, then @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} with that weapon.

Quick Snares.description:
Pré-requisitos Especialista em Manufatura, Especialista em Arapuca

Você pode armar uma arapuca em segundos. Você pode Manufaturar arapucas que normalmente levariam 1 minuto em apenas 3 ações de Interagir, mesmo se não as tiver preparado.
Quick Snares.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Quick Snares.name: Arapucas Rápidas

Quick Squeeze.description:
Pré-requisitos treinado em Acrobatismo

Você se Espreme 1,5 metros por rodada (3 metros em um sucesso crítico). Se for lendário em Acrobatismo, você se Espreme à Velocidade total.
Quick Squeeze.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Quick Squeeze.name: Espremer-se Rapidamente

Quick Stow (Ratfolk).description:
Frequency once per round

You are adept at quickly moving items into your cheek pouches. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to store one held item in your cheek pouches (provided it fits).

Quick Stow (Swordmaster).source: Presságios Perdidos - Guia da Sociedade Pathfinder

Quick Study.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lyD6eXl4wc7Pq61q]{Loremaster Dedication}

During your daily preparations, you can study a particular subject to gain the trained proficiency rank in one Lore skill of your choice. You must have interacted with that subject in some way on the previous day, whether by reading about it, talking to someone knowledgeable on the topic, or experiencing it yourself.

Alternatively, you can reference your notes to instead choose a Lore skill you’ve prepared before with Quick Study. This proficiency lasts until you prepare again. Since this proficiency is temporary, you can’t use it as a prerequisite for a skill increase or a permanent character option like a feat.

Quick Swim.description:
Pré-requisitos mestre em Atletismo

Quando Nadar, você se move 1,5 metros a mais em um sucesso e 3 metros a mais em um sucesso crítico, até o máximo de sua Velocidade.

Se for lendário em Atletismo, você recebe uma Velocidade de natação igual à sua Velocidade.
Quick Swim.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Quick Swim.name: Natação Rápida

Quick Unlock.description:
Pré-requisitos mestre em Ladroagem

Você pode Abrir uma Fechadura usando 1 ação em vez de 2.
Quick Unlock.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Quick Unlock.name: Destrancar Rapidamente

Quicken Heartbeat.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.XATPzPTZ9Je89erT]{Golem Enxertado} Frequência uma vez por turno Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Golem Enxertado

Você substituiu seu coração por feito de mercúrio e adamante vivo. Você reduz sua condição de your @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lento} por 1. Alternativamente, se você não estiver lento, você fica @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Acelerado} 1 durante seu próximo turno, você pode usar sua ação extra para andar ou golpear.
Quicken Heartbeat.name: Acelerar Batimento Cardíaco

Quickened Attunement.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements Your previous action was Attunement Shift.

If your next action is to cast a spell that would grant your terrain attunement bonus, reduce the number of actions to cast it by 1 (to a minimum of 1 action).

Special You can't use Quickened Attunement and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.z2ptq23nNBOeEI7H]{Quickened Casting} in the same round.

Quickened Casting.description:
Frequência uma vez por dia

Se a sua próxima ação for conjurar um truque mágico ou magia de classe que seja pelo menos 2 níveis inferior ao maior nível de magia que você possa conjurar, reduza em 1 a quantidade de ações para conjurá-la (mínimo de 1 ação).
Quickened Casting.name: Conjuração Acelerada

Quiet Allies.description:
Pré-requisitos especialista em Furtividade

Você é habilidoso em se mover com um grupo. Quando estiver Evitando Ser Percebido e seus aliados Seguirem o Especialista, você e esses aliados podem rolar um único teste de Furtividade utilizando o menor modificador, em vez de rolar separadamente. Isto não se aplica a rolagens de iniciativa.
Quiet Allies.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Quiet Allies.name: Aliados Quietos

Quill Spray.description:
Frequency once per day

You can launch a mass of quills at opponents. You spray quills in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30], dealing 5d8 piercing damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] saving throw against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. On a critical failure, a creature also takes 5 persistent bleed damage. At 11th level and every even level thereafter, the piercing damage increases by 1d8 and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.

[[/r ceil(@actor.level/2)d8[piercing]]]{Leveled Piercing Damage}

[[/r (ceil(@actor.level/2))[bleed]]]{Leveled Bleed Damage}

Note The feat does not specify the type of saving throw required. A reflex saving throw has been added, in line with Barbed Quills.
Quill Spray.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse

Quivering Palm.description:
Pré-requisitos magias de ki

Seus golpes podem matar adversários. Você recebe a magia de @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ovvflf5aFbmBxqq8]{Palma Vibrante}. Aumente em 1 a quantidade de Pontos de Foco em sua reserva de foco.
Quivering Palm.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Quivering Palm.name: Palma Vibrante

Radiant Blade Master.description:
Pré-requisitos aliado divino (lâmina), Espírito da Lâmina Radiante

Seu aliado divino transforma sua arma escolhida em um exímio exemplar de seu tipo. Quando escolher a arma para sua lâmina aliada durante suas preparações diárias, adicione as seguintes runas de propriedade à lista de efeitos disponíveis para sua escolha: afiada, dançarina e disruptora maior.
Radiant Blade Master.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Radiant Blade Master.name: Mestre da Lâmina Radiante

Radiant Blade Spirit.description:
Pré-requisitos aliado divino (lâmina)

Seu aliado divino irradia poder, melhorando sua arma escolhida. Quando escolher a arma para sua lâmina aliada durante suas preparações diárias, adicione as seguintes runas de propriedade à lista de efeitos disponíveis para sua escolha: flamejante e quaisquer runas de tendência (anárquica, axiomática, profana ou sagrada) correspondentes à tendência de sua causa.
Radiant Blade Spirit.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Radiant Blade Spirit.name: Espírito da Lâmina Radiante

Radiant Burst.description:
Frequency once per day

Your skin glows with intensity. Creatures within 10 feet who can see you must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round and dazzled for 4 rounds.

Critical Failure The creature is blinded for 4 rounds and dazzled for 10 minutes.

Radiant Circuitry.description:
Your biological circuitry emits light like a torch, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet). The light shuts off when you take this action again or are knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.263Cd5JMj8Lgc9yz]{Effect: Radiant Circuitry}

Radiant Infusion.description:
Prerequisites good alignment, healing font

You pour invigorating positive energy into a living ally. If the next action you use is to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} to restore Hit Points to a single living creature, the target deals an additional [[/r 1d6 #positive]] positive damage with its melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn.

If the heal spell is at least 5th level, this damage increases to [[/r 2d6 #positive]], or [[/r 3d6 #positive]] if the spell is at least 8th level.

Radiate Glory.description:
Your inherent glory radiates into the world with all the divine power of the celestial planes for 1 minute.

Any creature that can see you while you Radiate Glory must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] saving throw against your class or spell DC, whichever is higher. The creature then becomes temporarily immune to this effect for 24 hours.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to the creature for 1 round by the shining light, but can't use this concealment to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, as normal for when your location is obvious.

Failure As success, except you are concealed to the creature while your glory radiates.

Critical Failure You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to the creature while your glory radiates, lost amid the radiant corona of your presence. Your general position is still obvious, so you can't use this to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}.

Raging Athlete.description:
Pré-requisitos especialista em Atletismo

bstáculos físicos são incapazes de deter o seu furor. Enquanto estiver em fúria, você adquire Velocidade de escalada e Velocidade de natação igual à sua Velocidade em terra e diminui em 10 pontos a CD de Saltos em Altura e Saltos em Distância. Além disso, a distância de seu Salto aumenta em 1,5 metros quando saltar horizontalmente e em 60 centímetros quando saltar verticalmente.
Raging Athlete.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Raging Athlete.name: Atleta Enfurecido

Raging Intimidation.description: Seu furor enche seus adversários de medo. Enquanto estiver em fúria, suas ações Desmoralizar e Matar de Medo (da perícia Intimidação e do talento de perícia de mesmo nome, respectivamente) adquirem o traço fúria (permitindo que você as use enquanto estiver em fúria). Assim que atender aos pré-requisitos para os talentos de perícia Olhar Intimidante e Matar de Medo, você recebe estes talentos.
Raging Intimidation.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Raging Intimidation.name: Intimidação Enfurecida

Raging Thrower.description: As armas arremessadas por você se tornam especialmente mortais durante a fúria. Você aplica o dano adicional de Fúria em seus ataques com armas de arremesso. Se tiver o talento Crítico Brutal ou a característica de classe devastador, aplique seus benefícios a ataques com armas de arremesso.
Raging Thrower.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Raging Thrower.name: Arremessador Enfurecido

Rain of Bolts.description:
Frequency once per day

Throughout the day, your body produces powerful projectiles within your chassis. You fire them all at once in either a @Template[type:cone|distance:30]{30-foot cone} or a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10-foot emanation}. Foes in the area take [[/r 6d6[piercing]]] damage. This increases to [[/r 7d6[piercing]]]{7d6} at 12th level, [[/r 8d6[piercing]]]{8d6} at 15th level, and [[/r 9d6[piercing]]]{9d6} at 18th level.

Enhancement The projectiles regenerate quicker, they are much more powerful, and you can refine the metallic content to harm certain creatures. You can use Rain of Bolts once per hour instead of once per day. The damage increases to [[/r 12d6[piercing]]]{12d6} and each time you use the action, you can choose adamantine, cold iron, or silver. The damage from Rain of Bolts is treated as the metal you chose. At 20th level, the damage increases to [[/r 13d6[piercing]]]{13d6}.

Rain of Embers Stance.description:
Requerimentos Você está sem armadura.

Você entra na postura de uma fênix enfurecida, segurando seus dedos rígidos como garras mortais enquanto se movo com gestos rápidos que oscilam como chamas. Os únicos Golpes que você pode fazer são Golpes de Garras de Fogo. Eles causam [[/r 1d4]] de dano de fogo; eles pertencem ao grupo pugilato; e possuem os traços ágil, acuidade, fogo, não letal e desarmado.

Enquanto estiver na Postura da Chuva de Brasas, você ganha um bonus de estado +1 à sua CA e resistência à fogo igual a metade do seu nível (mínimo de 1).
Rain of Embers Stance.source: Presságios Perdidos - Guia da Sociedade Pathfinder
Rain of Embers Stance.name: Postura da Chuva de Brasas

Rain-Scribe Mobility.description:
Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Assistente Magaambyano, Afiliado aos Escribas

Você se cerca de um manto de magia Escriba-Chuva e anda o dobro de sua velocidade; terreno difícil não reduz sua velocidade, mesmo que seja terreno difícil manipulado por magia .Sua magia limpa o terreno difícil a cada quadrado que você entrou; até seu próximo turno, esses quadrados não são considerados terrenos difíceis para outras criaturas que entrem neles (ou são terrenos difíceis normais se eles forem anteriormente terreno difícil maior).
Rain-Scribe Mobility.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Rain-Scribe Mobility.name: Mobilidade dos Escribas da Chuva

Rain-Scribe Sustenance.description:
Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Assistente Magaambyano, afiliação aos Escribas da Chuva

Você usa o poder da sua magia de Escriba da Chuva para extrair energia para seu sustento através de um fluxo de poder primal. Você não precisa comer ou beber e precis ade apenas 6 horas de sono para se sentir bem descansado. Você ainda precisa descansar pelo menos 8 horas e gastar uma hora de preparações para recuperar os recursos usáveis somente uma quantidade limitada de vezes por dia, como espaços de magia.

Você pode extrair poder primal para ficar acordado e alerta ao invés de descansar seu corpo e mente, ganhando os benefícios completos de um descanso de 8 horas sem cair no sono. Quando o fizer, você perde os benefícios de Sustentação do Escriba da Chuva por uma semana enquanto a energia primal se recarregar.
Rain-Scribe Sustenance.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Rain-Scribe Sustenance.name: Sustento do Escriba da Chuva

Raise a Tome.description:
Requirements You're holding a book.

You raise up the book you're holding and flip it open to defend yourself and expedite your studies. The book remains raised until the start of your next turn. While you have a book raised, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and a +1 circumstance bonus to Recall Knowledge to identify creatures using a skill related to the subject of the book (Arcana if you're using your spellbook). This bonus is in addition to any item bonus the book normally gives to the check.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block}, you can use the tome for that feat (Hardness 3, HP 12, BT 6) as though it were a shield. Whenever you use an ability that allows you to Raise a Shield, such as Emergency Targe, you can Raise a Tome instead, changing any requirements that normally require a shield to apply to your book.

Rakshasa Magic.description: You remember the secrets of your rakshasa forebears and know how to apply those memories to get results. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2qGqa33E4GPUCbMV]{Humanoid Form} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.f8SBoXiXQjlCKqly]{Illusory Creature} once per day each as 2nd-level divine innate spells.

Rallying Charge.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MYzRfNExDYp25rro]{Marshal Dedication}

Your fearless charge into battle reinvigorates your allies to carry on the fight.

You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Stride} up to your Speed and make a melee @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike}. If your Strike hits and damages an enemy, each ally within 60 feet who saw you hit gains temporary Hit Points equal to your Charisma modifier. These temporary Hit Points last until the start of your next turn.

Rallying Cry.description:
Frequency once per day

You call out to your allies and push them to give their all in combat. All allies within 30 feet that can hear you gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level. In addition, these allies become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 minute but can only use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.

Rampaging Ferocity.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PlhPpdwIV0rIAJ8K]{Orc Ferocity}

Trigger You use Orc Ferocity.

You lash out viciously even as you fend off death. Make a single melee Strike. If this Strike brings a foe to 0 Hit Points, this activation of Orc Ferocity doesn’t count against its frequency.
Rampaging Ferocity.name: Ferocidade Avassaladora

Rampaging Form.description:
Once per day, when you Change Shape into a fox, you can instead gain the effects of both the canine form of 5th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Animal Form} and 7th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.XS7Wyh5YC0NWeWyB]{Fiery Body} for 1 minute or until you shift back, whichever comes first. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame} from the fiery body effect even though you're in a battle form.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.DWrsDJte9sez0Ppi]{Effect: Rampaging Form}

Special If you are a frozen wind kitsune, your form is ice instead of fire. This changes the immunity and damage from the fiery body effect to cold, changes the weakness to fire, and changes produce flame to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.WRe8qbemruWxkN8d]{Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kitsune)}

Ranged Disarm.description:
Requirements You're wielding a simple firearm.

When using a simple firearm, you can shoot objects right out of your enemy's hands. Attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} the target using a ranged attack roll with your simple firearm, instead of attempting an Athletics check against the target's Reflex DC.

Ranged Reprisal.description:
Pré-requisitos causa de paladino

Você pode usar Golpe Retributivo com uma arma à distância. Além disso, se o adversário que acionou sua reação estiver a 1,5 metros além de seu alcance (mas não dentro de seu alcance), você pode Dar um Passo como parte de sua reação para colocar o adversário em seu alcance antes de realizar um Golpe Retributivo corpo a corpo.
Ranged Reprisal.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Ranged Reprisal.name: Represália à Distância

Ranger Dedication.description:
Pré-requisitos Destreza 14

Você se torna treinado em Sobrevivência; se já for treinado em Sobrevivência, em vez disso você se torna treinado em outra perícia à sua escolha. Você se torna treinado na CD de classe de patrulheiro..

Você pode usar a ação @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Caçar Presa}.

Especial Você não pode selecionar outro talento de dedicação até ter recebido dois outros talentos do arquétipo de patrulheiro.
Ranger Dedication.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Ranger Dedication.name: Dedicação de Patrulheiro

Ranger Resiliency.description:
Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Patrulheiro, sua classe concede no máximo uma quantidade de Pontos de Vida por nível igual a 8 + seu modificador de Constituição.

Você recebe 3 Pontos de Vida adicionais para cada talento de classe do arquétipo de patrulheiro que possuir. Conforme continuar selecionando talentos de classe de arquétipo de patrulheiro, você continuará a receber Pontos de Vida desta forma.
Ranger Resiliency.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Ranger Resiliency.name: Resiliência de Patrulheiro

Ranger's Bramble.description: You can cause plants to grow and trap your foes with thorns. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.KktHf7zIAWOr499h]{Ranger's Bramble} warden spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
Ranger's Bramble.name: Ranger's Bramble

Rapid Affixture.description:
Prerequisites master in Crafting

You take only 1 minute to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UAaQk93a30nx0nYY]{Affix a Talisman}. If you’re legendary in Crafting, you can Affix a Talisman as a 3-action activity.

Rapid Mantel.description:
Pré-requisitos especialista em Atletismo

Você pode facilmente se erguer de beiradas. Quando Segurar numa Beirada, você pode se erguer até a superfície e se levantar. Você pode utilizar Atletismo em vez de Reflexos para Segurar numa Beirada.
Rapid Mantel.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Rapid Mantel.name: Segurar-se Rapidamente

Rapid Response.description:
Trigger An ally is reduced to 0 Hit Points.

You work quickly and efficiently in times of danger to deliver needed assistance. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Stride} towards the triggering ally. You gain a +10-foot circumstance bonus to your Speed during this movement.

Rat Familiar.description: You have a pet rat that has become magically bonded to you. You gain a familiar using the rules on page 217 of the Core Rulebook, and this familiar must be a rat. It still gets the benefits of familiar abilities, but its base form remains a rat.

Rat Form.description: You can transform into an innocuous-looking rat to scout an area or slip through tight spaces. You gain the effects of a 1st-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form} spell, except that you must assume the battle form of a Tiny rat.

Rat Magic.description: There always seems to be a little rat around to carry messages for you. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yhz9fF69uwRhnHix]{Animal Messenger} once per day as a primal innate spell. When you do, the animal that responds is always a rat. If there are no rats within range, the spell is lost.

Ratfolk Growth.description: You call upon the familial bonds you share with other ysoki to defend them in battle. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} as a 6th-level primal innate spell once per day. You can target only yourself and other ratfolk with this spell.

Ratfolk Lore.description:
Years of experience among ratfolk communities have made you nimble, and you’ve learned to run and hide when enemies threaten.

You gain the trained proficiency rank in Acrobatics and Stealth. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Ratfolk Lore.

Ratfolk Roll.description: Your ability to curl up into a tight ball comes in handy. You roll up into a ball and move up to four times your Speed in a straight line down an incline. If you reach the bottom of the incline or hit an obstacle during this first turn of movement, you stop rolling safely. Otherwise, you automatically keep rolling at this Speed during subsequent turns until you hit the bottom of the incline or an obstacle ends this movement (which can happen in the middle of your turn). You're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} each turn after the first that you keep rolling, and if you hit an obstacle on a turn after the first, you and the obstacle both take [[/r 4d6[bludgeoning]]] damage and you stop rolling.

Ratspeak.description:
To you, the squeaking of rats and other rodents makes a strange kind of sense.

You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with rodents, including beavers, mice, porcupines, rats, and squirrels, but not with other mammals, such as dogs or bats. The GM determines which animals count as rodents.

Ravening's Desperation.description:
Pré-requisitos treinado em Saber de Zevgavizeb

Seu estudo da Fera de Glutãosombrio lhe ensinou como ter sucesso nas mais árduas circunstancias ao invés de sucumbir à fraqueza. Enquanto seus Pontos de Vida atuais forem menos que o seus Pontos de Vida máximos, você ganha um bonus de circunstancia +1 para testes de Sobrevivência e Furtividade. Se os seus Pontos de Vida atuais forem um quarto do valor máximo, o bônus circunstancial é +2.;
Ravening's Desperation.name: Desespero de Ravening

Ravenous Charge.description: Hungry for the flesh of the living, you hurl yourself into the fray, teeth gnashing. You Stride. If you end your movement within melee reach of a living creature, you can make an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} that creature. If you succeed, you then make a jaws Strike against that creature.

Razor Claws.description: Você afiou suas garras para serem mortais. Seus ataques com garras causam 1d6 de dano cortante ao invés de 1d4 e adquirem o traço versátil (perfurante).
Razor Claws.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Razor Claws.name: Garras de Navalha

Razzle-Dazzle.description:
Frequency once per hour Trigger You @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blind} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzle} a creature.

You’ve spent considerable time practicing the manipulation of light, weaponizing your blade’s reflection or bolstering the luminosity of magical displays to unconventional heights.

Extend the duration of the blinded or dazzled condition you give the target by 1 round.

Reach Spell.description: Você amplia a distância de sua magia. Se a sua próxima ação for @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Conjurar uma Magia} que possui uma distância, aumente a distância dessa magia em 9 metros. Como padrão para aumentar distâncias de magias, se a magia normalmente tiver uma distância de toque, você amplia a distância dela para 9 metros.
Reach Spell.name: Magia de Alcance

Reach for the Stars.description: The sky's the limit, as long as you've got enough black powder. When you use Black Powder Boost, you can expend additional black powder or ammunition to boost yourself farther. For each dose of black powder or piece of firearm ammunition you spend in addition to your shot, you add another 10 feet to the height or distance of your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, to a maximum of 5 boosts (a +50-foot status bonus). You must be wearing a dose of black powder or piece of ammunition, or have it in hand, to detonate it for a boost. You can choose at which points in your Leap you detonate each boost, allowing you to change direction each time. You must then move in a straight line until you boost again or end your Leap.

Reactive Charm.source: Pathfinder Profecias Perdidas: O Grande Bazar

Reactive Distraction.description:
Pré-requisitos lendário em Dissimulação, Distração Perfeita

Acionamento Você seria acertado por um ataque, mirado por um efeito ou está dentro da área de um efeito.

Requerimentos Você possui Distração Perfeita pronta para usar.

Você reativamente troca de lugar com sua duplicata para frustrar seu adversário. Você usa Distração Perfeita mesmo se estiver sendo observado, desde que encerre o movimento de sua ação Esgueirar enquanto está ocultado ou em um local com cobertura ou cobertura maior. Sua duplicata passa a ser o alvo do ataque ou efeito em vez de você. No caso de um efeito de área, se sua ação de Esgueirar não movê-lo para fora da área, tanto você quanto sua duplicata sofrem o efeito.
Reactive Distraction.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Reactive Distraction.name: Distração Reativa

Reactive Interference.description:
Acionamento Um inimigo adjacente começa a usar uma reação.

Girando sua arma, puxando as vestes ou obstruindo de alguma outra forma, você reflexivamente frustra a resposta de um inimigo. Se o nível da criatura acionadora for igual ou inferior ao seu, você interrompe a reação acionadora. Se o nível da criatura acionadora for superior ao seu, você deve realizar uma rolagem de ataque contra a CA dela. Em um sucesso, você interrompe a reação acionadora.
Reactive Interference.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Reactive Interference.name: Interferência Reativa

Reactive Pursuit.description:
Acionamento Um adversário adjacente se move para longe de você, e você pode alcançar pelo menos um espaço adjacente ao adversário com uma ação de Andar.

Você se mantém próximo de um adversário em retirada. Você Anda e deve encerrar seu movimento adjacente ao inimigo acionador. Seu movimento não aciona reações do inimigo acionador. Você pode usar Perseguição Reativa ao Escalar, Escavar, Nadar ou Voar em vez de Andar se possuir o tipo de movimento correspondente.
Reactive Pursuit.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Reactive Pursuit.name: Perseguição Reativa

Reactive Shield.description:
