Acionamento Um inimigo lhe acerta com um Golpe corpo a corpo.

Requerimentos Você está empunhando um escudo.

Você interpõe seu escudo no último momento antes de sofrer um golpe. Você imediatamente usa a ação Erguer um Escudo e recebe o bônus do escudo na CA. O bônus de circunstância do escudo se aplica à sua CA para determinar o resultado do ataque acionador.
Reactive Shield.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Reactive Shield.name: Escudo Reativo

Reactive Transformation.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8RWfKConLYFZpQ9X]{Wild Shape}; @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.1K6AYGisvo9gqdhs]{Elemental Form}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}, or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.NzXpEzcZAjuDTZjK]{Aerial Form}

Trigger varies

You transform reflexively when in danger. You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8RWfKConLYFZpQ9X]{Wild Shape} to transform into one form granted by one of the prerequisite feats you have, depending on the trigger. Your form’s resistances and weaknesses apply against the triggering damage.

Trigger You fall 10 feet or more

Effect Choose a form from @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.NzXpEzcZAjuDTZjK]{Aerial Form}.

Trigger You take acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison damage

Effect Choose a form from @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form} that resists the triggering damage.

Trigger You take fire damage

Effect Choose a fire elemental form from @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.1K6AYGisvo9gqdhs]{Elemental Form}.

Trigger You take poison damage

Effect Choose a form from @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}.

Read Disaster.description:
You spend 10 minutes and open yourself to the divine mysteries of the world, peering into the most sinister portents of the future.

You gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury}, except you learn only about the dangers ahead; any results of “weal” are instead “nothing,” and results of “weal and woe” are instead “woe.” If you are legendary in Religion, you take only 1 minute to Read Disaster.

Read Lips.description:
Pré-requisitos treinado em Sociedade

Você pode ler os lábios de pessoas próximas que possa ver claramente. Em situações calmas ou comuns, você pode fazer isto automaticamente. Em modo de encontro ou quando tentar um feito mais difícil de leitura labial, você fica Fascinado e desprevenido durante cada rodada que passar focando em movimentos de lábios e deve obter sucesso em um teste de Sociedade (CD determinada pelo MJ) para conseguir ler os lábios de alguém. Em ambos os casos, você deve conhecer o idioma para conseguir lê-lo.

Se tiver problemas de audição (ou for surdo) e possuir Ler Lábios, você reconhece os movimentos labiais para a forma falada de seus idiomas. Você também pode falar a forma falada de seus idiomas de forma clara o suficiente para que outros possam entendê-lo.
Read Lips.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Read Lips.name: Ler Lábios

Read Psychometric Resonance.description: With a touch, you can read the psychic impressions left on objects by their previous owners. This exploration activity functions similarly to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic} in that you move at half your travel speed or slower while looking for psychometric resonance. You must brush your bare hands over any objects you pass while you do this. This detects objects with significant emotional resonance attached to them, such as the joy from a child's beloved teddy bear, the sorrow from a widower's wedding ring, or the fear from a victim's murder weapon. If you're looking for a particular type of emotional resonance, you can choose to ignore other emotions. If you find an item with that resonance, you can explore that resonance with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.jZQoAHmGJvi53NRR]{Psychometric Assessment} action.

Read Shibboleths.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.u6SDVWbzHnBBPNMo]{Linguist Dedication}, master in Society

All communication is filled with slight tells and signals. If you interact with someone for at least 10 minutes, their regional words, pronunciation changes, and nonverbal cues provide you with a minor fact about their social environment, such as their hometown or certain groups they might belong to.

If a target of this ability is being deceptive about their social environment, such as a commoner pretending to be a noble, they must attempt a Deception, Society, or appropriate Lore check against your Society DC, providing you a false minor fact consistent with their assumed identity on a success.

Once you’ve gleaned one or more true minor facts about a person, you can then incorporate these mannerisms into your speech to present yourself in a way that they find familiar. This grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Diplomacy and Deception checks with them.

Read the Land.description: You've learned how to commune with the land to learn information. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.l4LFwY7iuzX6sDXr]{Commune with Nature} ritual if you didn't know it already. You can perform this ritual with a casting time of 1 hour instead of 1 day and without a secondary caster.

Reanimating Spark.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You have the dying condition and are about to attempt a recovery check.

The magic that animates you strains to keep you alive. You're restored to 1 Hit Point, lose the dying and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} conditions, and can act normally on this turn. You gain or increase the wounded condition as normal when losing the dying condition in this way.
Reanimating Spark.source: Pathfinder Profecias Perdidas: O Grande Bazar

Reanimator Dedication.description:
You have dedicated your studies to the art of raising and commanding undead. If you're a spontaneous spellcaster with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{Animate Dead} in your repertoire, it becomes a signature spell in addition to your usual signature spells. If you're a prepared spellcaster with animate dead in your spells known, spellbook, or the like, you can spend 10 minutes contemplating undeath to replace one of the spells you've prepared in your spell slots with an animate dead spell of the same level. In addition, if you're able to target the mostly intact remains of an appropriate type of dead creature when casting animate dead, the undead you animate gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, saving throws, and skill checks for the duration of animate dead.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.EQCnu8DGHDDNXch0]{Effect: Reanimator Dedication}

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.ePfibeHcnRcjO6lC]{Reanimator} archetype.

Reaper of Repose.description:
Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Cavaleiro Recuperador, mestre em proficiência em uma arma

Sua habilidade e fervor permitem que você penetre as defesas dos mortos-vivos e explorar suas fraquezas. Ao atacar uma criatura morto-vivo com uma arma com que tenha pró-eficiência mestre, você ignora 5 pontos das resistências da criatura, e a fraqueza do morto-vivo é maior em 2 contra seu ataque.
Reaper of Repose.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Reaper of Repose.name: Ceifador do Repouso

Reason Rapidly.description: Your mind works through clues at an unbelievable speed. You instantly use up to five Recall Knowledge actions. If you have any special abilities or free actions that would normally be triggered when you Recall Knowledge, you can’t use them for these actions.

Reassuring Presence.description:
Trigger An ally within 30 feet gains the frightened condition.

You serve as an anchor to your close companions, calming them in times of stress. Decrease the value of the triggering ally's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition by 1. The ally is then temporarily immune to your Reassuring Presence for 1 hour.
Reassuring Presence.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse

Rebounding Assault.description:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm or loaded crossbow in one hand and a bludgeoning or slashing melee weapon in the other.

You hurl your melee weapon at an opponent, then fire a bullet into the weapon's hilt, making it deal additional damage and bounce back to your grasp. Make a thrown ranged Strike with the melee weapon, then a ranged Strike with your firearm. Both Strikes use the same multiple attack penalty. If the melee weapon doesn't already have the thrown trait, it gains the thrown 10 feet trait during a Rebounding Assault.

If both attacks are successful, the bolt or bullet hits the thrown melee weapon instead of your target, adding its force into one attack. Combine the damage from both Strikes, using the thrown weapon's damage type, and add an additional 1d6 precision damage. The impact sends the melee weapon rebounding off the target and back to your hand.

In any circumstance other than both attacks hitting, carry out the individual Strikes normally. The thrown weapon doesn't rebound and remains in the target's space as normal for thrown weapons.

Rebounding Toss.description:
Requirements You are wielding a thrown weapon.

You bounce your weapon off one foe to strike another. Make a ranged Strike with a thrown weapon. If this Strike hits, the weapon rebounds toward an enemy within 10 feet of the original target. Make an additional Strike against this second target.

Both attacks count toward your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn’t increase until after you’ve made both attacks.

Reckless Abandon (Barbarian).description:
Trigger Your turn begins, and you are at half or fewer Hit Points.

Your blood boils when you take a beating, and you throw caution to the wind to finish the fight. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, a –2 penalty to AC, and a –1 penalty to saves. These bonuses and penalties last until your Rage ends or until you are above half Hit Points, whichever comes first.
Reckless Abandon (Barbarian).source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder

Reckless Abandon (Goblin).description:
Frequency once per day

Despite a lifetime filled with questionable decisions, you’ve managed to survive, as though you have uncanny luck that lets you avoid the consequences of your own actions. For the remainder of your turn, if you roll a failure or critical failure on a saving throw against a harmful effect, you get a success instead. Further, enemies and hazards that would damage you this turn roll the minimum possible damage.

These benefits apply only to harmful effects incurred entirely during your turn in which you activate Reckless Abandon, such as running through a Prismatic Wall. Persistent damage and conditions that were applied prior to your turn proceed normally, and as soon as your turn ends you are subject to the full consequences of any dangers still threatening you.

Reclaim Spell.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.a1TSGGsA6b5gjP3H]{Reprepare Spell}

You have learned to manipulate reflections of magic, similar to the resonant reflections. You reclaim the magic of an ongoing spell, using it reprepare a spell with a duration. You Dismiss a Spell of 4th level or lower that you cast today from a spell slot with at least half its duration remaining, even if that spell can’t normally be Dismissed. You can then spend 10 minutes to reprepare the spell in that spell slot, as Reprepare Spell.

Reclaimant Plea.description:
You call on the power of the Crimson Oath to gain magical aid. Choose one of the following spells: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.b5sGjGlBf58f8jn0]{Air Walk}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ksLCg62cLOojw3gN]{Dimensional Anchor}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{Remove Curse}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.DyiD239dNS7RIxZE]{Searing Light}. You can Cast that Spell once per day as a 4th-level divine innate spell. At 14th level, the spell heightens to 5th level, and at 16th level, the spell heightens to 6th level. If you anger the mysterious source of the Crimson Oath's power, you lose the ability to cast the spell until you atone.

Special You can select this feat a second time at 14th level, gaining a second spell from the list above, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YvXKGlHOt7mdW2jZ]{Death Ward}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.E3X2RbzWHCdz7gsk]{Flame Strike}, which you can cast once per day; you also become an expert in divine spell DCs and divine spell attack rolls. You can select this feat a third time at 18th level, gaining either a third spell from the list above, death ward, flame strike, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.a3aQxCpoj1q1NQxC]{Sunburst}, which you can cast once per day; additionally, all three spells from this feat heighten to 7th level, and you become a master of divine spell attacks and spell DCs.
Reclaimant Plea.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Recognize Spell.description:
Pré-requisitos treinado em Arcanismo, Natureza, Ocultismo ou Religião

Acionamento Uma criatura em sua linha de visão conjura uma magia que você não possui preparada ou que não consta em seu repertório de magias, ou uma armadilha ou objeto similar conjura uma magia dessas. Você deve estar ciente da conjuração.

Se for treinado na perícia apropriada para a tradição da magia sendo conjurada e ela for uma magia comum de 2º nível ou inferior, você a identifica automaticamente (embora ainda precise rolar para tentar obter um sucesso crítico, você não corre o risco de obter um resultado pior do que um sucesso). O nível mais alto de magia que pode identificar automaticamente aumenta para 4 se você for especialista, 6 se for mestre e 10 se for lendário. O MJ rola um teste secreto de Arcanismo, Natureza, Ocultismo ou Religião (o que corresponder à tradição da magia sendo conjurada). Se não for treinado na perícia, você não pode obter um resultado melhor que uma falha.

Sucesso Crítico: Você reconhece corretamente a magia e recebe +1 de bônus de circunstância em sua jogada de salvamento ou CA contra ela.

Successo Você reconhece corretamente a magia.

Falha Você falha em reconhecer a magia.

Critical Failure: Você identifica a magia erroneamente como outra magia completamente diferente à escolha do MJ.
Recognize Spell.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Recognize Spell.name: Reconhecer Magia

Recognize Threat.description:
Prerequisites mestre em uma perícia de Recordar Conhecimento, Dedicação de Agente Pathfinder Requerimentos Você é graduado mestre na perícia necessário para identificar a criatura acionadora. Acionamento No seu primeiro turno quando um encontro começa, você pode ver uma criatura.

Você acessa rapidamente informação sobre a ameaça para que possa passá-la para o seu time. Faça um teste de Recordar Conhecimento contra a criatura acionadora.
Recognize Threat.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Recognize Threat.name: Reconhecer Ameaça

Recollect Studies.source: Presságios Perdidos - Guia da Sociedade Pathfinder

Reconstruct The Scene.description:
You spend 1 minute surveying a small location (such as a single room) to get an impression of events that occurred there in the last day. This involves moving about the area and studying footprints, the placement of objects, spilled drinks or blood, and so forth.

You get an indistinct mental impression of significant events that happened there. This gives you clues and details of the past, including the overall events and their time frame, but it’s not a perfect record. This also isn’t enough to identify who was involved in these events if you weren’t already aware the person was there.

As determined by the GM, you also pick out various seemingly small details that could serve as important clues, like a memorable weapon someone used for a murder or the type of cloak someone wore when passing through.

Recover Spell.description:
Requirements An enemy's action disrupted your attempts to Cast a Spell since the beginning of your last turn.

You recover the energy of a recently disrupted spell, allowing you to cast it again as long as you do so immediately before the energy dissipates. You regain the use of a spell that was disrupted since the beginning of your last turn, but you must immediately Cast the Spell again with your next action or else you lose the spell; as normal for metamagic, this must be on the same turn that you use Recover Spell. You can change the area, targets, and other variables, including the number of actions used to Cast the Spell if the spell allows, such as when casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Magic Missile}.
Recover Spell.source: Presságios Perdidos - Guia da Sociedade Pathfinder

Red Herring.description:
You have a keen sense for avoiding spurious lines of inquiry. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xTK2zsWFyxSJvYbX]{Pursue a Lead}, the GM tells you if the lead you chose is inconsequential.

For example, if you found a splatter of gray mud on the wall, thought it was suspicious, and Pursued it as a Lead, the GM would tell you if there was no greater mystery related to it.

When the GM tells you a lead is inconsequential, you can decline to Pursue the Lead, keeping any leads you were already pursuing. You still can’t use Pursue a Lead again for 10 minutes, as normal.

Red Mantis Assassin Dedication.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.DeixUOfwL7Bruad5]{Assassino do Louva-a-Deus Vermelho}
Prerequisitestreinado em sabres serrilhados, divindade é Achaekek, tendência ordeira e má, membro dos assassinos do Louva-a-Deus Vermelho Access Você é da Ilha Mediogalti.

Você aprendeu como perseguir seus adversários e matá-los com um sabre serrilhado. Você se torna treinado em Furtividade e Saber de Assassinos; se já for treinado, você se torna especialista. Sempre que sua proficiência em qualquer arma aumenta para especialista ou além, você também recebe essa nova proficiência com @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.wkzxLpSe7LN6c5Ld]{Sabres Serrilhados}.

Especial Você não pode selecionar outro talento de dedicação até ter recebido dois outros talentos do arquétipo de assassino do Louva-a-Deus Vermelho.
Red Mantis Assassin Dedication.name: Dedicação de Assassino do Louva-a-Deus Vermelho

Reflect Foe.description: You create a copy of a foe by calling them forth from a nearby reflection, clonally growing them in an instant from one of your hairs or otherwise creating them in a way that matches your own nature as a reflection. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.73rToy0v5Ra9NvL6]{Duplicate Foe} once per day as an innate occult spell. At 20th level, your innate duplicate foe is heightened to 8th level.

Reflect Spell.description:
Pré-requisitos @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Ikqay8buYlb85bwd]{Contramágica}

Quando obtiver sucesso em uma Contramágica para neutralizar uma magia que afete criaturas alvo ou uma área, você pode devolver o efeito da magia ao seu conjurador. Quando refletida, a magia afeta apenas o conjurador original, mesmo se for uma magia de área ou que normalmente afete mais de uma criatura. O conjurador original pode tentar um salvamento e usar outras defesas contra a magia refletida normalmente.
Reflect Spell.name: Refletir Magia

Reflecting Riposte.description:
Prerequisites Dueling Riposte, Mirror Shield, or Twin Riposte

Trigger An opponent casts a spell and you critically succeed at a saving throw against it.

Requirements You have a shield raised or are benefiting from Dueling Parry or Twin Parry.

You attempt to counteract the triggering spell using powerful magical techniques observed in the Kortos Mounts. Use your attack roll modifier with your shield or parrying weapon for your counteract check. If you counteract the spell, it is reflected upon the caster. If the spell targeted individual creatures, it targets the caster only. If the spell targeted an area centered on a point, the new area is centered on the caster. If the spell was a cone or line, the cone or line emanates from you toward the caster. If the spell has a save DC, it uses your class DC, and if it requires a spell attack roll, use the same attack roll modifier as the counteract check.

Reflective Pocket.description: You've formed a connection with a small hand mirror, allowing you to use it as an extradimensional storage space. You can store one item of light Bulk in your mirror at a time. Storing or retrieving an item requires an Interact action and any creature can do so. While an item is stored within the mirror, the mirror reflects the item's image. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.qVNVSmsgpKFGk9hV]{Conceal the Object} unless someone checks the mirror's reflection.

Reflective Ripple Stance.description:
Requirements You're unarmored.

You enter a stance of fluid grace as small amounts of water flow with your movements and attacks. You can make flowing wave attacks that deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage. They are in the brawling group and have the agile, disarm, finesse, nonlethal, trip, unarmed, and water traits.

While in Reflective Ripple Stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC to avoid being Disarmed and Tripped.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.QDQwHxNowRwzUx9R]{Stance: Reflective Ripple Stance}

Special This feat gains your choice of either the divine or occult trait, matching your ki spell tradition if possible.

Reflexive Catch.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.8vuL2hCPrcG2duLt]{Malabarista}
Pré-requisitosespecialista em Acrobatismo, Dedicação de Malabarista
Requerimentos O Item ou arma arremessada é de um volume que você possa fazer malabares. Se o Acionamento foi o ataque de uma arma de arremesso tendo você como alvo, você não pode estar desprevenido contra o ataque. Se você já estava fazendo malabares, você não pode adicioná-lo ao seu número máximo de itens.
AcionamentoUm item cai dentro do seu alcance ou um atacante falha em uma rolagem de ataque com arma de arremesso contra você ou uma criatura ao seu alcance.

Você pega o item acionador. Se você estiver fazendo malabares, você pode imediatamente adicionar o objeto aos do seu número com uma ação livre, que tem os traços concentração e manuseio .
Reflexive Catch.name: Aparada Reflexiva

Reflexive Grip.source: Presságios Perdidos - Guia da Sociedade Pathfinder

Reflexive Riposte.description:
Prerequisites Opportune Riposte

You can riposte almost without a thought. At the start of each of your turns when you regain your actions, you gain an additional reaction that can be used only to perform an Opportune Riposte.

Reflexive Shield.description: Você pode usar seu escudo para evitar o pior de efeitos de área e outros danos. Quando Erguer seu escudo, você recebe o bônus de circunstância do escudo em salvamentos de Reflexos. Se possuir a reação Bloqueio com Escudo, o dano sofrido como resultado de um salvamento de Reflexos pode acionar essa reação, mesmo que o dano não seja físico.
Reflexive Shield.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Reflexive Shield.name: Escudo Reflexivo

Regrowth.description: Your command over your vital essence allows you or an ally to recover from grievous wounds. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2Vkd1IxylPceUAAF]{Regenerate} as a 7th-level primal innate spell once per day.

Reinforced Chassis.description:
Your body is designed to be particularly resilient. Your chassis is medium armor in the plate armor group that grants a +4 item bonus to AC, a Dex cap of +1, a check penalty of -2, a speed penalty of -5 feet, and a Strength value of 16. You can never wear other armor or remove your chassis; however, you still don't become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} from sleeping. Finally, you can etch armor runes onto your chassis as normal.

Enhancement Your chassis becomes difficult to overcome. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.uOlyklPCUWLtCaYI]{Chassis Deflection} reaction.

Rejuvenating Touch.description:
Prerequisites devotion spell ( Lay on Hands)

Your healing energies linger after you cast, providing continual benefits. An ally that recovers Hit Points from your Lay on Hands gains 10 temporary Hit Points at the start of their turn during each of the next 10 rounds. This effect ends if the ally is knocked Unconscious.

Rejuvenation Token.description:
You tie yourself to the Material Plane by implanting a piece of your consciousness into a weapon, piece of armor, or other item that's precious to you. As long as this object is intact, even if your body is destroyed, you can be restored to the exact state you were in the last time you made daily preparations with this object in your possession. The soulbound object can be used as a special focus for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]{Raise Dead}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kqhPt9344UkcGVYO]{Resurrect}, or similar magic. This warps the spell to bring you back in your skeletal undead state rather than bringing you back to life. Pharasma can't prevent you from returning when the spell is modified in this way.

When you return, you permanently lose a memory that was precious to you, in addition to any other side effects of the spell that brought you back. Your soulbound object becomes inert until you spend 1 week of downtime to anchor yourself to it again, further fragmenting your mind.

Relentless Disarm.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.Lr108TWazbuxxUzP]{ Guarda Zéfiro}
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UyyrFtPWOo0qvXOv]Dedicação de Guarda Zéfiro}, treinado em Atletismo

Quando você obtêm um sucesso, mas não um sucesso crítico, em um teste para desarmar uma criatura, seu bônus de circunstância para testes futuros para disarmar é +4 ao invés de +2. Outras criaturas ganham somente o bônus normal.

Quando você tem um sucesso crítico em um teste para desarmar, você pode imediatamente Desmoralizar seu alvo como uma reação.
Relentless Disarm.name: Desarme Implacável

Relentless Stalker.description:
Acionamento Uma criatura adjacente que você esteja caçando tenta se mover para longe usando uma ação que possui o traço movimento.

Sua presa caçada não pode escapar de sua perseguição incansável. Ande até sua Velocidade junto da criatura acionadora, permanecendo adjacente ao oponente por todo o movimento dela até que ela pare de se mover ou que você fique sem movimento. Você pode ignorar terreno difícil durante este movimento, a menos que o terreno difícil seja causado por um efeito mágico.
Relentless Stalker.source: Aventura de Pathfinder: O Pendor da Pedra Pestilenta
Relentless Stalker.name: Perseguidor Incansável

Relentless Wings.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jNemcS5GqH8mnjV6]{Fiendish Wings}

Your wings are now a permanent part of your physiology. You gain the effects of Fiendish Wings at all times, rather than just once per day for 10 minutes.

Reliable Luck.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7qBuzHY8kEG8SdEP]{Cat’s Luck}

You have gone well past nine lives to survive danger with surprising regularity. You can use Cat’s Luck once per hour, rather than once per day.

Reliable Squire.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Reloading Trick.description:
Frequency once per round

Requirements You're holding an unloaded hand crossbow.

You can fire off a single shot even when unprepared. You Interact to reload your hand crossbow and Strike with it.

Special If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.HvPvyeXM2iMK4OYf]{Repeating Hand Crossbow Training} feat, you can use this feat with a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zcrIuILnp6oh4dr9]{Repeating Hand Crossbow} to load either a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.AITVZmakiu3RgfKo]{Bolt} or a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.xk9bw9ccupAIx7xT]{Repeating Hand Crossbow Magazine}, but the speed means you can fire only one bolt, then the magazine jams. You must spend a 3-action Interact activity to remove the jammed magazine and clear it before it can be used again.

Remediate.description:
Prerequisites harmful font or healing font

Frequency once per hour

If your next action is to use your divine font to cast a 3-action @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} spell to damage creatures, you can harness the residual energy to counterbalance opposing forces.

You use your heal or harm spell to attempt to counteract one effect in the spell’s area with the chaotic, evil, good, or lawful trait. The chosen trait must oppose one component of your deity’s alignment; if your deity is neutral, you can choose any one trait.

Remember Your Training.source: Presságios Perdidos - Guia da Sociedade Pathfinder

Reminder of the Greater Fear.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger Another creature within 30 feet of you that can see you would gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition.

You give a target a stern glower to remind them that it is you, and no one else, they should truly fear. Reduce the value of the frightened condition the creature would take by 1.

Remorseless Lash.description: Você é perito em açoitar um inimigo até que sua moral esteja prestes a quebrar. Quando você obtêm sucesso em um Golpe contra um inimigo @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Assustado}, aquele inimigo não pode reduzir sua condição de assustado menos que 1 até o início do seu próximo turno.
Remorseless Lash.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Remorseless Lash.name: Acoite sem Remorsos

Remote Trigger.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4MUbwilvb9dI0X59]{Snarecrafter Dedication}

You’ve learned how to trigger snares from afar, creating ranged hazards to assail your opponents and allowing you to disarm enemies’ snares harmlessly.

You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} a snare to trigger it prematurely. If you crafted the snare, you automatically hit. If someone else crafted it, attempt a ranged Strike against the Crafting DC, triggering the snare only if you hit.

Remove Presence.description:
Your spell reaches into the mind of a creature and removes you from it. The amped cantrip must be one that has one or more targets and must either require a spell attack roll or have a saving throw. Use this amp in place of the psi cantrip's normal amp entry.

Amp Choose one target of the spell or one creature in its area. If that enemy fails its save or the spell hits it, you become undetected by that creature, disappearing from its senses for 1 minute or until you use a hostile action. This is similar to being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, but effects like see invisibility don't reveal you-you're affecting the target's mind, not its vision. True seeing can still see through this illusion if the counteract check succeeds.

Renewed Vigor.description: Você pausa para recuperar seu vigor furioso. Você ganha Pontos de Vida temporários igual à metade de seu nível mais seu modificador de Constituição.
Renewed Vigor.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Renewed Vigor.name: Vigor Renovado

Renewing Quills.description: Your spines grow back much faster than other shisks. You can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.oAWNluJaMlaGysXA]{Barbed Quills} reaction once every 10 minutes.
Renewing Quills.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse

Repair Module.description:
Frequency once per day

You trigger your body's repair programming, causing your body's nanites to heal your wounds. You gain fast healing equal to half your level for 1 minute. While Repair Module is active, you can't use other abilities that require the use of your nanites.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.DjxZpQ4xJWWvYQqY]{Effect: Repair Module}

Repeating Hand Crossbow Training.description:
You become trained in the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zcrIuILnp6oh4dr9]{Repeating Hand Crossbow} and gain access to repeating hand crossbows and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.oJZe5rRitvioUgRh]{Shootist Bandolier}. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the repeating hand crossbow. If you're at least an expert in a repeating hand crossbow you're using, you gain access to its critical specialization effect. You can perform the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.Bh1Qnh8JP4CMysRK]{Shootist's Draw} action with repeating hand crossbows.

Special If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.meQJfsKVar9tm6c9]{Running Reload} feat, you can reload a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.xk9bw9ccupAIx7xT]{Repeating Hand Crossbow Magazine} on the move. You can use Running Reload as a 3-action activity to reload a magazine into a repeating hand crossbow after you Stride, Step, or Sneak, or as a 2-action activity if you use a magazine from a shootist bandolier.

Replenishing Consumption.description: When you devour corpses and satiate your hunger, you also recover from some of your wounds, your necrotized blue flesh knitting back together almost immediately as soon as you begin shoveling the chunks of dead flesh down your throat. Once every 10 minutes, when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1If9lLVoZdO8woVg]{Consume Flesh}, you regain 1d6 Hit Points for every 2 levels you have, rounded up. [[/r (ceil(@actor.level/2))d6[Healing]]]{Leveled Healing}

Replenishing Hydration.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Absalom, City of Lost Omens

Replenishment of War.description:
Pré-requisitos especialista com a arma favorita de sua divindade

Golpear seus inimigos gera louvor e proteção de sua divindade. Quando causar dano a uma criatura com um Golpe usando a arma favorita de sua divindade, você recebe uma quantidade de Pontos de Vida temporários igual à metade de seu nível (ou igual ao seu nível se o Golpe for um sucesso crítico). Estes Pontos de Vida temporários duram até o início de seu próximo turno.
Replenishment of War.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Replenishment of War.name: Provimento de Guerra

Replicate.description: You've learned to reshape your malleable form. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise} once per day as an innate occult spell. This is a transmutation and morph effect, as your body physically transforms, rather than an illusion effect.
Replicate.name: Replicate

Reprepare Spell.description:
Você descobriu uma maneira de reutilizar alguns de seus espaços de magia várias vezes. Você pode gastar 10 minutos para preparar uma magia que já tenha conjurado nesse dia, recuperando acesso a esse espaço de magia. A magia deve ser de 4º nível ou inferior e não pode ter uma duração. Você pode repreparar uma magia desta forma mesmo se já a tiver preparado previamente no mesmo dia.

Se possuir a tese arcana substituição de magia, você pode preparar uma magia diferente em um espaço gasto, desde que a nova magia não tenha uma duração. Após ter repreparado a nova magia nesse espaço uma vez, você pode usar sua tese arcana somente para substituir magias sem durações nesse espaço de magia.
Reprepare Spell.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Reprepare Spell.name: Repreparar Magia

Reptile Rider.description:
To you, crocodilians, giant lizards, and dinosaurs are loyal steeds, not monsters. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Rq5wkA8DtsmbzoGV]{Ride} feat, even if you don't meet the prerequisites. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Nature checks to Handle an Animal as long as the animal is a reptile, dinosaur, or even a non-sapient dragon.

Note This feat refers to Nature checks to Handle an Animal. This check does not exist in Pathfinder 2, and so the feat instead gives a bonus to Nature checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal}.

Reptile Speaker.description: Você interpreta o som de répteis com uma lingua. Você pode fazer perguntas, obter respostas, e usar a perícia Diplomacia com animais que sejam répteis (O MJ determina que animais contam como répteis).
Reptile Speaker.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Reptile Speaker.name: Falar com Répteis

Repulse the Wicked.description:
Trigger An undead within your reach critically fails an attack roll targeting you.

You use your foe's failure as an opening to push them away. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} the undead.
Repulse the Wicked.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Rescuer's Press.description:
Prerequisites Lastwall Sentry Dedication

Any shield you wield gains the shove trait. When you Shove using a shield and Stride as part of that action, you can move an additional 5 feet to either side of the creature you Shoved. In addition, if you are in the Everstand Stance and successfully Shove a creature using a shield that you wield two-handed, you can increase the distance of your Shove to 10 feet.

Resilient Mind.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Resilient Touch.description:
Prerequisites devotion spell (lay on hands)

Your healing energies create an aura of protection that defends your allies against more than just blades and arrows. An ally that recovers Hit Points from your Lay on Hands gains a +1 status bonus to their saving throws until the end of their next turn.

Resist Ruin.description: Your duskwalker heritage allows you to extend protection against negative energy to yourself or an ally in need. You gain resistance 5 to negative energy, and once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YvXKGlHOt7mdW2jZ]{Death Ward} as a divine innate spell.

Resolute Defender.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Resounding Blow.description:
Requirements You are wielding a melee weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.

You strike your enemy in the head with such force that their ears ring. Make a melee Strike. If the Strike hits and deals damage, the target is Deafened until the start of your next turn (or for 1 minute on a critical hit).

Resounding Bravery.description:
Prerequisites Bravery

Even your fears serve as fuel for your fighting spirit. When you critically succeed at a Will save against a foe’s ability, you gain a +1 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute. These benefits are doubled if you critically succeed against a fear effect.

Resounding Finale.description:
Prerequisites Maestro (Bard Muse)

Trigger You or an ally benefiting from your composition spell would take sonic damage.

You bring your performance to a sudden, dramatic finish, drowning out other sounds. Your composition spell ends immediately, and all allies that had been benefiting from the spell’s effects gain sonic resistance against the triggering damage equal to twice the composition spell’s level.

Resourceful Ritualist.description:
Prerequisites Ritualist Dedication

You can cast difficult rituals that might otherwise be just beyond your skill. You can attempt checks to cast a ritual that requires expert proficiency if you are trained, master proficiency if you are an expert, or legendary proficiency if you are a master.

Restitch.description: You've learned how to sew even the most terrible tears and wounds together. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2Vkd1IxylPceUAAF]{Regenerate} as a 7th-level arcane innate spell once per day.
Restitch.source: Pathfinder Profecias Perdidas: O Grande Bazar

Resurrectionist.description: Quando traz uma criatura de volta à vida, você garante que ela prospere e se revigore. Quando restaurar Pontos de Vida a uma criatura que esteja morrendo ou trouxer uma criatura de volta à vida e restaurar Pontos de Vida dela, você concede cura acelerada 5 à criatura por 1 minuto. Esta cura acelerada se encerra se a criatura for derrubada inconsciente.
Resurrectionist.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Resurrectionist.name: Ressurreicionista

Resuscitate.description:
Prerequisites Medic Dedication, legendary in Medicine

Requirements You are holding healer’s tools or are wearing them and have a hand free. Also, the target’s body is mostly intact.

You can use Medicine to resuscitate the dead. Attempt a DC 40 Medicine check to revive a dead creature that has been dead for no more than 3 rounds. If you succeed, the target returns to life with the effects of Raise Dead, except it still has the Wounded condition it had before Dying, increased by 1 (or wounded 1 if it wasn’t wounded before dying). Whether you succeed or fail, the target is temporarily immune to Resuscitate for 1 day.

Retain Absorbed Spell.source: Presságios Perdidos - Guia da Sociedade Pathfinder

Retaliatory Cleansing.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Retractable Claws.description: You gain a claw unarmed attack that deals [[/r 1d4[slashing]]] damage. Your claws are in the brawling group and have the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits.

Return Fire.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sgaqlDFTVC7Ryurt]{Deflect Arrow}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YG2RxXE9SMfwo6wP]{Monastic Archer Stance}

Requirements You are in Monastic Archer Stance, are wielding a bow, and have a free hand.

Snatching an arrow out of the air, you instantly put it to your bow and return fire. When you successfully Deflect an Arrow, as part of that reaction you can immediately make a ranged bow @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} by firing the arrow you deflected from your own bow.

Returning Throw.description:
You have mastered the technique of arcing a projectile so that it returns to your hand after being thrown, though this requires a moment to precisely calculate the trajectory and possible ricochets.

Make a ranged Strike with a thrown weapon. Once the Strike is complete, the weapon arcs or ricochets back to your hand. If your hands are full when the weapon returns, it falls to the ground in your space.

Reveal Beasts.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens

Reveal Machinations.description:
Pré-requisitos lendário em Dissimulação

Você revela que teve um papel menor, mas recorrente, na vida de outro humanoide — ou pelo menos o convence que isto é verdade. Faça um teste de Dissimulação contra a CD de Vontade do alvo. Com um sucesso, a revelação o deixa assustado 2; com um sucesso crítico, ele fica assustado 3. Além disso, você recebe informações sobre o alvo como se tivesse tentado Recordar Conhecimento sobre ele, utilizando a perícia apropriada e recebendo o mesmo resultado de sua rolagem. Você não pode usar esta habilidade contra o mesmo humanoide até que tenha se passado 1 dia e você tenha se disfarçado como uma pessoa diferente.

Especial De acordo com o MJ, este talento pode ser usado contra criaturas que não sejam humanoides se elas tiveram contato regular com humanoides ou se você for capaz de disfarçar-se como um membro da ancestralidade ou do tipo de criatura do alvo.
Reveal Machinations.name: Revelar Maquinações

Revealing Stab.description:
Requerimentos Você está empunhando uma arma corpo a corpo que causa dano perfurante

Você apunhala com sua arma perfurante na direção de um adversário imperceptível, revelando a localização dele para seus aliados. Faça um Golpe com a arma corpo a corpo requerida. Você não precisa realizar um teste simples para atingir uma criatura ocultada e precisa apenas obter sucesso em um teste simples CD 5 para mirar uma criatura escondida. Se acertar e causar dano, você pode espetar a arma requerida no seu alvo corpóreo, revelando a posição atual dele. Você Larga a arma e ela fica alojada no alvo. Se o alvo estiver ocultado, outras criaturas não precisam obter sucesso em um teste simples para atingi-lo. Se o alvo estiver escondido, outras criaturas devem obter sucesso apenas em um teste simples CD 5 para mirá-lo. A criatura precisa ser capaz de ver sua arma para receber qualquer destes benefícios e o alvo não consegue tornar-se indetectado para qualquer um capaz de ver sua arma. Se o alvo estiver invisível, a arma permanece visível enquanto estiver alojada nele.

Este benefício dura até a arma ser removida da criatura. O alvo ou uma criatura adjacente a ele pode remover a arma com 2 ações de Interagir.
Revealing Stab.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Revealing Stab.name: Punhalada Reveladora

Reverberate.description:
Trigger You would take sonic damage from a spell.

You can manipulate the acoustics around you to deflect sonic damage back at its source. Attempt a Performance check against the spell DC of the creature that cast the triggering spell.

Critical Success You reduce the triggering damage by an amount up to four times your level. The caster takes sonic damage equal to the amount of damage you reduced in this way.

Success As critical success, but you reduce the triggering damage by an amount up to twice your level.

Critical Failure You misdirect the sonic waves at yourself, taking twice the triggering damage.

Reverse Engineering.description:
Prerequisites expert in Crafting, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CaeCSWFWytWv8Fgu]{Scrounger Dedication}

You are able to reverse engineer items into formulas more effectively than most. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Crafting checks to reverse engineer a formula from an item.

Additionally, if you get a critical success on your Crafting check, you can opt to not only create the formula but also reassemble the original item at the same time, leaving you with the formula and the item instead ofthe formula and raw materials equal to half the item’s value.

Revivifying Mutagen.description: Enquanto estiver sob efeito de um mutagênico, você pode metabolizar o poder do mutagênico para se curar. Para isso, você usa uma ação única que possui os traços concentração e manuseio. Assim que a ação é completada, você recupera 1d6 Pontos de Vida para cada 2 níveis de item do mutagênico (mínimo 1d6), mas a duração do mutagênico é encerrada imediatamente (mesmo se estiver sob o efeito de Mutagênico Persistente).
Revivifying Mutagen.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Revivifying Mutagen.name: Mutagênico Revivificante

Ricochet Feint.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.RsNvCSrCN7czHC0G]{Ricochet Stance}

While in Ricochet Stance, you can bounce a thrown weapon off a foe to distract them. You can attempt a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} against a creature within the first range increment of a thrown weapon you are wielding, rather than only creatures within your melee reach.

Ricochet Legend.description:
The more obstacles between you and your target, the deadlier your shots become, as you ricochet off multiple surfaces to hit them. When using Ricochet Shot, your shot can bounce off of any surface within your weapon's first three range increments and the target can't benefit from cover unless they have total cover on all sides.

In addition, a creature must attempt a Will save against your class DC the first time in an encounter you attack it with a Ricochet Shot. If it fails, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Atordoado 2} and is unable to determine where your shot originated.

Ricochet Master.description:
You have an eye for angles and can find shots that others believe are impossible. When using Ricochet Shot, you can bounce your bullet off up to two solid surfaces within your weapon's first range increment instead of just one.

In addition, a creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} the first time you attack it with a Ricochet Shot during an encounter.

Ricochet Stance (Fighter).description:
You adopt a stance designed to rebound your thrown weapons back toward you. While you are in this stance, any thrown weapons you use as part of a ranged @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} to deal bludgeoning or slashing damage immediately return to your hand, enabling you to use them for additional Strikes.

You must be within the weapon’s listed range increment and have a hand free to catch the weapon. If you make a ranged Strike with a thrown weapon outside of its listed range increment, it instead flies back toward you a number of feet equal to its listed range increment and then falls to the ground.

Ricochet Stance (Rogue).description:
You adopt a stance (page 150) to rebound your thrown weapons toward you. While you are in this stance, any thrown weapons you use as part of a ranged @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} to deal bludgeoning or slashing damage immediately return to your hand, enabling you to use them for additional Strikes.

You must be within the weapon’s listed range increment and have a hand free to catch the weapon. If you make a ranged Strike with a thrown weapon outside of its listed range increment, it instead flies back toward you a number of feet equal to its listed range increment and then falls to the ground.

Ricocheting Leap.description: You quickly use your momentum to topple and spring off of foes. You can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.X8iSUF1m0eezmrjs]{Wall Jump} to make additional jumps off of creatures larger than you as if they were walls. Once per turn when you make an additional jump off of a creature in this way, you can also attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} that creature as a free action.
Ricocheting Leap.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse

Ride.description: Quando Comandar um Animal em que estiver montado para realizar uma ação de movimento (como Andar), você obtém sucesso automaticamente em vez de precisar fazer um teste. Qualquer animal em que você estiver montado age em seu turno, como um lacaio. Se você Montar um animal no meio de um encontro, ele pula o próximo turno dele e age somente em seu próximo turno. A página 250 possui mais informações sobre Comandar um Animal.
Ride.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Ride.name: Cavalgar

Riftmarked.description:
Long ago, qlippoth marked someone in your lineage, most likely through their ancient runestones that dot Golarion's surface. Yours is an old lineage, primordial and twisted, and you have a sense for similarly twisted things. You're trained in Occultism. If you're already trained in Occultism (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.hDGosy2ZTwnyctEP]{Oddity Identification} skill feat.

Note: If you are already trained in the skill provided by this feat, you need to manually select an alternative skill. You also need to manually enter the granted Lore skill.

Right-Hand Blood.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse

Righteous Resistance.description: You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{Resist Energy} twice per day as a divine innate spell, except you can target only yourself. If you grant yourself resistance to fire damage, the resistance is equal to either the spell's normal value or to your level, whichever is higher.
Righteous Resistance.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens

Ringmaster's Introduction.description:
Requirements The ally hasn't acted in the current combat.

Trigger An ally's turn begins.

You announce the triggering ally with a litany of their legendary achievements, spurring them to action. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} this turn and can spend the extra action to Stride, Strike, Demoralize, Feint, or Perform.

Rippling Spin.description:
Trigger You are hit by a physical melee attack by an attacker you can see that's in reach.

Requirements You're in Reflective Ripple Stance.

After the triggering attack is done, Step. You must end this Step within the attacker's reach. Then, you can attempt an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} the attacker.

Riptide.description:
Requirements You are within 10 feet of water at least 10 feet deep, and your Speed is sufficient to reach the water in one Stride.

Trigger You successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} a creature of the same size as you or smaller.

You Stride up to 10 feet to enter the water, bringing the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} creature with you into the water.
Riptide.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Absalom, City of Lost Omens

Risky Surgery.description:
Prerequisites trained in Medicine

Your surgery can bring a patient back from the brink of death, but might push them over the edge. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds}, you can deal [[/r 1d8 #slashing]] slashing damage to your patient just before applying the effects of Treat Wounds.

If you do, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Medicine check to Treat Wounds, and if you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.

Rites Of Convocation.description:
Your patron grants you the power to summon other creatures to aid you.

Choose one summon spell (such as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{Summon Animal}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.lKcsmeOrgHtK4xQa]{Summon Construct}, and so forth) that appears on the spell list of your spellcasting tradition. You can spend 10 minutes in communion with your familiar to replace one spell you’ve prepared in one of your witch spell slots with the spell you chose, heightened to the same level.

The spell you replaced must be of at least the summon spell’s minimum spell level.

Rites Of Transfiguration.description:
You can adapt your patron’s power to transform other creatures into forms more befitting their behavior or your whims. Your familiar learns @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dN8QBNuTiaBHCKUe]{Baleful Polymorph}, even if baleful polymorph isn’t on your tradition’s spell list.

By spending 10 minutes in communion with your familiar, you can replace one spell of 6th level or higher you’ve prepared in one of your witch spell slots with a baleful polymorph spell of the same level.

Ritual Researcher.description:
Prerequisites Enigma (Bard Muse), expert in Occultism

Careful research into the art of rituals has made you better at performing them. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to all primary and secondary checks you attempt as part of casting a ritual.

Ritual Reversion.description: Você pode temporariamente reverter para uma forma menos conspícua sem diminuir seus sentidos. VOcê toma a forma de uma espécia ordinária de planta ou fungo que se assemelha a você, revertendo a aparência do seu corpo logo antes de seu espírito se juntar a ele. Este talento tem os efeitos de @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{Aspecto de Árvore}, exceto que seu tamanho se mantém pequeno.
Ritual Reversion.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Ritual Reversion.name: Reversão de Ritual

Ritualist Dedication.description:
Prerequisites expert in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion

You have begun to master the difficult art of casting rituals. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to all primary checks to perform a ritual.

You learn two uncommon rituals with a level no higher than half your level; you must meet all prerequisites for casting the ritual to choose it. At 8th level and every 4 levels thereafter, you learn another uncommon ritual with a level no higher than half your level and for which you meet the prerequisites.

You can cast these as the primary caster, but you can’t teach them to anyone else or allow someone else to serve as primary caster unless they know the ritual as well.

Special You can’t select another dedication feat until you’ve gained two other feats from the ritualist archetype. If you retrain out of this feat, you lose the rituals learned from it.

Roadkill.description:
Requirements You are piloting a vehicle.

In your hands, any vehicle is a weapon. When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.lID4rJHAVZB6tavf]{Run Over}, you can use your class DC in place of the vehicle's collision DC. Your vehicle can Run Over any number of creatures up to one Size smaller than the vehicle or ram any one target creature or object in your path up to the size of your vehicle.

Robust Recovery.description:
Pré-requisitos especialista em Medicina

Você aprendeu medicina popular para melhorar a recuperação de doenças e venenos, e o seu uso contínuo o tornou especialmente resiliente. Quando você Tratar uma Doença ou Veneno, ou quando alguém usar uma destas ações em você, aumente o bônus de circunstância concedido em um sucesso para +4 e, se o resultado da jogada de salvamento do paciente for um sucesso, o paciente trata o resultado como um sucesso crítico.
Robust Recovery.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Robust Recovery.name: Recuperação Robusta

Rock Runner.description: Sua conexão inata com as rochas permite que você se mova habilmente por superfícies irregulares. Você pode ignorar terreno difícil causado por detritos e solo irregular feito de pedra e terra. Além disso, quando usar a perícia Acrobatismo para se Equilibrar sobre superfícies estreitas ou solo irregular composto de pedra ou terra, você não fica desprevenido. Ainda, quando rolar um sucesso em um teste de Acrobatismo, trate o resultado como um sucesso crítico.
Rock Runner.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Rock Runner.name: Correr nas Rochas

Rogue Dedication.description:
Pré-requisitos Destreza 14

Você recebe um talento de perícia e a característica de classe de ladino ataque surpresa (página 169). Você se torna treinado em armaduras leves. Você se torna treinado em Furtividade ou Ladroagem e em uma outra perícia à sua escolha; se já for treinado em Furtividade e Ladroagem, você se torna treinado em uma outra perícia à sua escolha. Você se torna treinado na CD de classe de ladino.

Especial Você não pode selecionar outro talento de dedicação até ter recebido dois outros talentos do arquétipo de ladino.
Rogue Dedication.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Rogue Dedication.name: Dedicação de Ladino

Rokoan Arts.description: Ancestral spirits have begun to bond themselves to you, granting you powers characteristic of a rokoa. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.BBvV7qoXGdw09q1C]{Speak with Animals} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.HTou8cG05yuSkesj]{Status} as primal innate spells once per day each.

Roll with It.description:
Pré-requisitos herança de Goblin Inquebrável, Goblin Quicante Acionamento Um inimigo te acerca com uma arma ou ataque desarmado corpo-a-corpo.

Quando você toma um grande acerto, seu inimigo te balança como uma bola de borracha, mas você escapa do pior do impacto. Seu inimigo pode te carregar por qualquer distância e direção que ele escolher dentro de um raio de 9 metros (este não é um movimento forçado, e aciona reações como normalmente). Você cai prostrado e fica atordoado 1. Faça um teste simples com CD 6. Caso tenha um sucesso, você toma dano mínimo do ataque; em um sucesso crítico, se o ataque foi crítico você não recebe o dobro de dano do acerto crítico.
Roll with It.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Roll with It.name: Deixa Rolar

Root Magic.description:
Prerequisites trained in Occultism

Your talismans ward against foul magic. During your daily preparations, you can assemble a small pouch with bits of herbs, hair, sacred oils, and other ritual ingredients, which you give to one ally.

The first time that day the ally attempts a saving throw against a spell or haunt, they gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the roll. This bonus increases to +2 if you’re an expert in Occultism or +3 if you’re legendary.

Root to Life.description:
Marigold, spider lily, pennyroyal-many primal traditions connect flowers and plants with the boundary between life and death, and you can leverage this association to keep an ally on this side of the line. You place a small plant or similar symbol on an adjacent @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} creature, immediately stabilizing them; the creature is no longer dying and is instead @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} at 0 Hit Points.

If you spend 2 actions instead of 1, you empower the act further by uttering a quick folk blessing to chase away ongoing pain, adding the auditory trait to the action. When you do so, attempt flat checks to remove each source of persistent damage affecting the target; due to the particularly effective assistance, the DC is 10 instead of the usual 15.

Rope Runner.description:
Prerequisites trained in Acrobatics and Athletics, Pirate Dedication

You run and climb across ropes and rigging almost as easily as on the ground. You gain a Climb Speed of 15 feet, but only on ship’s rigging or similar ropes.

Whenever you succeed at an Athletics check to Climb a rope or an Acrobatics check to Balance on a rope, you get a critical success instead. You aren’t Flat-Footed while Climbing or Balancing on a rope.

Rough Rider.description: Você é especialmente bom em cavalgar montarias goblinoides. Você recebe o talento Cavalgar, mesmo que não atenda a seus pré-requisitos. Você também recebe +1 de bônus de circunstância em testes de Natureza para usar Comandar um Animal em um cão goblin ou lobo de montaria. Você sempre pode selecionar um lobo como seu companheiro animal, mesmo se devesse selecionar somente um companheiro animal com a habilidade especial montaria, como descrito na montaria aliada de um campeão.
Rough Rider.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Rough Rider.name: Cavaleiro Brusco

Rough Terrain Stance.description:
Requirements You gained a terrain attunement benefit this turn.

You enter a stance that makes it difficult to move around you. Each square adjacent to you becomes difficult terrain that matches the terrain attunement you gained (rime forms in an arctic terrain, momentary undergrowth shoots up in a forest terrain, and so on). You ignore this difficult terrain.

This stance ends if you move into a different type of terrain.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.YkiTA74FrUUu5IvI]{Stance: Rough Terrain Stance}

Round Ears.description: Sua linhagem elfica é sutil o bastante para que você tenha grande passabilidade entre outros humanos, e você aprendeu a usar isso em seu favor. Você torna-se treinado em Dissimulação (ou outra perícia da sua escolha, se já for treinado em Dissimulação). Você ganha um bonus circunstancial de +4 tem tentativas de Personificar para fingir que você não é meio-elfo. Observadores nunca obtêm bonus circunstanciais para teste de Percepção devido a sua Personificação de humano puro, e você nunca toma penalidades circusntancias em suas Personificações como humano puro. Especial Você pode pegar este talento apenas no 1º nível e você não pode retreinar para este talento.
Round Ears.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Round Ears.name: Orelhas Arredondadas

Ru-shi.description: You were born to a jiang-shi, one of the so-called hopping vampires found most often in Tian-Xia. Your parent had a supernatural obsession with counting small objects, which manifests in you as a preternatural gift for linguistics and mathematics. You are trained in Society and gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.0N8TtGSk5enoLBZ8]{Eye For Numbers} skill feat. If you would automatically become trained in Society (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

Rubbery Skin.description:
Prerequisites Disturbing Defense

Your skin develops a malleable, rubbery quality. You gain resistance to bludgeoning damage equal to 2 + your number of class feats from the oozemorph archetype. You also gain resistance equal to twice that amount to extra damage from critical hits; if the resistance is greater than the extra damage, it reduces the extra damage to 0 but doesn’t reduce the attack’s normal damage.

Rugged Survivalist.source: Presságios Perdidos - Guia da Sociedade Pathfinder

Rule of Three.description:
Requirements You have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.hPZQ5vA9QHEPtjFW]{Spun a Tale}.

Trigger The villain of the tale you've spun makes an attack roll with a given weapon or unarmed attack, uses a particular special ability (such as a Breath Weapon), or Casts a Spell against the hero, and they used that same attack, special ability, or spell against the hero on the previous turn.

Heroes learn from their previous failures, often succeeding on the third attempt. You narrate a tale of the hero's success, granting them a +2 circumstance bonus to their AC or saving throw against the triggering effect. If the villain has used the same effect against the hero on both of their last two turns, and you used Rule of Three on that effect last turn as well, the bonus increases to +4.
Rule of Three.source: Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind

Runelord Dedication.description:
Your rune magic increases, and you practice with your school's associated weapon. You gain an additional cantrip of your chosen arcane school, and each time you gain a level (including this level), you add an additional spell from your chosen arcane school to your spellbook, with the same restrictions as the two spells you normally add.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.09VwtSsYldMkVzU1]{Runelord} archetype.

Runescarred Dedication.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.RyjrUkqSIg52Mjl8]{Marcado pelas Runas}
Pré-requisitos treinado em Arcanismo;; Accesso Você é das Terras das Sagas.

Seja pelo sangue (se você for varisiano, shoanti ou novotassiloniano) ou por exposição à magia rúnica, você se tornou um marcado pelas runas, com runas visíveis e brilhantes em seu corpo na forma de tatuagens ou cicatrizes. Você pode ter possuído estas marcas antes de ganhar o arquétipo, mas só se torna verdadeiramente marcado pelas runas quando escolhe estudar e se arriscar no poder das runas. Você se torna especialista em Arcanismo e também se torna treinado em Saber da Tassilônia, ou especialista em Saber da Tassilônia se já for treinado nessa perícia..

Escolha um truque mágico da lista de magias arcanas. Uma das runas em seu corpo corresponde ao truque mágico escolhido, e você pode conjurar o truque mágico escolhido como uma magia arcana inata.

Especial Você não pode selecionar outro talento de dedicação até ter recebido dois outros talentos do arquétipo de marcado pelas runas.
Runescarred Dedication.name: Dedicação de Marcado pelas Runas

Runic Impression.description:
You can temporarily replicate the effects of a property rune for your weapon or unarmed attacks. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.oOaEfsdVpgTXRhrY]{Runic Impression} conflux spell.

Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
Runic Impression.name: Runic Impression

Running Reload.description: Você pode recarregar sua arma enquanto se move. Você anda, dá um passo, ou se esgueira, então interage para recarregar.
Running Reload.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Running Reload.name: Recarga em Movimento

Running Tackle.source: Pathfinder Profecias Perdidas: O Grande Bazar

Runtsage.description: Unlike most of your kind, who dismiss goblins as embarrassments or expendable annoyances, you have studied the methodology behind their irresponsible and incomprehensible actions. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.ihN8gkHSdPG9Trte]{Adopted Ancestry} general feat and must select goblin as the feat's chosen ancestry. You also gain one 1st-level goblin ancestry feat.

Saber Teeth.description: You have long fangs, natural or augmented. You gain a jaws unarmed attack that deals [[/r 1d6[piercing]]] damage. Your jaws are in the brawling group and have the unarmed trait.

Sabotage.description:
Requerimentos You have a free hand

Você danifica sutilmente os equipamentos dos outros. Escolha um item que uma criatura em seu alcance segura ou carrega. O item deve ter partes móveis que você poderia sabotar razoavelmente (um arco curto poderia ser sabotado, mas não uma espada longa). Faça um teste de Ladroagem contra a CD de Reflexos da criatura. O dano causado por Sabotagem não pode levar o item abaixo de seu Limiar de Quebra.

Sucesso CríticoVocê causa dano igual a quatro vezes seu bônus de proficiência em Ladroagem.

Successo Você causa dano igual ao dobro seu bônus de proficiência em Ladroagem.

Falha Crítica Temporariamente imune à sua Sabotagem por 1 dia.
Sabotage.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Sabotage.name: Sabotagem

Sacral Lord.description:
By right of ritual or sheer stubbornness, you have claimed rulership of the land. Claim a defined territory, such as a small section of forest or river, or a district of a larger city. Within its borders, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.AUctDF2fqPZN2w4W]{Sigil} as innate divine cantrips, and you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on creatures that have the celestial, fiend, fey, monitor, or spirit traits.

Special You and your land are linked. Changes to one mirror themselves on the other-if you're depressed, gray rain and clammy mist might set in. These effects have no immediate mechanical impact, but they might give clues about problems afflicting the land.

Sacral Monarch.description: You have come into your full powers and are truly a monarch of your realm, by your own definition at least. While in your territory, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.bay4AfSu2iIozNNW]{Banishment} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8THDHP0UC7SgOYYF]{Inevitable Disaster} as innate divine spells, each once per day.

Sacred Armaments.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Sacred Defender.description:
You are a great warrior that can stand strong against the fiercest opponents to your cause.

You gain resistance 10 to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage caused by creatures and effects opposed to your tenets (evil creatures for tenets of good, good creatures for tenets of evil, and so on).

In addition, creatures and effects that roll a natural 20 on an attack roll against you don’t improve their result by one degree of success.

Sacred Ki.description:
Pré-requisitos Golpe de Ki, você segue uma divindade

O poder de sua fé inunda seu ki. Quando selecionar este talento, escolha caos, mau, bem, ou lei. Sua escolha deve se alinhar os componentes da tendencia de sua divindade. Quando você conjura a magia de foco @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ZL8NTvB22NeEWhVG]{Golpes de Ki} e causa dano a uma criatura cuja tendência é oposta à escolhida, você pode escolher que o dano do golpe de kiseja do tipo escolhido. Em adição, você pode substituir o dano do da magia de foco @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.oo7YcRC2gcez81PV]{Explosão de Ki} (ou outra magia de ki que cause dano de Força, a critério do MJ) pelo dano da tendência escolhida.
Sacred Ki.name: Ki Sagrado

Sacred Spells.description:
Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.mAMEt4FFbdqoRnkN]{Chill Touch}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YvXKGlHOt7mdW2jZ]{Death Ward}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kcelf6IHl3L9VXXg]{Disrupt Undead}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2iQKhCQBijhj5Rf3]{Disrupting Weapons}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.DZ9bzXYqMjAK9TzC]{Holy Cascade}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9u6X9ykhzG11NK1n]{Magic Stone}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.a3aQxCpoj1q1NQxC]{Sunburst} to your spell list. These are all necromancy spells for you, even if they normally have a different spell school. You can either prepare these spells or add them to your repertoire just like the spells normally on your tradition's spell list. When you gain this feat, you can retrain existing spells to replace them with ones on this list.

In addition, your knowledge of the conduits to the Positive Energy Plane allows you more flexibility with these spells. Choose one of these two benefits.

  • If you're a prepared spellcaster, you can spend 10 minutes to replace one of the spells you've prepared with a spell of the same level from the list of sacred spells. You can do this while Refocusing.
  • If you're a spontaneous spellcaster with the signature spells class feature, add two of the spells from the list of sacred spells to your repertoire. They are signature spells for you, in addition to your normal signature spells. When you gain the ability to cast a new level of spells, you can choose to switch the spells from this feat to any other spells from the list.

Sacrifice Armor.description:
Trigger You are hit by a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} that deals physical damage.

With divine awareness, you twist your body to lessen the impact of an attack. Reduce the damage you take by an amount equal to twice your armor’s level. Your armor becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken}, reducing its Hit Points to its Broken Threshold. If your armor was already damaged, it is destroyed instead.

Safe House.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uqIiSDbv80TbRwTQ]{Vigilante Dedication}

You establish a safe house—a secure space in which to hide your secrets from the outside world.

This safe house is roughly the size of a 10-foot cube. It’s in a location you have access to, and it can be part of a larger building or structure, like a hidden room or an underground cave.

The safe house protects objects and people inside it from magical detection. This has the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Nondetection}, using your Deception modifier for the counteract DC and half your level rounded up for the counteract level.

Setting up or moving your safe house takes a week of downtime.

The size of the safe house expands to four 10-foot cubes if you’re an expert in Deception, eight cubes if you’re a master, and 16 cubes if you’re legendary.

Safeguard Soul.description:
You've girded your soul against outside interference. You gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against death effects, possession effects, and effects that attempt to manipulate or steal your soul. You can't be transformed into an undead by any means. While your spiral is glowing, your allies in the light of the spiral gain this benefit as well.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.tlft5vzk66iWCVRq]{Effect: Safeguard Soul}

Safeguarded Spell.description: You bring the magical wavelengths of your spell into sync with the ones produced by your own body. If the next action you take is to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} with an area, you aren’t affected by the spell even if you are within the area.

Sanctify Water.description:
Pré-requisitos mestre em Religião, divindade boa ou má

Você imbui água com a benção de sua divindade. Escolha um recipiente de água na sua pessoa que seja de volume leve. Por uma rodada, se você ou seu aliado arremessá-lo em um inimigo, ele possui os seguintes efeitos de dano @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.efFe4EK7ThUrH446]{Água Benta} (se você segue uma divindade boa) ou @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.uplCUQwMwBOBHz0E]{Água Profana} (se você segue uma divindade má). O poder efêmero da água não lhe garante nenhum valor adicional, ou permite que seja usado como componente de uma magia. Se você tiver proficiência lendária em Religião, você pode santificar três recipientes em posse de seus aliados ao invés de somente os que estão ao seu alcance.
Sanctify Water.name: Santificar Água

Saoc Astrology.description:
Frequência 3 vez por dia Accesso Nacionalidade Lirgeni Requerimentos Você deve gastar 10 minutos após suas preparações diárias examinando o céu ou consultando um mapa estelar, ou você não pode usar esta ação neste dia.

A antiga Irmandade Saoc eram mestres da atrologia, e embora seu conhecimento não esteja nem aos pés de sua sabedoria, ele ainda é muito útil. Você pode recorrer às previsões das estrelas sobre sua situação atual. Se a sua ação requer um ou mais testes de perícia, role 1d8. Em um resultado 6, 7, ou 8, você ganha um bonus circunstancial +2 para o primeiro teste de perícia que tentar. Em um resultado 3, 4, ou 5, você ganha um bonus circunstancial +1. Em um 2, você não recebe bonus. Em 1, você toma uma penalidade circunstancial –1 no teste de perícia.
Saoc Astrology.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Saoc Astrology.name: Astrologia Saoc

Sap Life.description: Você drena a força vital de seus inimigos para curar seus próprios ferimentos. Quando conjurar a magia ferir e causar dano a pelo menos uma criatura viva, você recupera Pontos de Vida igual ao nível da magia ferir utilizada. Você só pode se beneficiar desse talento enquanto for uma criatura viva.
Sap Life.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Sap Life.name: Exaurir Vida

Savage Critical.description: Os ferimentos que você inflige são terríveis. Quando Golpear com uma arma ou ataque desarmado em que possua proficiência lendária, você obtém um sucesso crítico se rolar um 19 no dado desde que o resultado seja um sucesso. Este talento não surte efeito em um 19 se o resultado seria uma falha.
Savage Critical.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Savage Critical.name: Crítico Selvagem

Saving Slash.description:
Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Duelista Aldori

Acionamento Um oponente lhe acerta criticamente com um ataque corpo a corpo.

Você rapidamente gira sua lâmina, tentando defletir o impulso suficientemente para evitar o pior do ataque. Faça um teste simples CD 16. Se você obtiver sucesso, o ataque se torna um sucesso normal em vez de um sucesso crítico.
Saving Slash.name: Corte Salvador

Scalding Spit.description:
Pré-requisitos Goblin Tocha

Seus fluidos corporais queima com surpreendente volatilidade, como se você tivesse óleo em lugar de sangue nas veias. Enquanto você estiver sofrendo @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Dano Persistente de Fogo}, você ganha um cuspe efervescente como ataque desarmado à distância com um alcance de 9 metros que causa 1d6 de dano de fogo.
Scalding Spit.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Scalding Spit.name: Cuspe Escaldante

Scales Of The Dragon.description:
Prerequisites Dragon Disciple Dedication

Scales grow across your body, protecting you against physical and magical threats. When you’re unarmored, the scales give you a +2 status bonus to AC with a Dexterity cap of +2. Your resistance from Dragon Disciple Dedication increases to 3 + half your level.

Scaling Poppet.source: Pathfinder Profecias Perdidas: O Grande Bazar

Scalpel's Point.description: Your stratagems benefit from your precise knowledge of anatomy. When you critically hit with an attack on which you substituted your attack roll due to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.m0f2B7G9eaaTmhFL]{Devising a Strategem}, if your attack dealt piercing or slashing damage, you also deal [[/r 1d6[bleed]]] to your target.
