Scamper.description:
Requirements You are adjacent to at least one enemy.

You instinctively know how to flee danger. You Stride up to your Speed, with a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement. You must end this movement in a space that’s not adjacent to any enemy.

Scamper Underfoot.description: Você está acostumado a passar por debaixo de inimigos no campo de batalha com facilidade. Você ganha um bonus circunstancial de +1 em Acrobatismo em testes para @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Atravessar Acrobaticamente} o espaço de inimigos de tamanho médios ou maiores, e a presença do inimigo não torna os quadrados terreno difícil.
Scamper Underfoot.name: Passar por Baixo dos Pés

Scar-Thick Skin.description: Glorious, storied scars cover and protect much of your body. Your DC on flat checks to end @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} is reduced from 15 to @Check[type:flat|dc:10]{10}, or from 10 to @Check[type:flat|dc:5]{5} after receiving especially appropriate assistance.

Scare to Death.description:
Pré-requisitos lendário em Intimidação Você pode literalmente matar seu adversário de medo. Faça um teste de Intimidação contra a CD de Vontade de uma criatura viva a até 9 metros que você consiga sentir ou observar e que pode lhe sentir ou observar. Se o alvo não puder ouvi-lo ou não compreender o idioma que você está falando, você sofre –4 de penalidade de circunstância. A criatura fica temporariamente imune por 1 minuto.

Sucesso Crítico O alvo deve obter sucesso em um salvamento de Fortitude contra sua CD de Intimidação ou morre. Se o alvo obtiver sucesso no salvamento dele, ele fica assustado 2 e fugindo por 1 rodada; ele não sofre efeito em um sucesso crítico.

Sucesso O alvo fica assustado 2.

Falha O alvo fica assustado 1.

Falha Crítica O alvo não é afetado.
Scare to Death.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Scare to Death.name: Matar de Medo

Scarecrow.description:
Arquétipo Lavrador da Campânula

Pré-requisitos Dedicação da Campânula

Você luta ferozmente para proteger sua colheita. Quando atingir uma criatura que estiver adjacente a dois ou mais membros de sua colheita com uma arma ou ataque desarmado, você recebe um bônus de circunstância na sua rolagem de dano igual à quantidade de dados de dano da arma. Quando atingir uma criatura que possuir um membro da sua colheita agarrado, esse membro pode tentar Escapar usando uma reação
Scarecrow.name: Espantalho

Scattered Fire.source: Pathfinder Profecias Perdidas: O Grande Bazar

Scavenger's Search.description: You're always on the lookout for supplies and valuables. Each time you use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action to search for objects (including secret doors and hazards), you can search for objects in your choice of a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] around you or an adjacent 15-foot-by-15-foot area, rather than a single adjacent 10-foot-by-10-foot area.

Scholar's Inheritance.description: Your parents devoted themselves to alchemical experiments involving elemental energy. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Crafting. If you would automatically become trained in Crafting (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting} skill feat.

Scholastic Identification.description:
Prerequisites Archaeologist Dedication, master in Society

You have the knowledge needed to understand ancient texts and cultural artifacts.

You can use Society when Deciphering Writing, no matter the type of writing you are examining.

You can also use Society to Identify Magic when examining a magic item or location with cultural significance.

Schooled In Secrets.description:
Prerequisites trained in Occultism

You notice the signs and symbols that members of mystery cults and other secret societies use to declare their affiliation to fellow members.

You can use Occultism in place of Diplomacy to Gather Information about such groups. If you belong to a secret cult, lodge, sect, or similar organization, you automatically recognize members of your group unless they are specifically attempting to conceal their presence from you.

Scintillating Spell.description:
Your spells become a radiant display of light and color.

If your next action is to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} that doesn’t have the darkness trait, has no duration, and requires creatures to attempt a Reflex save, the spell explodes in a spray of scintillating lights, in addition to its other effects.

Each creature that failed its Reflex save against the spell is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round, and those who critically failed are instead @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Scion Transformation.description: You go into hibernation for 24 hours and perform a ritual dedicated to your ancestors, undergoing a one-time metamorphosis. You permanently gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}, and your maximum Hit Points increase by your level. The ritual transforms most of your gear to the appropriate size for your new body (though powerful items like artifacts or items strongly tied to their original size may not transform, at the GM's discretion).

Scorching Disarm.description:
Frequency once per day

You make a weapon unbearable to hold. Attempt an Athletics check to Disarm a target creature. You don't need to have a hand free to make this Disarm attempt. If the Disarm attempt succeeds, the target takes [[/r 4d6[fire]]] damage unless it drops the weapon, and on a critical success, it takes [[/r 4d6[fire]]] damage and drops the weapon. If you're legendary in Athletics, this increases to [[/r 8d6[fire]]] damage.

Scouring Rage.description:
Prerequisites an instinct that allows you to change your additional damage from Rage to a different damage type

Trigger You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Ah5g9pDwWF9b9VW9]{Rage}.

You emit a powerful surge of instinctual energy when you unleash your potential. Each adjacent creature takes damage equal to your level (basic Fortitude save against your class DC) of the same type as your additional damage during that Rage.

Scout Dedication.description:
Prerequisites trained in Stealth and Survival

You are a highly skilled scout, capable of providing your allies a timely warning of any danger. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Tpcq3Lk7qEOZ3LDP]{Scout's Warning} ranger feat.

When you’re using the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.kV3XM0YJeS2KCSOb]{Scout} exploration activity, you grant your allies a +2 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls instead of a +1 circumstance bonus.

Special You can’t select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the scout archetype.

Scout's Charge.description:
You meander around unpredictably, and then ambush your opponents without warning.

Choose one enemy. Stride, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} against that opponent, and then make a Strike against that foe. For your Feint, you can attempt a Stealth check instead of the Deception check that's usually required, because you use the terrain around you to catch your foe off-guard.

Scout's Pounce.description:
Requirements You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} by all of your opponents, and you aren't within 10 feet of any enemy.

You leap from the shadows to strike your foes. Stride up to your Speed, then Strike twice. If you were hidden or unnoticed by the target of these Strikes, your foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against both attacks.

Your multiple attack penalty applies normally for both attacks.

Scout's Warning.description:
Acionamento Você está prestes a fazer um teste de Percepção ou Sobrevivência para rolar uma iniciativa

Você avisa seus aliados com um sinal visível ou audível sobre o perigo, garantindo a cada um deles um bonus circunstancia lde + em suas rolagens de iniciativa. Dependendo de tipo de gestos ou sons que você usa elas ganham o traço visual ou auditivo, respectivamente.
Scout's Warning.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Scout's Warning.name: Aviso do Batedor

Scroll Esoterica.description:
Your esoterica includes scraps of scriptures, magic tomes, druidic markings, and the like, which you can use to create temporary scrolls. Each day during your daily preparations, you can create a single temporary scroll containing a 1st-level spell of any tradition. The spell must be common, or you must otherwise have access to it. This scroll is an unstable, temporary item and loses its magic the next time you make your daily preparations if you haven't used it by then. It can't be used to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Q5iIYCFdqJFM31GW]{Learn the Spell}.

At 8th level, add a second temporary scroll containing a 2nd-level spell.

Scroll Savant.description:
Prerequisites expert in Crafting

Durante suas preparações diárias, você pode criar dois pergaminhos temporários contendo magias arcanas de seu grimório. Estes pergaminhos seguem as regras normais para pergaminhos (página 573), com algumas restrições adicionais. Cada pergaminho deve pertencer a um nível diferente, e o nível de magia de ambos deve ser pelo menos 2 níveis inferior ao maior nível de magia que você possa conjurar. Quaisquer pergaminhos criados desta forma perdem seu efeito mágico na próxima vez que você fizer suas preparações diárias. Um pergaminho temporário não tem valor.

Se possuir proficiência mestre em CDs de magias arcanas, você pode criar três pergaminhos temporários durante suas preparações diárias e, se possuir proficiência lendária, você pode criar quatro pergaminhos temporários..
Scroll Savant.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Scroll Savant.name: Sagaz em Pergaminho

Scroll Trickster Dedication.description:
Prerequisites trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion

You’ve studied scrolls in depth. This might have been a comprehensive education in formal setting, or the sort of education where you somehow obtain a number of scrolls and try not to explode anything you didn’t mean to explode.

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uR62fVC9FyQAMCO1]{Trick Magic Item} feat, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to skill checks to Trick scrolls. If you roll a critical failure to Trick a Magic Item that’s a scroll, you get a failure instead.

Special You can’t select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the scroll trickster archetype.

Scrollmaster Dedication.description:
Arquétipo @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.2eAiIynDWTMKTGDU]{Mestre do Escrito}
Pré-requisitos especialista em quaisquer perícias de Saber, membro da Sociedade Pathfinder afiliado à Escola dos Escribas

Sua experiência em registras suas aventuras e descobertas lhe garantiram discernimento elucidado e boa memória. Por 24 horas após aprender um fato proeminente —como o nome de um PdM que você tenha conhecido, detalhes da sua missão, e informações similares—você pode Recordar Conhecimento sem fazer um teste, embora isso não o permita automaticamente memorizar longas linhas de texto ou números. Você também recebe um bonus circunstancial de +2 para testes de recordar detalhes que ocorreram antes da aventura atual, mesmo que tenham acontecido mais 24 horas atrás.

Se você possui o talento @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0Dy8RlFqrzCVOTl4]{Relatórios Completos} e tem proficiência especialista na perícia que está usando para Recordar Conhecimento, seu bonus circunstancial para Recordar Conhecimento sobre criaturas desse talento é aumentado para +4.

Especial Você não pode selecionar outro talento de dedicação até que tenha recebido dois talentos do arquétipo de Mestre do Escrito.
Scrollmaster Dedication.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Scrollmaster Dedication.name: Dedicação do Mestre do Escrito

Scrounger Dedication.description:
Prerequisites trained in Crafting

You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Craft} items even without appropriate tools or a workshop, though you take a –2 item penalty to your Crafting check.

Additionally, you don’t need a physical formula book to remember all of your formulas; you pay the same cost as normal to learn them, but you memorize them all.

You can Craft temporary items out of anything, anywhere, with whatever materials happen to be on hand, spending only 10 minutes to perform the initial Crafting check. The temporary item must be common, non-magical, 1st level or lower, and must be a weapon, armor, or a nonconsumable piece of adventuring gear (nonconsumable adventuring gear appears on Table 6–9 on page 288 of the Core Rulebook). Instead of a single item, you can create 10 pieces of a single type of ammunition. This is a shoddy item, but you don’t take the normal penalty when using shoddy items you made using this feat.

Your temporary item lasts for [[/r 1d4]] hours before falling apart into its raw components; the GM rolls the number of hours secretly. You can create only the physical item, not any information or magic, so for example, while you could create a blank journal or one of random pages, you couldn’t use it as a scholarly journal or a religious text.

You can incorporate any materials or items that you have on hand, even if they’re not the type of materials that would ordinarily be used to Craft a given item, though you must have enough volume of material to make the item you want.

Unless all the materials you used were an appropriate type to make the item, you take a –5 penalty to the Crafting check (or a –10 penalty if the materials you used were particularly unsuitable, as determined by the GM).

Special You can’t select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the scrounger archetype.

Scrutinizing Gaze.description:
Access You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

Your family's traditions of defending against Geb's undead have granted you a sixth sense for detecting spirits, haunts, and other restless dead, no matter their form or the strength of their presence. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive} when trying to determine if a creature is possessed or under the influence of an effect that would make them controlled, a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks made to see through disguises worn by undead, and a +2 circumstance bonus when using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action to find @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or undetected haunts or undead within 30 feet of you.

If you aren't using the Seek action or searching, the GM automatically rolls a secret check for you to notice haunts or undead within 30 feet anyway. This check doesn't gain the usual +2 circumstance bonus, and instead takes a -2 circumstance penalty.

Sealed Poppet.source: Pathfinder Profecias Perdidas: O Grande Bazar

Searing Restoration.description:
They told you there was no way that explosions could heal people, but they were fools… Fools who didn't understand your brilliance! You create a minor explosion from your innovation, altering the combustion to cauterize wounds using vaporized medicinal herbs. You or a living creature adjacent to you regains [[/r ceil(@actor.level/2)d10[healing]]]{level based healing}. In addition, the creature you heal can attempt an immediate flat check to recover from a single source of persistent bleed damage, with the DC reduction from appropriate assistance.

Base [[/r 1d10[healing]]]{1d10 Hit Points}. At 3rd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, increase the healing by 1d10.

Special If your innovation is a minion, it can take this action rather than you, though because it's not a living creature, it can't use the ability on itself.

@Check[type:flat|dc:17|name:Unstable Flat Check|showDC:all|traits:unstable]{Unstable Check}

On a failure, the innovation malfunctions in a spectacular (though harmless) fashion, such as a belch of smoke or shower of sparks, and it becomes incapable of being used for further unstable actions.

On a critical failure, you also take [[/r (@actor.level)[fire]]]{fire damage equal to your level}.

Seasoned.description:
Prerequisites trained in Alcohol Lore, Cooking Lore, or Crafting

You’ve mastered the preparation of many types of food and drink. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to Craft food and drink, including potions. If you are a master in one of the prerequisite skills, this bonus increases to +2.

Second Ally.description:
Pré-requisitos aliado divino

Sua graça interior atrai a atenção de um segundo espírito protetor. Escolha um segundo tipo de aliado divino e receba seus benefícios.
Second Ally.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Second Ally.name: Segundo Aliado

Second Shield.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JuEUNrvsxOYdXeYL]{Viking Dedication}

Trigger Your @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} causes your shield to break or be destroyed.

You’re used to your shield breaking in the middle of battle, and you’re prepared to use a backup or any convenient nearby object to defend yourself.

You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to draw a shield on your person or an unattended shield within your reach. If there is an object within your reach that could serve as an improvised shield—for example, a table or chair—you can Interact to draw it with this feat. The GM determines if something can be used as an improvised shield.

Your new shield isn’t raised until you use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield} action, as normal.

Second Sting.description:
Requerimentos Você está empunhando duas armas corpo a corpo, uma em cada mão.

Você lê os movimentos de sua presa e cria brechas na defesa dela, usando um ataque falho para garantir pelo menos um golpe de raspão. Faça um Golpe corpo a corpo com uma das armas requeridas contra sua presa caçada. O Golpe possui o efeito de falha a seguir.

Falha Você causa o dano que sua outra arma requerida causaria em um acerto, excluindo todos os dados de dano. (Isto remove os dados de dano da arma, runas, magias e habilidades especiais).
Second Sting.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Second Sting.name: Segunda Ferroada

Second Wind.description: Você pode entrar em uma segunda fúria, mas após isso você precisa recuperar o fôlego. Você pode entrar em Fúria sem esperar por 1 minuto após sua Fúria anterior (ou 1 rodada, com fúria rápida), mas após encerrar esta segunda Fúria você fica fatigado até descansar por 10 minutos.
Second Wind.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Second Wind.name: Retomar o Fôlego

Secret Eyes.description: You can call forth an invisible eye to let you peek on secrets. Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Ek5XI0aEdZhBgm21]{Prying Eye} as an innate occult spell.
Secret Eyes.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse

Secret Speech.description:
Pré-requisitos treinado em Dissimulação

Escolha uma sociedade secreta (como a Lacunafex ou a Rede da Campânula). Você aprendeu o jargão ou gírias secretas dessa sociedade, capacitando-o a transmitir e receber mensagens secretas ao cantar ou conversar com outros que também o aprenderam. Quando você fizer isso, um observador que obtiver sucesso em um teste de Percepção contra sua CD de Dissimulação percebe que você está passando uma mensagem (mas só consegue discernir seu conteúdo se obtiver sucesso em um teste subsequente de Sociedade contra sua CD de Dissimulação). Em um sucesso crítico, ele descobre não apenas a mensagem, mas também para quem você a está passando.

Especial Você pode selecionar este talento várias vezes. Cada vez que o fizer, você descobre o código secreto de uma sociedade diferente
Secret Speech.name: Código Secreto

See the Unseen.description: You notice things that others can't see at all. While you're adjacent to an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} creature of your level or lower, it is instead only @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from you. You only need a successful @Check[type:flat|dc:5] to target a hidden creature.
See the Unseen.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse

Seedpod.description: Seu corpo produz uma quantidade quase ilimitada de sementes duras. Você pode lançar sementes como um ataque desarmado à distância que causa 1d4 de dano contundente; esses ataques possuem o traçomanuseio. Em um acerto crítico, a semente explode, liberando uma vegetação emaranhada que impõe uma penalidade circunstancial de -3m na velocidade do alvo por 1 rodada. As sementes não adicionam nenhum efeito de especialização em crítico.
Seedpod.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Seedpod.name: Lançador de Sementes

Seek Injustice.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens

Seeker Arrow.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.oyLkqhDGwGGj40ME]{Eldritch Archer Dedication}

Your shots zip around corners and fly at impossible angles to reach your target. Make a bow @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} against a foe you can see; the ammunition travels to your target, even around corners. You ignore the target’s @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition and all cover.

Seeker of Truths.description:
Your devotion to discovering and hoarding abstruse truths borders on the fanatical, and you can bring this devotion to bear. You gain the cleric's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.hT4INKGtly4QY8KN]{Domain Initiate} feat but must select knowledge, secrecy, or truth as your domain. You cast that domain's domain spell as a focus spell of the same tradition as your cantrip from Eldritch Researcher Dedication, and you Refocus by contemplating abstruse mysteries rather than praying to a god. When an ability would manifest a divine symbol—such as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aF7RiG7c8GzSQLYt]{Word of Truth} focus spell—it instead manifests as a strange shape unique to you that seems to defy geometry.

Special You can take this feat up to three times, selecting a different domain each time.

Seize.description:
Requirements Your last action was a successful fist Strike against a creature no more than one size larger than you.

You seize your foe and pull it close. The foe you hit is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} as if you succeeded at an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} the foe.

Selective Energy.description: Ao convocar o poder divino, você pode impedir alguns inimigos de se beneficiarem ou alguns aliados de se ferirem. Quando conjurar uma versão de curar ou ferir que tenha uma área, você pode designar uma quantidade de criaturas igual ao seu modificador de Carisma (mínimo 1) que não são afetadas pela magia.
Selective Energy.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Selective Energy.name: Energia Seletiva

Self Destruct.description:
Trigger Your reanimated clockwork companion is reduced to 0 Hit Points.

Requirements You're within 60 feet of your reanimated clockwork companion.

You've installed a self-destruct device within your construct companion, which you can trigger with a special device from up to 60 feet away. When you activate the device, your reanimated construct companion explodes, dealing [[/r 2d6[fire]]] damage per level to all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30-foot radius}. Creatures caught in the blast can attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save, with a DC equal to the higher of your class DC or spell DC.

[[/r ((2*@actor.level)d6)[fire]]]{Leveled Fire Damage}

Selfless Parry.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7sso1g3AAejpZ8ar]{Dueling Parry}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.r72qcTupGzyRDiGe]{Duelist Dedication}

You protect those near you with a flash of steel. When you’re benefiting from Dueling Parry, allies adjacent to you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC. 

If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mf2cdCRV8uowOMOm]{Dueling Riposte}, you can use it when an enemy within your reach critically fails a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} against an ally adjacent to you, not just against yourself.

Semblance of Life.description:
Trigger You deal damage to a living creature with your fist Strike or with Desiccating Inhalation.

You draw the moisture you've drained from others into your own flesh, temporarily taking on the appearance of life. This has the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise}, except you can appear only as yourself while you were a living humanoid.

Sense Alignment.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6b8DiNx4c1zPZ7RP]{Edgewatch Detective Dedication}

You read the body language of an intelligent creature within 30 feet and pick up on subtle cues to detect its general propensity for good or evil and law or chaos. The GM rolls a secret Perception check, comparing the result against the target's Deception DC.

Critical Success You ascertain the target's alignment.

Success You ascertain the target's alignment, but only along one axis (your choice of either the good-evil axis or the lawful-chaotic axis).

Failure You do not learn the target's alignment.

Critical Failure You incorrectly ascertain the target's alignment, misidentifying their alignment along either one axis or both (GM's choice).
Sense Alignment.source: Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace

Sense Allies.description: Like many humans raised in a close-knit community, you have always been strongly attuned to the presence of others. Willing allies that you are aware of within 60 feet that would otherwise be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} by you are instead @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from you. The flat check for you to target willing allies within 60 feet that are hidden from you is 5 instead of 11.

Sense Chaos.description:
Pré-requisitos Dedicação dos Cavaleiros Infernais

Você pressentir o caos como um distúrbio incomodo de energia. Quando estiver na presença de uma aura de caos que seja poderosa ou opressiva, você pode eventualmente detectar essa aura, embora não possa apontar a localização exata imediatamente. Este é um sentido vago, similar ao faro dos humanos. Uma criatura caótica usando um disfarce ou tentando esconder sua presença deve tentar um teste de Dissimulação contra sua CD de Percepção para esconder a aura de você. Se a criatura obtiver sucesso, ela fica temporariamente imune a Sentir o Caos por 1 dia.
Sense Chaos.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Sense Chaos.name: Sentir o Caos

Sense Evil.description:
Pré-requisitos princípios do bem

Você sente o mal como uma sensação desagradável ou um pressentimento de mau agouro. Quando estiver na presença de uma aura de mal poderosa ou avassaladora (página 334), você eventualmente a detecta, embora não o faça necessariamente de forma instantânea e não consiga apontar exatamente a sua localização. Isto se manifesta como um sentido vago, similar ao olfato dos humanos. Uma criatura maligna utilizando um disfarce ou de alguma outra forma tentando esconder sua presença realiza um teste de Dissimulação contra sua CD de Percepção para esconder a aura de você. Se a criatura obtiver sucesso no teste de Dissimulação, ela fica temporariamente imune ao seu Sentir o Mal por 1 dia.
Sense Evil.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Sense Evil.name: Sentir o Mal

Sense For Trouble.description:
You can tell when something's off. You can trigger @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.7qBuzHY8kEG8SdEP]{Cat's Luck} after you roll initiative, in addition to its normal trigger, to reroll your Initiative and take the higher of the two results.

This still counts against Cat's Luck's frequency, as normal.

Sense Good.description:
Prerequisites tenets of evil

The presence of goodness sickens you with its saccharine self-righteousness. When in the presence of an aura of good that is powerful or overwhelming (Core Rulebook 328), you detect the aura, though you might not do so instantly, and you can’t pinpoint the location. This acts as a vague sense, similar to humans’ sense of smell.

A good creature using a disguise or otherwise trying to hide its presence attempts a Deception check against your Perception DC to hide its aura from you. If the creature succeeds at its Deception check, it is then temporarily immune to your Sense Good for 1 day.

Sense The Unseen.description:
Acionamento Você falha em um teste de @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Buscar}

Quando procura por adversários, você percebe as menores pistas. Mesmo que tenha falhado no teste acionador, você automaticamente sente quaisquer criaturas @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Indetectadas} na área em que está Buscando, deixando-as meramente @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Escondidas} para você.
Sense The Unseen.name: Sentir o Que Não É Visto

Sense Thoughts.description:
Pré-requisitos Compartilha Pensamentos

Você tem uma habilidade ainda mais estranha de saber o que outras pessoas estão pensando. Você pode conjurar @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KHnhPHL4x1AQHfbC]{Ler Mente} como uma magia oculista inata uma vez por dia.
Sense Thoughts.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Sense Thoughts.name: Sentir Pensamentos

Sensitive Nose.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse

Sentinel Dedication.description:
You have trained carefully to maximize the protective qualities of your armor.

You become trained in light armor and medium armor. If you already were trained in light armor and medium armor, you gain training in heavy armor as well.

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in any type of armor (but not unarmored defense), you also gain that proficiency in the armor types granted to you by this feat. If you are at least 13th level and you have a class feature that grants you expert proficiency in unarmored defense, you also become an expert in the armor types granted to you by this feat.

Special You can’t select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the sentinel archetype.

Settlement Scholastics.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PRKe5rWYZMZgEpFU]{Archaeologist Dedication}

Your studies open up new horizons. You become an expert in a Lore skill about a specific settlement; if you were already trained in that Lore skill, you also become trained in the Lore skill for a different settlement of your choice. Choose a single common or uncommon language prevalent in that settlement. You learn that language.

Special You can take this feat multiple times. When you take this feat again, choose a different settlement.

Shackleborn.description: Your lineage shows the signs of velstrac tampering, including some curious quirk bequeathed by those shadowy surgeons of flesh and souls. Your flesh heals cleanly and quickly—all the better for you to serve as a subject for their ghastly art. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.N8Xz5fuW6o7GW124]{Fast Recovery} feat, even if you don't meet the prerequisites.

Shackles of Law.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens

Shadow Blending.description:
Trigger A creature attempts a flat check to target you while you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} due to dim light or darkness.

You draw shadows close to create a shroud. Increase the DC of the flat check by 2.

Shadow Hunter.description:
Pré-requisitos Camuflagem

Você se mescla tão bem aos arredores que observadores não conseguem diferenciá-lo do terreno ao seu redor. Enquanto estiver em terreno natural, você sempre fica ocultado de todos os adversários que escolher — exceto para sua presa caçada.
Shadow Hunter.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Shadow Hunter.name: Caçador das Sombras

Shadow Illusion.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tha0L3Z6608JrUwN]{Shadow Magic}

With an artful eye, you shape shadows into illusory forms. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EOWh6VVcSjB3WPjX]{Shadow Illusion} focus spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1. You become an expert in occult spell attack rolls and DCs.
Shadow Illusion.name: Shadow Illusion

Shadow Magic.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1AgirzUGkyDdmENy]{Shadowdancer Dedication}

You gain the ability to fuse and play with shadows by using focus spells specific to shadowdancers.

You learn a shadowdancer focus spell of your choice: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9BGEf9Sv5rgNBCk0]{Dance of Darkness} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5ttAVJbWg2GVKmrN]{Shadow Jump}. If you don’t already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus}by meditating within an area of dim light or darkness. The rules for focus spells appear on page 300 of the Core Rulebook.

Shadowdancer focus spells are occult spells. You become trained in occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs, and your spellcasting ability for these spells is Charisma.

Shadow Mark.description:
Prerequisites expert in Stealth

You have learned special tricks that help you follow individuals without them noticing you.

When you attempt a Stealth check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.IE2nThCmoyhQA0Jn]{Avoid Notice} while following a specific target, the target takes a –2 circumstance penalty to their Perception DC. If you have master proficiency in Stealth, the penalty is –3 or –4 if you’re legendary.

If you start an encounter with the target while shadowing them, the target takes this penalty to their initiative roll and to their Perception DC to determine if they notice you, as normal for @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}.

Shadow Master.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1AgirzUGkyDdmENy]{Shadowdancer Dedication}

The shadows protect you better than any armor can, and they give you power to plunge others into darkness.

Whenever you are in an area of dim light or darkness, you gain resistance 5 to all damage except force and damage from @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes} with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune.

When you attempt a Reflex saving throw in an area of dim light or darkness, you can roll twice and take the higher result; this is a fortune effect.

Shadow Pact.description:
Pré-requisitos Etinia Nidalesa

Milhares de anos atrás, seus ancestrais fizeram um pacto com @Compendium[pf2e.deities.ZfN7jkK6boU1FuiS]{Zon-Kuthon}. Ele não foi esquecido, embora vocês gostariam que fosse. Você pode tomar 1 de dano para misturar sangue e sombras para conjurar @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TUj8eugNqAvB1vVR]{Criação} de 5º nível como uma magia divina inata. Você pode usar esta habilidade com a frequência que desejar, mas você só pode possuir um objeto criado por vez. Se o objeto encontra luz brilhante, a magia se dissipa nas sombras.
Shadow Pact.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Shadow Pact.name: Pacto das Sombras

Shadow Power.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tha0L3Z6608JrUwN]{Shadow Magic}

You can focus the shadows into a powerful blast. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IqJ9URobmJ9L9UBG]{Shadow Blast} as an innate occult spell once per day. Its level is always 1 level lower than the level of your shadowdancer focus spells. You become an expert in occult spell attack rolls and DCs.

Shadow Self.description:
Prerequisites: Legendary Stealth

Frequency: Once per hour.

Trigger You successfully use Stealth to Hide and become Hidden from all your current foes, or use Stealth to Sneak and become Undetected to all your current foes.

With a powerful talent for misdirection, you slip from your adversaries’ notice so thoroughly you appear to be somewhere else. You become Invisible for 1 minute or until you take a hostile action, whichever comes first.

Choose a location within 10 feet of you. Until your invisibility ends, you appear to be hidden in that location to anyone trying to find you. If the searcher gets clear evidence that you’re not there, they no longer think you’re hidden there, but they don’t discover your actual location.

Shadow Sight.description:
Frequency once per hour

You draw on your connection with the Shadow Plane to see through all but the deepest darkness. You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.vPhPgzpRjYDMT9Kq]{Greater Darkvision} for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.3GPh6O3PJxORytAC]{Effect: Shadow Sight}

Shadow Sneak Attack.description:
Prerequisites Shadowdancer Dedication

You gain the Sneak Attack class feature, except you deal 1d6 precision damage regardless of your level.

Sneak attack from multiple sources isn’t cumulative. If you have sneak attack from more than one source, use only the highest number of dice when you sneak attack rather than adding the amounts together.

Shadow Spells.description: Hidden darkness whispers to you, teaching you secrets of shadow beyond other spellcasters of your tradition. Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IqJ9URobmJ9L9UBG]{Shadow Blast}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.tcwT97RWKxsJiefG]{Shadow Siphon}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rxvS7EMJ7qmexAyA]{Shadow Walk}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.srEKUvym9kDVbEhD]{Replicate}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.hvKtmoHwekDZ5iOH]{Shadow Army}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8cuqRFB3mWBOgy61]{Shadow Projectile}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VTb0yI6P1bLkzuRr]{Shadow Raid} to your spell list. You can thus potentially learn these spells even if they aren't normally on your tradition's spell list.

Shadow of the Wilds.description: É difícil notar sua passagem através de áreas selvagens. Enquanto você não estiver em um ambiente urbano, você é sempre considerado como se estivesse @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SB7cMECVtE06kByk]{Cobrindo Rastros}, mesmo que você escolha um modo de exploração diferente.
Shadow of the Wilds.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Shadow of the Wilds.name: Sombra dos Ermos

Shadow's Assault.description: Your shadow assaults your foes. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IqJ9URobmJ9L9UBG]{Shadow Blast} as a 5th-level occult innate spell once per day. At 17th level, your shadow blast is heightened to 6th level.

Shadow's Web.description:
Requirements You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.QkKMile0qqmuVY67]{Clinging Shadows Initiate}.

You launch a wave of shadowy ki outward from your body, damaging your opponents and potentially binding them in place. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.n8eEXXAtguoErW0y]{Shadow's Web} ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
Shadow's Web.name: Shadow's Web

Shadowcaster Dedication.description:
You've sacrificed a piece of your spirit, allowing the powers of shadow into your being and changing the nature of your magic. You can no longer cast spells that have the light trait; if an ability, such as a class feature or ancestry feat, would automatically grant you a light spell, such as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.hT4INKGtly4QY8KN]{Domain Initiate} feat granting you the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zul5cBTfr7NXHBZf]{Dazzling Flash} spell, you don't gain that spell.

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.SE0fbgBj7atuukdv]{Cloak of Shadow} domain spell. It costs 1 Focus Point to cast a focus spell. This feat grants a focus pool of 1 Focus Point that you can recover using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus} activity. You can Refocus by meditating to siphon power from the Shadow Plane and refill your focus pool. Your domain spells from the shadowcaster archetype are of the same tradition as the spells you used to meet the shadowcaster archetype's prerequisites.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.wHs6IGCMaXsgFNop]{Shadowcaster} archetype.

Shadowdancer Dedication.description:
Prerequisites master in Stealth, expert in Performance

You dedicate yourself to the shadows. Your coloring becomes gray and gloomy, your senses adjust to the darkness, and you can sneak through darkness with ease.

You gain greater Darkvision. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks when you are within dim light or darkness.

Special You can’t select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the shadowdancer archetype.

Shadowy Disguise.description: You wrap yourself in shadow to change your appearance. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise} as a 1st-level occult innate spell once per day. This spell gains the shadow trait.

Shaitan Magic.description: The magic of shaitans runs through your blood. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.0qaqksrGGDj74HXE]{Glitterdust} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{Resist Energy} once per day each as 2nd-level arcane innate spells.

Shaitan Skin.description: When in danger, you can harden the stone in your skin into armor, much like a shaitan. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{Stoneskin} on yourself only, 3 times per day as a 4th-level arcane innate spell.

Shake it Off.description: Você concentra sua fúria, superando medo e lutando contra a doença. Reduza sua condição em 1, e tente uma jogada de salamento de Fortitude para se recuperar da condição enjoado como se tivesse gasto uma ação regurgitando; você reduz o valor de sua condição enjoado em 1 com uma valha (mas não numa falha crítica), 2 em um sucesso, ou 3 com um sucesso crítico.
Shake it Off.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Shake it Off.name: Livrar-se (Bárbaro)

Shall not Falter, Shall not Rout.description:
Prerequisites Knight Reclaimant Dedication

You gain the Shall not Falter, Shall not Rout focus spell. If you don’t already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can regain using the Refocus activity to recite the Crimson Oath and meditate on its teachings. If you already have a focus pool, increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. Your knight reclaimant focus spells are divine spells; when you gain this feat, you become trained in divine spell attacks and spell DCs and your spellcasting ability is Charisma.
Shall not Falter, Shall not Rout.name: Shall not Falter, Shall not Rout

Shameless Request.description: You can downplay the consequences or outrageousness of your requests using sheer brazenness and charm. When you Request something, you reduce any DC increases for making an outrageous request by 2, and if you roll a critical failure for your Request, you get a failure instead. While this means you can never cause your target to reduce their attitude toward you by making a Request, they eventually tire of requests, even though they still have a positive attitude toward you.
Shameless Request.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder

Shape Of The Dragon.description:
Prerequisites Dragon Disciple Dedication

You’ve discovered how to transform yourself into a dragon. Once per day, you can cast 7th-level Dragon Form as an innate arcane spell, transforming into your chosen type of dragon. The spell automatically heightens to 8th level if you’re 16th level and 9th level if you’re 18th level.

Any time you score a critical hit with an unarmed Strike gained from dragon form, you recharge the spell’s breath weapon immediately.

Shape of the Cloud Dragon.description:
You've discovered how to transform yourself into a cloud dragon. Once per day, you can cast 7th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form} as an innate arcane spell, transforming into a cloud dragon. The spell automatically heightens to 8th level if you're 16th level and 9th level if you're 18th level.

On a critical hit with an unarmed Strike gained from dragon form, you recharge the spell's breath weapon immediately.

While in this form, you gain the following cloud dragon-specific abilities:

  • Cloud cloud walk (you can walk on clouds or fog);
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d10 piercing plus 1d12 electricity;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3d10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 horn (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d8 piercing;
    • Breath Weapon @Template[type:cone|distance:30], 6d12 electricity.

Special You can use this feat in place of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.eR0sifECG27CC4do]{Shape Of The Dragon} to fulfill feat requirements.

Shaped Contaminant.description: Através de uma combinação de manipulação cuidadosa e controle preciso da respiração, você pode liberar toxinas inaladas com precisão. Quando você ativa um veneno inalado, você pode usá-lo para preencher uma linha de 6 metros que é 1,5 metros mais alta ao invés de um cubo de 3 metros. Você ganha um bônus de estado +3 nas jogadas de salvamento contra venenos inalados que você ativou.
Shaped Contaminant.name: Contaminante Moldável

Share Rage.description:
Requerimentos Você não usou esta habilidade desde sua última Fúria.

Você alimenta o furor de um aliado. Enquanto você estiver em fúria, uma criatura aliada a até 9 metros recebe os efeitos da ação Fúria — embora ela ainda possa usar ações de concentração.
Share Rage.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Share Rage.name: Compartilhar Fúria

Share Thoughts.description: Você tem uma capacidade estranha de comunicação com outros elfos mesmo sem falar, embora esse hábito deixe as pessoas ao seu redor desconfortáveis. Você pode conjurar @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.D442XMADp01qJ7Cs]{Vínculo Mental} como uma magia ocultista inata uma vez por dia, mas você só pode ter outros elfos ou meio elfos como alvos.
Share Thoughts.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Share Thoughts.name: Compartilhar Pensamentos

Shared Assault.description:
Prerequisites Courageous Assault

In the triumph of battle, you can share the glory with another ally.

When the ally you chose for Courageous Assault critically succeeds at the Strike granted by that action, another ally affected by your Inspire Courage composition spell can immediately use a reaction to make a melee Strike.

Since the second ally wasn’t the ally you chose for Courageous Assault, this effect doesn’t continue to a third ally, even if the second ally also critically succeeds at their Strike.

Shared Avoidance.description:
Prerequisites Premonition Of Avoidance

You can project your premonitions of danger to your allies. When you use Premonition of Avoidance, allies within 15 feet of you who are rolling the same saving throw against the same hazard also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to their saving throws.

Shared Clarity.description:
Prerequisites Premonition Of Clarity

You can project your premonitions of clarity to your allies. When you use Premonition of Clarity, allies within 15 feet of you who failed the same saving throw against the same mental effect can also spend their reactions to reroll the failed saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.

Shared Dream.description: You've learned to create a shared dreamscape to communicate with others. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rwCh2qTYPA44KEoK]{Dream Council} as an innate occult spell.

Shared Luck (Catfolk).description:
Prerequisites Cat’s Luck

When you use Cat’s Luck to reroll a Reflex saving throw, any creatures you choose within 10 feet who also just failed a Reflex saving throw against the same effect (such as a single spell) can also reroll their saving throws and use the better result.

Shared Luck (Halfling).description:
Prerequisites Halfling Luck

You are evidence that it’s lucky to travel with a halfling. You can use Halfling Luck when an ally within 30 feet fails a skill check or a saving throw to allow the ally to reroll the triggering check instead of you rerolling your own failed check. As usual, your ally must use the new result, even if it’s worse than their first roll. If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.k0sXAn4PPq5nW9al]{Guiding Luck}, you can’t use Guiding Luck’s effect that applies to attack rolls and Perception checks to use Shared Luck to benefit an ally.
Shared Luck (Halfling).source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens

Shared Prey.description:
Pré-requisitos Dádiva do Guardião, Presa Dupla

Caçando como uma verdadeira dupla, você e seu aliado acossam sua presa. Quando usar Caçar Presa e selecionar somente uma presa, você recebe seus benefícios normais e concede os benefícios listados em Caçar Presa e em sua excelência de caçador a um aliado. O aliado retém estes benefícios até você usar Caçar Presa novamente.
Shared Prey.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Shared Prey.name: Presa Compartilhada

Shared Replenishment.description:
Pré-requisitos Provimento de Guerra

Quando sua divindade abençoa seus atos bélicos, você pode estender esse favor a seus aliados. Você pode conceder os Pontos de Vida temporários de Provimento de Guerra para um aliado a até 3 metros em vez de concedê-los a si mesmo. Você pode conceder estes Pontos de Vida temporários para um aliado diferente a cada vez, o que significa que você consegue concedê-los a múltiplas criaturas em um mesmo turno.
Shared Replenishment.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Shared Replenishment.name: Provimento Compartilhado

Shared Sight.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Shared Stratagem.description:
The plans you make include your allies as well as yourself. When you hit a creature with an attack on which you substituted your attack roll due to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.m0f2B7G9eaaTmhFL]{Devise a Strategem}, designate one ally.

The creature you hit is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to that ally on the next attack the designated ally makes against that creature before the start of your next turn.

Shared Synergy.description:
Pré-requisitos Sinergia Dualista

Você pode conceder os benefícios de Sinergia Dualista a um aliado à 9 metros ao invés de si próprio, seja permitindo-o Recordar Conhecimento, garantindo à esse aliado Pontos de Vida temporários, ou ambos, dependendo da tradição da magia.
Shared Synergy.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Shared Synergy.name: Sinergia Partilhada

Sharp Fangs.description: Seus dentes são armas formidáveis. VOcê ganha persas como um ataque desarmado que causa 1d8 de dano perfurante.
Sharp Fangs.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Sharp Fangs.name: Presas Afiadas

Shatter Defenses.description:
Requerimentos Uma criatura assustada está em seu alcance corpo a corpo.

Sua ofensiva explora o medo de seu inimigo. Faça um Golpe corpo a corpo contra uma criatura assustada. Se você acertar e causar dano, o alvo fica desprevenido até o término da condição assustado dele. Se o alvo já estiver desprevenido para você ao sofrer o dano deste Golpe, ele não pode reduzir o valor de assustado abaixo de 1 até o final de seu próximo turno.
Shatter Defenses.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Shatter Defenses.name: Estilhaçar Defesas

Shatter Space.description:
The sheer power of your magic fractures reality. Use this amp in place of a psi cantrip's normal amp entry. The cantrip must be one that takes 2 or more actions to cast.

Amp You or one target of the spell are surrounded by a spiral of torn space. This is an aura, and you choose the radius of the emanation, up to 20 feet. A creature that starts its turn in the aura or enters the aura during its turn takes [[/r 1d6[slashing]]] damage for every level of the amped psi cantrip, with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC. If the creature critically fails, the torn space throws it off balance and it falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. The aura lasts until the beginning of your next turn. You can choose whether the aura affects the creature emitting it.

Shattering Blows.description: Your forceful blows shatter objects with ease. While you are raging, your melee Strikes ignore 5 points of an object’s Hardness. If you have the devastator class feature, you instead ignore 10 points of an object’s Hardness.

Shattering Strike (Monk).description: The force of your considered blow shatters objects and defenses alike. Make an unarmed Strike. It bypasses the target’s resistances. If the target has Hardness, the Strike treats the Hardness as if it were half its value.
Shattering Strike (Monk).source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder

Shattering Strike (Weapon Improviser).description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.FSxugo3zTgRhW7Og]{Improvised Pummel}

Trigger An improvised weapon that you are wielding becomes broken as a result of a critical success on an Improvised Pummel.

The improvised weapon shatters, destroying it completely but dealing an additional [[/r 3d6 #piercing]] piercing damage to the creature you hit with the Improvised Pummel. This extra damage you apply on the critical hit doesn’t double from the critical hit, as normal.

Shed Tail.description:
Pré-requisitos Chicotada com Cauda Requerimentos Você tem uma cauda inteiramente crescida. Acionamento Você adquire a condição agarrado.

Você pode largar sua cauda para escapar. Você deixa de estar agarrado, então anda sem acionar nenhuma reação da criatura que o agarrou. Sua cauda leva 1 semana para crescer por completo. Até que cresça, você não pode usá-la como ataque desarmado, e você toma uma penalidade - 2 circunstancial em jogadas para Equilibrar-se.
Shed Tail.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Shed Tail.name: Largar Cauda

Sheltering Slab.description:
The stone around you is your ally, and you have learned to use it to shore up your weaknesses.

As long as you remain on the ground and are adjacent to a vertical stone wall that rises to your height or taller, you aren’t @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against attacks as a result of being flanked. This works even if you are at the outside corner of the wall.

Shepherd of Desolation.description: You know how to keep others alive in the Gravelands' murkiest shadows. Allies within @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10 feet} of you gain the benefit of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.n7LTwKUSATLaQ9FD]{Survivor of Desolation}. If you are a champion, this aura is a champion aura, even though you gained it from Knight Reclaimant instead of a champion feat or feature.
Shepherd of Desolation.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Shield Block.description:
Acionamento Enquanto estiver com seu escudo erguido, você sofreria dano de um ataque físico.

Você posiciona seu escudo na frente de um golpe para bloqueálo. Seu escudo o impede de sofrer uma quantidade de dano igual à dureza do escudo. Tanto você quanto o escudo sofrem o dano remanescente (ambos sofrem o mesmo dano), o que pode quebrar ou até mesmo destruir o escudo.
Shield Block.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Shield Block.name: Bloqueio com Escudo

Shield Of Faith.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hT4INKGtly4QY8KN]{Domain Initiate}

Residual energy from your domain spells bolsters your defenses. When you spend a Focus Point to cast a domain spell, you gain a +1 status bonus to your AC until the start of your next turn.

Shield Paragon.description:
Pré-requisitos aliado divino (escudo)

Seu escudo é um receptáculo de proteção divina. Quando estiver empunhando seu escudo escolhido, ele está sempre erguido mesmo que você não use a ação Erguer um Escudo. Os PV e LQ de seu escudo escolhido são dobrados, em vez de serem aumentados em 50%. Se fosse ser destruído, ele desaparece e vai para o reino de sua divindade em vez disso, sendo reparado por seu aliado divino. Durante suas próximas preparações diárias, o escudo retorna para você completamente reparado.
Shield Paragon.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Shield Paragon.name: Escudeiro Exemplar

Shield Salvation.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.s6wXcQYmHbew14gC]{Bastion Dedication}

You can save your shield from total destruction, even after a devastating attack. If a shield would be destroyed due to damage taken during your @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block}, the shield remains intact at 1 Hit Point instead.

Its construction is weakened until you take the time to repair it, preventing you from using Shield Salvation to save the same shield until your next preparations.

Shield Wall.description:
Trigger Your shield is raised and an adjacent ally Raises a Shield.

You use your shield in tandem with an ally's, forming a barricade. Both you and the triggering creature have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.I9lfZUiCwMiGogVi]{Standard Cover} as long as you remain adjacent to each other and you both have your shields raised; when this is no longer the case, the effect ends. You and your ally can't use this cover to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, as it's obvious you're standing there holding your shields, but you and your ally can use it to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover}. Normally, if you and your ally don't move, Shield Wall lasts until the beginning of your next turn, when your shield is no longer raised.
Shield Wall.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

Shield Warden (Champion).source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder

Shield Warden (Fighter).source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder

Shield of Grace.description:
Pré-requisitos Guardião de Escudo

Você protege um aliado com seu escudo e corpo. Sempre que usar a reação Bloqueio com Escudo para prevenir dano contra um aliado, você pode dividir igualmente o dano remanescente após o Bloqueio com Escudo entre você mesmo e seu aliado.
Shield of Grace.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Shield of Grace.name: Escudo da Graça

Shield of Reckoning.description:
Pré-requisitos aliado divino (escudo), princípios do bem, reação de campeão, Guardião de Escudo

Acionamento O ataque de um adversário contra um aliado condiz com o acionamento para sua reação de Bloqueio com Escudo e sua reação de campeão.

Quando defender seu aliado contra um ataque, você recorre a seu poder para protegê-lo ainda mais. Você usa a reação Bloqueio com Escudo para prevenir o dano contra um aliado e também sua reação de campeão contra o adversário que atacou seu aliado.
Shield of Reckoning.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Shield of Reckoning.name: Escudo da Retribuição

Shielded Stride.description: Quando seu escudo está erguido, os golpes de seus inimigos não podem lhe tocar. Quando tiver seu escudo erguido, você pode Andar para mover-se metade de sua Velocidade sem acionar reações que seriam acionadas por seu movimento (tal como Ataques de Oportunidade). Você pode usar Deslocamento com Escudo ao Nadar ou Voar em vez de Andar se possuir o tipo de movimento correspondente.
Shielded Stride.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Shielded Stride.name: Deslocamento com Escudo

Shielded Tome.description:
During your daily preparations, you can magically fuse a shield into your favorite book, where it appears as an elaborate bookmark. While the two are fused, the book shares the Hardness, Hit Points, and Broken Threshold of the shield, and it can be used to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} if you have that reaction, with a requirement of "You have Raised the Tome" instead of the usual requirements.

You can switch the fused item's form from a book to a shield with a book-shaped motif as a single action, which has the concentrate trait. When the item is in book form, you can read the book and Raise the Tome, and when it's in shield form, you can Raise the Shield, Activate it, and gain any other benefits or effects the shield normally has (such as a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.OqDAx4HJ39ojVtvg]{Spellguard Shield's} bonus to saving throws against magic).

The fusion lasts until your next daily preparations.

Shifting Faces.description:
Frequency once per day

You wear many faces, even those that don't belong to you. When you Change Shape into your tailless form, you gain the effects of 3rd-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise} for 1 hour or until you shift back, except it's a transmutation effect rather than an illusion.

Shifting Terrain.description:
Requirements Your terrain attunement matches the terrain you're in and you're in Rough Terrain Stance.

You slam your fist into the ground or twirl your arms about to cause the terrain around you to shift and ripple, potentially throwing others off balance. Each creature within your area of difficult terrain from Rough Terrain Stance must attempt a Reflex saving throw against your spell DC with the following effects.

After you use this action, you can't use it again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is clumsy 2 for 1 round and falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Shining Arms.description: When you cast light, you can modify its target to be 1 melee weapon, either unattended or possessed by you or a willing ally, and modify its duration to be 1 minute. If you do, add the following to its effects: When a creature wielding the weapon critically hits a foe, you can Dismiss the Spell as a reaction, causing the foe to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round. After you use this reaction, you can't use this modification again for 10 minutes.
Shining Arms.source: Pathfinder Profecias Perdidas: O Grande Bazar

Shining Oath (Liberator).description:
You've sworn an oath to put the undead to rest. Add the following tenet to your champion's code after the other tenets: "You must end the existence of undead you encounter as long as you have a reasonable chance of success; in the unlikely event you find a good undead, you can try to work out a more peaceful way to help it recover from its undead state rather than destroying it in combat, such as helping it complete its unfinished business and find peace."

If you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.IX1VlVCL5sFTptEE]{Liberating Step} triggered by an undead, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.ZnKnOPPq3cG54PlG]{Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead)}

You don't consider undead to be legitimate authorities, even in nations ruled by undead.
Shining Oath (Liberator).source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder

Shining Oath (Paladin).description:
You've sworn an oath to put the undead to rest. Add the following tenet to your champion's code after the other tenets: "You must end the existence of undead you encounter as long as you have a reasonable chance of success; in the unlikely event you find a good undead, you can try to work out a more peaceful way to help it recover from its undead state rather than destroying it in combat, such as helping it complete its unfinished business and find peace."

Your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EAP98XaChJEbgKcK]{Retributive Strike} gains a +4 circumstance bonus to damage against an undead, or +6 if you have master proficiency with the weapon you used.

You don't consider undead to be legitimate authorities, even in nations ruled by undead.
Shining Oath (Paladin).source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder

Shining Oath (Redeemer).description:
You've sworn an oath to put the undead to rest. Add the following tenet to your champion's code after the other tenets: "You must end the existence of undead you encounter as long as you have a reasonable chance of success; in the unlikely event you find a good undead, you can try to work out a more peaceful way to help it recover from its undead state rather than destroying it in combat, such as helping it complete its unfinished business and find peace."

Your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.tuZnRWHixLArvaIf]{Glimpse of Redemption's} resistance against damage from an undead is 7 + your level.

You don't consider undead to be legitimate authorities, even in nations ruled by undead.
Shining Oath (Redeemer).source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder

Shiny Button Eyes.description: You've polished your eyes to reflect the smallest details in dimmest light. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.i4yRvVwvXbGZDsD1]{Canny Acumen} skill feat as a bonus feat, but you must choose Perception. Additionally, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception checks against visual illusions.
Shiny Button Eyes.source: Pathfinder Profecias Perdidas: O Grande Bazar

Shisk Lore.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse

Shoki's Argument.description: You feel a connection to shokis, the rambling collectors of wayward souls, and might have found old texts written by one. You are trained in Diplomacy. If you were already trained in Diplomacy (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You can also cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kcelf6IHl3L9VXXg]{Disrupt Undead} as a divine innate cantrip at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

Shoony Lore.description: Por crescer numa sociedade shoony, você aprendeu o valor da honestidade, amizade, e trabalho duro, mesmo durante tempos difíceis. Você é treinado nas perícias de Diplomacia e Sobrevivência. Se você já se tornaria automaticamente treinado nessas perícias (devido à sua biografia ou classe, por exemplo), você se torna treinado na perícia da sua escolha. Você também se torna treinado na perícia Saber dos Shoony.
Shoony Lore.name: Saber dos Shoony

Shooter's Camouflage.description: You specialize in blending into a particular type of environment, able to disappear after taking your shot. Choose either natural or urban terrain. In the chosen terrain, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} even without cover or being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}.

Shooting Stars Stance.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YW4FdWgzTwRFneFF]{Monastic Weaponry}

You enter a stance that lets you throw @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.fjkwYZ0hRmBztwBG]{Shuriken} with lightning speed. While in this stance, you can use your monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with shuriken instead.

Shore Step.description:
The shallows and tide pools have always called to you and let you pass unhindered. You ignore difficult terrain resulting from shallow water.

In addition, if you roll a success on an Acrobatics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balance} on a slippery or wet surface, or on an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim}, you get a critical success instead.

Shory Aerialist.description:
Pré-requisitos Etinia Garundi, Mauxi, ou Tian-Yae; Aeromante Shory ou a habilidade de ocnjurar @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Voo}

Únicos na histrória de Golarion, o povo Shory desenvolveu um estilo de luta dedicado ao combate no ar. Você ganha um bonus circunstancial +2 em testes de Acrobatismo para Manobrar durante o Voo e um bonus de +1,5 metros na sua velocidade de voo sempre que estiver voando com magia.
Shory Aerialist.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Shory Aerialist.name: Aerialista Shory

Shory Aeromancer.description:
Pré-requisitos Etinia Garundi, Mauxi, or Tian-Yae

Seus ancestrais saudaram a cidades voadoras de Shory, e alguns truques simples lhe foram herdados.. Você pode conjurar @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Voo} em si mesmo como uma magia arcana inata de 4º nível uma vez por dia.
Shory Aeromancer.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Shory Aeromancer.name: Aeromante Shory

Shoulder Catastrophe.description:
Arquétipo@Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.bi1SeBS7Af3ZisIA]{Mestre da Espada}
Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Mestre da Espada Acionamento Um inimigo obtém um sucesso crítico em um Golpe contra um aliado adjacente.

Você treinou para proteger seus aliados divergindo os piores ataques para si mesmo. O inimigo não dobra o dano do ataque acionador mas aplica o dano normal em você e seu aliado. Vocês dois tomam quaisquer efeitos que se apliquem ao dano causado, como veneno, mas nenhum de vocês sofre efeitos que se aplicariam à um sucesso crítico.
Shoulder Catastrophe.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Shoulder Catastrophe.name: Assumir Catástrofe

Shove Down.description:
Prerequisites trained in Athletics

Requirements Your last action was a successful @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}.

You leverage your weight to topple foes that you move. You attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} the target, even if the target is no longer in your reach.

Shoving Sweep.description:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AimSmPyiMhJZVZRq]{Mauler Dedication}, expert in Athletics

Trigger A creature within your reach leaves a square during a move action it’s using.

Requirements You are wielding a melee weapon in two hands.

You swing your weapon at your foe, rebuffing them back. You attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} the triggering creature, ignoring the requirement that you have a hand free. The creature continues its movement after the Shove.

Shrouded Mien.description: You're used to dealing with dangerous situations and sinister creatures. You become trained in Deception (or another skill of your choice, if you're already trained in Deception), and you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.HEBXaS656MZTiWFu]{Lengthy Diversion} skill feat as a bonus feat.

Sickening Bite.description:
Your saliva causes severe nausea and mild fever in the living, weakening them so that you can more easily finish them off. When you critically hit a creature with your jaws, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}. This is a disease effect.

If you are satiated, you can end your satiation to make the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} on a regular hit instead.

Side by Side (Druid).description:
Pré-requisitos Companheiro Animal

Você e seu companheiro animal lutam em sincronia, distraindo seus adversários e tirando seu equilíbrio. Sempre que você e seu companheiro animal estiverem adjacentes ao mesmo adversário, ambos o flanqueiam independentemente de suas posições.
Side by Side (Druid).source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Side by Side (Druid).name: Lado a Lado (Druida)

Side by Side (Ranger).description:
Pré-requisitos Companheiro Animal

Você e seu companheiro animal lutam em sincronia, distraindo seus adversários e tirando seu equilíbrio. Sempre que você e seu companheiro animal estiverem adjacentes ao mesmo adversário, ambos o flanqueiam independentemente de suas posições.
Side by Side (Ranger).source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Side by Side (Ranger).name: Lado a Lado (Patrulheiro)

Sidestep.description:
Acionamento A rolagem de ataque de um Golpe mirando você falha ou falha criticamente.

Você dá um passo rápido para se esquivar de um ataque, permitindo que o golpe continue na direção de outra criatura próxima. Você redireciona o ataque a uma criatura à sua escolha que esteja adjacente a você e dentro do alcance do ataque acionador. O atacante rerrola a rolagem de ataque do Golpe contra o novo alvo.
Sidestep.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Sidestep.name: Passo Lateral

Sign Language.description:
Prerequisites trained in Society

Você aprende a língua de sinais associada com os idiomas que conhece, permitindo-lhe fazer e entender sinais. Línguas de sinais tipicamente requerem ambas as mãos para transmitir conceitos mais complexos, e são visuais em vez de auditivas.

Língua de sinais é difícil de compreender durante o combate devido ao alto nível de atenção exigida, ao contrário de gestos básicos como apontar para um adversário ou sugerir um alvo. Língua de sinais é difícil de usar em áreas de baixa visibilidade, assim como a fala é difícil em um ambiente.
Sign Language.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Sign Language.name: Língua de Sinais

Signature Spell Expansion.description: Your innate connection to magic lets you cast more spells with greater freedom. You gain two additional signature spells, each of which must have a minimum level of 3rd or lower.

Signature Synergy.description:
Your eidolon gains an evolution integral to its form, and it comes more easily than your other synergies. You gain one evolution feat from the following list:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.h8OB6zcdIqUPS6PC]{Airborne Form}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.IeiTuTZExH5DQOqH]{Burrowing Form}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.a6xUSibsRaclbSz3]{Ever-Vigilant Senses}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.H6qletvAJUCC1aIa]{Hulking Size}

For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your summoner level is equal to your character level - 4.

Signifer Armor Expertise.description:
Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Signífero dos Cavaleiros Infernais

Você gastou tempo o bastante ajudando seus companheiros a equipar armaduras medias e pesadas que você aprimorou seu próprio entendimento dessas armaduras também. Se você é tem proficiência especialista em qualquer armadura ou defesa sem armadura, você também se torna especialista em armaduras médias e pesadas.
Signifer Armor Expertise.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Signifer Armor Expertise.name: Especialização em Armadura do Signífero

Signifer's Sight.description:
Pré-requisitos Dedicação Signífero dos Cavaleiros Infernais

A magia que flui pela máscara do signífero permite você ver no escuro, e a máscara também abafa quaisquer distrações causadas por lampejos de luz brilhante. Enquanto estiver usando a máscara de Signífero, você adquire visão no escuro. Em adição, se você estiver ofuscado enquanto estiver usando a máscara do signífero e o alvo estiver ocultado por você estar ofuscado, você reduz o teste simples para mirar na criatura de 5 para 3.
Signifer's Sight.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens
Signifer's Sight.name: Visão do Signífero

Silence Heresy.source: Pathfinder Presságios Perdidos: Guia de Personagens

Silencing Strike.description:
A quick strike to the face or mouth silences your opponent. Make a melee @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} against a foe. The foe must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target is dazed and can barely vocalize. It’s @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Atordoado} 1 and its speech is raspy and hard to understand. It must succeed at a DC 11 flat check to use linguistic actions or supply verbal spellcasting components until the end of its next turn.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature is stunned 3 instead of stunned 1.

Silent Spell.description:
Pré-requisitos Ocultar Magia

Você aprendeu a conjurar magias sem pronunciar as palavras de poder normalmente necessárias. Se a sua próxima ação for Conjurar uma Magia que possua um componente verbal e pelo menos um outro componente, você pode remover o componente verbal. Isto torna a magia mais silenciosa e lhe permite conjurá-la em áreas onde o som não propaga. Entretanto, a magia ainda possui manifestações visuais, portanto, isto não a torna menos óbvia para alguém que veja sua conjuração. Quando usar Magia Silenciosa, você pode escolher receber os benefícios de Ocultar Magia sem precisar fazer um teste de Dissimulação, já que a magia não possui componentes verbais.
Silent Spell.source: Livro de Regras Núcleo de Pathfinder
Silent Spell.name: Magia Silenciosa

Silent Step.description: You vanish with silent treads. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Step}, then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}. You still need to meet the requirements to Hide or Sneak, as normal.

Silver's Refrain.description: Você aprende o truque mágico de composição @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.xM35hJacTM1BSXUl]{Refrão de Prata}, que ajuda quando estiver lutando contra demônios.
Silver's Refrain.name: Refrão da Prata

Simple Crystal Magic.description:
Arquétipo Guarda dos Cristais

Pré-requisitos Dedicação de Guarda dos Cristais

Contanto que você medite antes de uma pedra preciosa valer pelo menos 10 po como parte de suas preparações diárias, você é capaz de ver a magia como runas fluidas que revelam informações sobre objetos mágicos e pode escrever uma runa pessoal que o represente. Você ganha os truques mágicos ler aura e sigilo. Você conjura esses truques mágicos como magias arcanas inatas à vontade. Um truque mágico é elevado para um nível de magia igual à metade do seu nível arredondado para cima.

(Tradução não oficial - Age of Ashes livro 4)
Simple Crystal Magic.name: Magias de Cristal Simples

Sing to the Steel.description: You strike magical tones that can turn the tide of combat. You and your allies within 30 feet gain the effects of one of the following runes until the end of your next turn: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Wm0X7Pfd1bfocPSv]{Corrosive}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LwQb7ryTC8FlOXgX]{Disrupting}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{Flaming}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.M5M1WJ5KzbYfRGsY]{Frost}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.NVst7e69agGG9Qwd]{Shock}, or @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.dTxbaa7HSiJbIuNN]{Thundering}. The effects apply to a single weapon the creature is holding or one of the creature's unarmed attacks. You choose the rune and the effect applies to all creatures. You can use an action, which has the concentrate trait, to extend the duration of the rune for 1 additional round up to a maximum of 1 minute. If this would give a weapon or unarmed attack more property runes than its normal maximum, an existing property rune (as the creature chooses) is suppressed until the spell ends.
Sing to the Steel.source: Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind

Sinister Appearance.description: You possess horns, a tail, or red eyes, or could otherwise be mistaken for a tiefling. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Intimidation. If you would automatically become trained in Intimidation (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.
